column1:
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1000000_DESCRIPTION":"A mysterious area that suddenly appeared in the Vortex.
On orders from the Akras Summoners\u2019 Hall
column2: hunters are being sent to investigate the area and rid it of monsters."

column1:
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1000001_DESCRIPTION":"A mysterious area that suddenly appeared in the Vortex.
On orders from the Akras Summoners' Hall
column2: hunters are being sent to investigate the area and rid it of monsters."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100000_DESCRIPTION":"The sacred grounds from which all living beings originate. Soak up some of the overflowing Karma."

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1000010_DESCRIPTION":"You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier\u2026"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1000011_DESCRIPTION":"You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100001_DESCRIPTION":"Further within the sacred grounds from which all living beings originate. Soak up even more of the overflowing Karma."

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100002_DESCRIPTION":"A hidden domain in the sanctuary that watches over all living things. Now's your chance to get more Karma than you could ever imagine!"

column2: but nevertheless you mustn't be careless."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100050_DESCRIPTION":"It is said this is where souls come to be forged. Here is your chance to gain experience as a Summoner as well as some Karma."

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100053_DESCRIPTION":"A secret area where visitors are said to train their souls to the limit. You may just obtain more experience and Karma than you could ever imagine."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10005_DESCRIPTION":"You've felt no demonic presences until now. It looks like finding the demons in charge of this land will prove harder than you initially thought."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1000_DESCRIPTION":"A world of inferno awaits you as you proceed further into the dark cave. The molten lava glows brightly
column2: but behind it lies a sinister darkness."

column2: Nymphs

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10011_DESCRIPTION":"You never thought that the demon who controls this land would show itself so quickly. Keep your eyes peeled for traps ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10012_DESCRIPTION":"Bridges have been built over the hot vapors that rise from below. One wrong step
column2: and it's all over. You will need a lot of courage to pass through."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10013_DESCRIPTION":"Thanks to the rising hot vapors your throat has dried up

column2: trap-filled cave. Mountains of treasure or oceans of despair
column3: who knows what awaits!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100202_DESCRIPTION":"There are many secrets in this trap-filled cave. Do you fear getting trapped in despair
column2: or are you hopeful to find riches!?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10020_DESCRIPTION":"You come across some beautiful ponds and cascades which resemble sets of stairs. According to Paris
column2: this water is like acid. Don't go for a dip."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10021_DESCRIPTION":"This place full of so much dangerous acid makes you wonder if a lot of Ishgria's terrain is similar to this one. It's a bit disconcerting."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10022_DESCRIPTION":"To your surprise you find creatures resembling fish and small shrimp swimming in the acid. This place is definitely different from Elgaia."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10023_DESCRIPTION":"When you feel something strange on your shoe
column2: you look down to find it has begun to disintegrate. You should watch your step here."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10024_DESCRIPTION":"You have finally reached the end of the cascades to find yourself in a dark valley of sorts. However
column2: you must defeat a strong enemy to move forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1002_DESCRIPTION":"This land is said to inspire the spirit of warfare in its inhabitants. Judging from the enemies standing in your way
column2: this seems to be true."

column2: said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter."

column2:
said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100320_DESCRIPTION":"A Fire pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force."

column2: but you don't remember seeing any trees around..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10033_DESCRIPTION":"The aroma of many types of mushrooms mixes in the air. So do their spores. You hope these spores aren't bad for your body
column2: but Paris knows better."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10034_DESCRIPTION":"It is so quiet that you think you can hear the sound of the spores floating around you. Suddenly though
column2: a ferocious roar breaks the silence."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1003_DESCRIPTION":"The scalding lava plunges at you all of a sudden. If it hits you
column2: you'll suffer far more than fourth degree burns. However
column3: worse dangers lie ahead..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100400_DESCRIPTION":"Heroes and spirits from all over gather among these dangerous ruins. Now's your chance to gather hordes of Material Units!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100401_DESCRIPTION":"Deeper within the dangerous ruins
column2: home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to get some valuable Material Units!"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100404_DESCRIPTION":"These sealed off ruins are home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to obtain some super rare materials!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10040_DESCRIPTION":"Your eyes had just gotten used to the darkness
column2: when a flash of lightning blinds you. The view you see before you includes giant floating crystals."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10041_DESCRIPTION":"An ominous red light emanates from the chained giant crystals that float midair. To think that you have to walk through such a place..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10042_DESCRIPTION":"Storms of lightning rage above you
column2: hitting the crystals from time to time. The electricity helps carve stairs and roads on the crystals' surface."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10043_DESCRIPTION":"You find many rooms within the crystal structures. Do demons live here? Humans wouldn't be able to survive in such a place..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10044_DESCRIPTION":"You managed to make it through this strange place and resurface to land. However
column2: an opponent seems to be preparing to fight you."

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10051_DESCRIPTION":"You fight your enemies while a pillar shaped light gleams before you. How does this structure work? A terrible demonic aura surrounds this place."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10052_DESCRIPTION":"As you contemplate the Light Tower you begin to wonder about the demon civilization. Do they all have different roles to play as humans do?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10053_DESCRIPTION":"A demon named Shusui is said to rule these lands. Is it due to his orders that other demons refuse to show themselves?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10054_DESCRIPTION":"You're making your way down the tower and will be outside soon. However
column2: the enemies seem to be getting stronger now. Proceed with caution."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100600_DESCRIPTION":"Take part in this grand parade and capture some of these metal type monsters
column2: bursting full of fusion experience!!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100601_DESCRIPTION":"A grand procession featuring only Metal Units that are Super Rare and above! Metal Kings and above guaranteed
column2: don't miss this great chance!"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100609_DESCRIPTION":"A grand procession featuring Water Metal monsters with loads of Water experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10060_DESCRIPTION":"After exiting the Light Tower
column2: you come across some sparkling trees. Unlike the mushroom forest
column3: these look like real trees
column4: only made of stone."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100610_DESCRIPTION":"A grand procession featuring Earth Metal monsters with loads of Earth experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100611_DESCRIPTION":"A grand procession featuring Thunder Metal monsters with loads of Thunder experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100612_DESCRIPTION":"A grand procession featuring Light Metal monsters with loads of Light experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100613_DESCRIPTION":"A grand procession featuring Dark Metal monsters with loads of Dark experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100614_DESCRIPTION":"By popular demand
column2: a celebration with only Metal Gods or stronger Units is here! It's a parade unlike you've never seen before!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10061_DESCRIPTION":"Though you've encountered various creatures in the previous terrains
column2: this one is awfully quiet. Is as if all life here has died out."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10062_DESCRIPTION":"A building in ruins sleeps within the forest. Completely broken down and in shambles
column2: it resembles the bones of a dead gigantic creature."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10063_DESCRIPTION":"If you look closely
column2: you can see signs of ancient battles having taken place here. You start to wonder what the exiled disciples' battles were like."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10064_DESCRIPTION":"From an opening in the trees you can see an enormous building in the distance. Is this the Soaring Tree Tower Shusui spoke of? You're almost there."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100650_DESCRIPTION":"A big parade of Jewel monsters full of Zel is coming your way! The hunt for riches is on!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100651_DESCRIPTION":"Here comes a mystical parade full of high class jewel monsters. Now's your chance to get super rich with Kings and higher guaranteed!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100652_DESCRIPTION":"Are the gods that capricious?! A parade where only Jewel Gods or stronger Units are found is finally here!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100660_DESCRIPTION":"Strange creatures called Elgifs have been found in the Vortex. The curious glyphs written on their otherworldly tablets hide great powers within."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100661_DESCRIPTION":"Elgifs are very rare creatures who seldom show themselves to humans. So if you spot one
column2: it is a good omen of the things to come."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100662_DESCRIPTION":"Only those blessed with luck can obtain the rarest of the tablets. However
column2: the gods alone seem to know where the mysterious Elgifs dwell."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100663_DESCRIPTION":"You who seek the luminous tablets
column2: open the door if you have prepared your heart and mind. A trial unlike any you have faced before awaits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100664_DESCRIPTION":"These valuable tablets with their unusual powers are not easily obtained. Only those with immense power and rare luck are granted a chance at them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100665_DESCRIPTION":"Only those who are prepared to die may proceed. Unfathomable despair and the ultimate power granted only to the chosen one await you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100700_DESCRIPTION":"A traveler on the first steps of her journey. Her inexperience clouds her ability to see the value in friendship."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100701_DESCRIPTION":"A traveler who has come to be known throughout the land. She's realized the value of having someone to train with."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100702_DESCRIPTION":"A valiant traveler who commands praise wherever she goes. She continues her journey
column2: always on the look out for worthy allies."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100703_DESCRIPTION":"A celebrated traveler who is almost unmatched in her swordsmanship. Her skills had brought her to be able to match herself to fight against the gods' invasion."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10070_DESCRIPTION":"The gigantic tower might as well be a skyscraper piercing the sea of clouds. Could its candle-like branches be the stronghold of a demon?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10071_DESCRIPTION":"As thunder rumbles behind you
column2: you enter the mysterious tower. Before you stands a tough enemy whose plans remain unclear. No choice but to continue."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10072_DESCRIPTION":"Every enemy awaiting you only seems to get stronger by the minute. You're only halfway through the tower
column2: so there's no time to rest yet."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10073_DESCRIPTION":"No matter how you think of it
column2: what Shusui says makes little sense. Why is he testing you? You can't read the demon's mind at all."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10074_DESCRIPTION":"You can feel a great power ahead
column2: but it doesn't belong to a demon. Could it be Shusui's last trial? Better prepare yourself before proceeding."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10075_DESCRIPTION":"An entirely different enemy than any of the ones the fallen heroes before you ever faced is expecting you at the top of the tower. Shusui awaits."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100800_DESCRIPTION":"Living among the shadows
column2: his pride as a ninja warrants him little contact with others. Few are harder to pin down than he."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100801_DESCRIPTION":"Acting under the cover of night
column2: there's no objective he can't achieve. Who knows what it'd take to capture such a man."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100802_DESCRIPTION":"Enveloped in a burning red darkness
column2: only the strongest could even stir this man
column3: whose training has cleansed him of all desire."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100803_DESCRIPTION":"A man whose soul that is one with the darkness and mastered total discipline within. To see a red glow in the shadows would deem one's certain death."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10080_DESCRIPTION":"Shusui suddenly shows himself before you once again. Why is he after you now? Does it have to do with something from this land?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100900_DESCRIPTION":"Rebelling against his heritage as a blacksmith in his younger days
column2: it'd take a lot more than strong wits to gain this man's allegiance."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100901_DESCRIPTION":"Creating his own path as a blacksmith
column2: he has come to acknowledge the raw strength that others possess."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100902_DESCRIPTION":"He soon came to be known as the God Arm
column2: though this power he only showed to those he deemed worthy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_100903_DESCRIPTION":"Smith Lord
column2: people called him. For he forged an almighty weapon to fight against the gods' invasion."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101000_DESCRIPTION":"A pirate as brutal as she is beautiful. Many have tried
column2: and failed
column3: to thaw her impenetrable icy heart..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101001_DESCRIPTION":"Her ferocity and coldness of character are notorious throughout the seas. Rumor has it that even the Sea King was unable to dent her frosty exterior."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101002_DESCRIPTION":"Her attacks and insults freeze the hearts of both enemies and allies alike. Captain of a huge fleet of pirate ships
column2: she has no time for any but the strongest of individuals."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101003_DESCRIPTION":"Frost forms on the ground she treads
column2: fierce gales and icy blizzards tear through her foes. Her frozen wrath challenging the gods."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10100_DESCRIPTION":"The burning light of the lava inside the caverns tans your skin. The overwhelming black and red colors blind your vision. Don't let your guard down."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10101_DESCRIPTION":"If you don't watch your step
column2: you may end up stepping in the hot lava. Sticking your foot in there does not look like a good idea."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10102_DESCRIPTION":"You get an uneasy
column2: yet familiar feeling
column3: and remember the fear of facing a disciple. There's no doubt that a strong enemy awaits ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10103_DESCRIPTION":"You follow a hot trail. The ground
column2: walls
column3: and even the ceiling is scorching hot. Your feet feel like they're burning through the soles of your shoes."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10104_DESCRIPTION":"A ferocious roar echoes through the cavern. At the same time
column2: you feel a cool breeze waft in. It looks like the exit is near."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1010_DESCRIPTION":"Frozen winds rush at you. The fact that the black cave of molten lava exists so close to this snowfield reminds you that nature is a force to be reckoned with."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101100_DESCRIPTION":"A boxer who set out on an epic journey to discover her origins. Her fists make mincemeat out of any who dare to approach her."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101101_DESCRIPTION":"She has sworn to continue traveling until she finds the answers she\u2019s looking for. A world of hurt awaits any who stand in her way."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101102_DESCRIPTION":"None exist who haven\u2019t heard of this true brawling legend. She respects only those who understand the true meaning of destruction."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101103_DESCRIPTION":"A martial artist at her very peak
column2: a master of brute destruction. Pride is her only weakness."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10110_DESCRIPTION":"The goddess Mora suddenly appears before you. When she mentions she once served Lord Lucius
column2: you can't help but to remember Tilith."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10111_DESCRIPTION":"You've seen many a spectacular scenery in Ishgria
column2: so now that you're at the Wetlands
column3: you can truly appreciate their bizarre beauty."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10112_DESCRIPTION":"You feel anxious knowing a presence near you holds terrible power. The humidity of the wetlands clings to your skin
column2: making you really uncomfortable."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10113_DESCRIPTION":"Mora guides you through the Wetlands. Since it's Seria and Lugina
column2: you know they are safe
column3: but you can't help to worry a little."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10114_DESCRIPTION":"There's a faint aroma of sea breeze in the moist air.  This change can only mean that the end of the Wetlands is near."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1011_DESCRIPTION":"You take a peek in all directions and are met with stark whiteness. Try not to lose your sense of direction. Follow the sparse trees and the sun's movements."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101200_DESCRIPTION":"A fighter who seeks great power to protect the one he loves. He pays attention only to those who exude the kind of power he desires."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101201_DESCRIPTION":"A fighter who travels the world in search of the one he loves. The encounters and experiences he absorbs along the way add to his burgeoning strength."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101202_DESCRIPTION":"A fighter with a kick powerful enough to crush even gods. Known as \"Thunder Kick
column2: \" he only has time for those who he thinks demonstrate enough power themselves."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101203_DESCRIPTION":"A fighter who has honed his abilities beyond godlike
column2: every smiting kick he delivers smashes with lightning electrocution. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10120_DESCRIPTION":"The power of a person similar to Karl has been awakened? What could it mean? You hope Karl is safe as you wonder what this is all about."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10121_DESCRIPTION":"Paris warns that the thick and overgrown plants here are different from the ones in Grand Gaia. Some of them may be poisonous
column2: so be careful."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10122_DESCRIPTION":"Another bad feeling. That's the third time since you arrived to Lem. Without a doubt
column2: an enemy with great power approaches. Brace yourself."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10123_DESCRIPTION":"Pushing your way through an animal trail
column2: you reach a small thicket. Hearing a rustle coming from the bushes
column3: you ready yourself. It was an animal."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10124_DESCRIPTION":"The giant trees have cleared out. Now you can probably make it out of the forest quicker. The possibilities of encountering enemies are high though."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1012_DESCRIPTION":"Just as with Karl
column2: you have faith that Grahdens is safe. But your loss of words to console Karl is regrettable."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101300_DESCRIPTION":"Is Nekki an alien from outer space??"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101301_DESCRIPTION":"Is Nekki an alien from outer space??"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10130_DESCRIPTION":"Paris can't seem to hide her fascination for the ancient dragon. However
column2: you should hurry forward if you want to make sure everyone's okay."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10131_DESCRIPTION":"Your body goes slightly numb after approaching an electrified crystal. Best be careful of your surroundings and keep some distance from the crystals."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10132_DESCRIPTION":"You feel something ominous. A frightfully strong enemy is bound to show itself at any minute
column2: but there seems to be no way to escape."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10133_DESCRIPTION":"You climb over the great ancient dragon's claws. You don't want to fight an opponent this gigantic
column2: but you may have to in the future..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10134_DESCRIPTION":"The small electrified crystals have gotten much bigger
column2: and the dragon's bones are almost invisible now. The Ruins can't be far from here."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1013_DESCRIPTION":"You sense a sudden drop in temperature around you. Judging from experience
column2: this means danger is not far off."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101400_DESCRIPTION":"Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10140_DESCRIPTION":"You're surprised by Paris's course of action. You had vaguely noticed a change
column2: but now it's clear that this Paris is more free spirited than before."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10141_DESCRIPTION":"You head towards the Ruins in search of Seria and Lugina. Now that Paris is not around
column2: walking behind the silent Mora doesn't feel right."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10142_DESCRIPTION":"A bad feeling overcomes you. A sharp
column2: blood thirsty will made of pure evil draws near. There's nowhere to run
column3: so prepare a good counterattack."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10143_DESCRIPTION":"Just how far did Paris go? You can't pick up any presences around you
column2: but whatever you encounter will not be weak. It would be good to regroup."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10144_DESCRIPTION":"Things are happening so suddenly
column2: there is no time to react. What could Mora be thinking? There's no time to ponder about that either."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1014_DESCRIPTION":"A wielder of ice magic carrying a terrifying axe stands in your way. A fierce battle is about to start
column2: but make it quick. The snowfield's exit is near."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101500_DESCRIPTION":"Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10150_DESCRIPTION":"After being apart for such a long time
column2: you reunite with Seria and Lugina. Now you must begin all preparations necessary to face Mora once again."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10151_DESCRIPTION":"The black rocks and red lava remind you of the first caverns you passed through. It's not that hot here
column2: but you're thrown off by the ominous miasma."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10152_DESCRIPTION":"A bad feeling once again. You've felt this countless times by now
column2: this evil intent to kill. And combined with the miasma
column3: chills run down your spine."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10153_DESCRIPTION":"When you look behind you
column2: it seems as if all the land were illuminated by lightning. Perhaps it's the dragon's suffering. A long bridge stands ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10154_DESCRIPTION":"After climbing down a steep hill
column2: you grow closer to the great bridge. The miasma around you makes everything creepier as it points towards the enemy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101600_DESCRIPTION":"Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10160_DESCRIPTION":"The demon Mora finally reveals her true identity. She says that if you wish to know Karl's whereabouts
column2: you must defeat her first. Can you trust her?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10161_DESCRIPTION":"Crossing the great bridge with Lugina reminds you of your time in Lizeria. With that in mind you wonder how your relationship has made it this far."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10162_DESCRIPTION":"Thanks to Paris and Lugina's help
column2: you won't face many traps along the way. But the demons Mora has sent come at you one after another."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10163_DESCRIPTION":"You may have beaten a disciple
column2: but its presence is not completely gone. Countless disciple-like demons come after you
column3: but you're only halfway there."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10164_DESCRIPTION":"It's battle after battle
column2: but while caught up in them you feel a new
column3: yet strange power approaching. It feels familiar somehow though..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10165_DESCRIPTION":"After defeating Shusui anew
column2: you head towards the end of the bridge. However
column3: you feel that demonic presence again. You know which demon awaits now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101700_DESCRIPTION":"The Six Sibyl Sisters were said to have rescued many people. Here lays a shrine dedicated to one of them. Why was it they reached out to save the people?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101701_DESCRIPTION":"The Blaze Sibyl saved the people with an affectionate heart of mercy. However
column2: that in turn led to her fighting her sisters. The sadness from that fight still lingers."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10170_DESCRIPTION":"The demon Mora suddenly appears before you again. What is a demon's shadow? And just what could be going on in Ishgria?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101800_DESCRIPTION":"The ice cold air pricks at your skin
column2: but what awaits ahead is a sibyl said to have a glacial glare even colder than ice."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101801_DESCRIPTION":"A blade of ice that shines clear and bright thanks to the blood of the people it has fed on. Perhaps this is a symbol of her true pure nature. "
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101900_DESCRIPTION":"The land that was once covered with beautiful blossoming flowers now exists as a dark
column2: cold place
column3: just like the memories of the young Rose Sibyl."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_101901_DESCRIPTION":"The young Rose Sibyl was best known for her sweet childlike smile. But do not underestimate her
column2: for pure innocence and pure ruthlessness are two sides of the same coin."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102000_DESCRIPTION":"The sisters once chatted joyfully in the land of thunder. Now
column2: not a trace of their happiness can be found."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102001_DESCRIPTION":"Do these bolts of lightning represent the rage of a sibyl of destruction
column2: or are they her tears
column3: shed over the battle with her sisters? The truth will never be known."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10200_DESCRIPTION":"The lava before you makes you falter a little. No matter how many trying places you've visited
column2: you'll need resolve to get out of this one."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10201_DESCRIPTION":"The air carries the fiery breath of a dragon. There's no doubt that a group of them is nearby. Best move quietly to avoid any confrontations."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10202_DESCRIPTION":"It's so hot you want to resort to Lugina's rude vocabulary to describe the temperature. Your skin stings too
column2: perhaps because you're a bit burnt?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10203_DESCRIPTION":"The sound of the lava flow is unexpectedly pleasant
column2: until you suddenly hear a deafening roar. It might be smart to prepare for battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10204_DESCRIPTION":"This hell-like lava path seems to be almost over. However
column2: menacing presences still lurk about. Could this be the demon's assassins?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1020_DESCRIPTION":"The verdant ocean of trees lives up to its name. Wherever you look
column2: the sun's rays are blocked by lush greenery. Under your feet
column3: the ground is covered in grass and moss."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102100_DESCRIPTION":"This sparkling shrine was once the pride of the Six Sisters. Now
column2: without a master
column3: rampant monsters lurk in alongside the souls of the sibyls of destruction."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102101_DESCRIPTION":"The sibyl who had the kindness and mercy to forgive all sins
column2: yet she couldn't save those closest to her. What might she reveal to a Summoner able to capture her?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10210_DESCRIPTION":"Very impactful scenery suddenly comes into view. A deep red sea spreads before your eyes. Its hue makes you realize anew you're in another world."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10211_DESCRIPTION":"Though the sea has a red tint to it
column2: its smell is not strange at all. This disparity makes you uncomfortable and highly confuses you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10212_DESCRIPTION":"You've seen the sea dyed by the colors of the sunset before
column2: but you're sure this water's hue is something entirely different. You start feeling sick."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10213_DESCRIPTION":"The \"Six Armors\" that Mora mentioned
column2: which rival demonic powers
column3: start to bug you. You may have to fight them in the future."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10214_DESCRIPTION":"Are all of Ishgria's oceans red? While thinking that to yourself
column2: a horde of enemies shows up. This is no time to take it easy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1021_DESCRIPTION":"Unlike the tundra
column2: the forest is full of what looks like landmarks. But they are starting to lead you astray as you trip over the thick grass."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102200_DESCRIPTION":"The shrine sparkles like a star scattered sky. Just like the night sky it is breathtaking yet terrifying
column2: awakening one's primal fear of the dark. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102201_DESCRIPTION":"She was too engrossed in pursuing her ideals which is why she couldn't forgive anything. Regardless the passage of time
column2: this never changed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10220_DESCRIPTION":"Seria was right. This place really doesn't resemble a laboratory. However
column2: if you look closely you'll see a lot of strange equipment."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10221_DESCRIPTION":"The ruins turned laboratory are being swallowed by the forest. You can feel great vitality coming from the plants growing along the walls."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10222_DESCRIPTION":"Even though the facility has been eroded by the forest
column2: a part of it still seems to be alive. The science behind it was indeed efficient."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10223_DESCRIPTION":"A very misplaced and dense floral aroma drifts in the air. You still don't know much about Ishgria's nature
column2: so you would do well to be cautious."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10224_DESCRIPTION":"You're almost out of the laboratory
column2: but Lugina and Paris are still nowhere to be seen. Seria's also taken her own path
column3: so just keep moving forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1022_DESCRIPTION":"All of a sudden
column2: sunshine bathes you as the old growth gives way to young foliage. The fresh flowers are a pleasure to your senses."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10230_DESCRIPTION":"As something fearsome drops from the heavens and comes after you
column2: you realize there is no room to talk. The battle has already started."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10231_DESCRIPTION":"The strong wind doesn't cease blowing. The wood of the gigantic and heavy windmill towering over you makes a loud creaking noise as it turns."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10232_DESCRIPTION":"The strong wind may be somewhat depressing
column2: but at least it's neither too hot nor too cold. There's no apparent danger in sight either."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10233_DESCRIPTION":"A violent squall almost sent you flying. Looks like this is yet another place where you can't let your guard down. Be careful."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10234_DESCRIPTION":"Though the windmill seems pretty old
column2: it is still in very good condition
column3: and even mobile. Could this have been the energy source for the lab?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1023_DESCRIPTION":"You happen upon an old tree that manages to stand out in the ocean of its peers. Though not much taller than the others
column2: it is far wider. You must make your way around it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10240_DESCRIPTION":"Beiorg shows himself before you again. Would it be wise to fight this enemy with a function that makes him stronger after every defeat?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10241_DESCRIPTION":"While looking at the landscape you realize that both demons and humans must have lived here long ago. Could humans really have inhabited Ishgria?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10242_DESCRIPTION":"After passing numerous alleys on a hill
column2: you finally find the main road. However
column3: where could the inhabitants of such a great city have gone?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10243_DESCRIPTION":"When you turn on a corner of the main road
column2: you see that a group of enemies has been waiting for you. Could these be the protectors of this old city?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10244_DESCRIPTION":"You have reached the outer wall of the old city. It may be due to the materials it's made of
column2: but it's still somehow untarnished and pearly white."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1024_DESCRIPTION":"Further into the ocean of trees you see some covered in exquisite flowers. Their petals rain down as the armored princess and gunner from another world approach."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10250_DESCRIPTION":"If you climb this set of strange-looking stairs
column2: you will reach the old castle. However
column3: climbing all these stairs is slightly depressing."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10251_DESCRIPTION":"The stairs keep going up
column2: and up. You start to worry about Owen
column3: but according to what Seria and Lugina said
column4: you just have to trust he's fine."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10252_DESCRIPTION":"Even though there seems to be no end to this staircase
column2: the enemies don't find it a problem to attack you. Be careful not to miss your step and fall."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10253_DESCRIPTION":"Due to the nature of this place
column2: you can't avoid any fights. On top of that
column3: enemies keep attacking you from high places
column4: so you're in a tough spot."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10254_DESCRIPTION":"You can see the entrance to the castle. Once you clear the next wave of enemies
column2: you should be able to go inside. That's where the real battle awaits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10260_DESCRIPTION":"You destroy all the mechanisms you see before you as you move forth. It's possible that Karl is here
column2: but what would he be doing in this place?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10261_DESCRIPTION":"As you look at the lights that flash on the floors and walls
column2: you feel as if you had been swallowed by a giant machine. Perhaps that's what happened?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10262_DESCRIPTION":"You keep destroying all the equipment you lay your eyes upon
column2: but nothing seems to happen. What is the purpose of all these gadgets anyway?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10263_DESCRIPTION":"Beiorg seems to be able to alter his stature and size
column2: but there's no way he'd make the castle a part of his body...is there?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10264_DESCRIPTION":"By the way
column2: where did Beiorg run off to? If this place is as important as Mora claims
column3: then he should be here to protect it
column4: and yet..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10265_DESCRIPTION":"As you wander around the silent castle
column2: you hear a strange sound echo through its halls. It seems like Beiorg is on his way to you after all!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10270_DESCRIPTION":"Behind the castle and down the cliff lies a forest of dry trees. Will another demonic shadow show itself here? No more demons should be around
column2: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102800_DESCRIPTION":"Entry to the Mysterious Paradise is only granted once a day. Croaking voices can be heard echoing in the distance."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102810_DESCRIPTION":"Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices
column2: something can be seen sparkling from inside."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102820_DESCRIPTION":"Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices
column2: something can be seen sparkling from inside."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102830_DESCRIPTION":"Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices
column2: something can be seen sparkling from inside."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102840_DESCRIPTION":"Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices
column2: something can be seen sparkling from inside."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102850_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102851_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102860_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102861_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102870_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102871_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102880_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102881_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102890_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102891_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102900_DESCRIPTION":"Entry to the Mysterious Paradise is only granted once a day. Croaking voices can be heard echoing in the distance."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102910_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102911_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102920_DESCRIPTION":"Imps which can improve the abilities of those they are fused with. Don't miss your chance to travel to the land where these little ones gather!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102921_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102930_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102931_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102940_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_102941_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103000_DESCRIPTION":"A knight who once led a refugee escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. What could he be thinking now that he has shown himself once again?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103001_DESCRIPTION":"The sword that once protected people during the war with the gods is now pointed in your direction. And with it
column2: stern eyes that seem to test you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10300_DESCRIPTION":"Owen says one shouldn't have overly positive expectations. Let your guard down for a second
column2: and you will be defeated. Better prepare yourself well."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10301_DESCRIPTION":"The city is burning. What could be the fuel of these flames
column2: and when will they stop burning? Ishgria is truly a strange place."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10302_DESCRIPTION":"Speckles of fire keep falling like rain. What could have happened to this place that is now burning? The mystery only deepens."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10303_DESCRIPTION":"The inside of the structure is as hot as a furnace. A minute longer inside
column2: and you'll be cooked alive. Hurry towards the giant flowers."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10304_DESCRIPTION":"As you pass the city
column2: the fire is not as intense
column3: but the amount of smoke is overwhelming. Breathing it in could be dangerous
column4: so hurry along."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1030_DESCRIPTION":"Leave Lugina and Seria to their own devices for now. Around this bog are the lingering traces of civilization
column2: as if it was once someone's home."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103100_DESCRIPTION":"A martial artist from the Toltya Dojo that protected those headed to Elgaia. Having regained his many secret techniques
column2: now he stands in your way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103101_DESCRIPTION":"The secret techniques of the Toltya Dojo defeated countless gods during the great escape. This master's eyes look towards the future
column2: ready to battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10310_DESCRIPTION":"You reach a lifeless lake housing water that is clearly not meant for drinking. The miasma that has settled in the place makes your stay unbearable."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10311_DESCRIPTION":"The stench makes you frown as you stumble about. If you spend too long here
column2: your insides may just get poisoned."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10312_DESCRIPTION":"The atmosphere is terrible. It must be hard for the demons to live here
column2: but impossible for humans to do the same. It weakens the spirit."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10313_DESCRIPTION":"A section of the lake seems to be boiling. However
column2: it's not water springing forth
column3: nor is the water really boiling. It's the effect of pollution."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10314_DESCRIPTION":"Could this lake and the burning city have been in their current state since the beginning? Or is there a reason behind their extreme conditions?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1031_DESCRIPTION":"Rain pours down with incessant lightning. Just as you start to suspect that enemies lurk here
column2: an ambush strikes from above!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103200_DESCRIPTION":"The youngster who planned the escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. Once he makes use of his brilliant intellect once again
column2: how will it affect this era?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103201_DESCRIPTION":"The eyes of the youngster who used his intellect to help his dear friends now stare at you silently. A strong will lies deep within them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10320_DESCRIPTION":"The giant flowers which gave this region its name finally come into sight. The miasma they release is so strong
column2: it can be seen with the naked eye..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10321_DESCRIPTION":"Could the flowers' miasma be pollen? The miasma that fills the air is even more hazardous to one's health than the lake's pollution."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10322_DESCRIPTION":"You begin to feel dizzy. The miasma is starting to take its toll. Cover your mouth with some cloth
column2: and try not to breathe it all in."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10323_DESCRIPTION":"Why would these dangerous plants settle in the city ruins? Do they not affect the demons as well? That seems improbable somehow..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10324_DESCRIPTION":"You encounter a revolting creature. If you don't get out of here now
column2: your body will suffer irreparable damage."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1032_DESCRIPTION":"You proceed around the outskirts of the bog as the rain drenches you. The enemy attacks are as relentless as the storm
column2: taking their toll on your stamina."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103300_DESCRIPTION":"A young magician who guided the people after receiving a divine revelation from the gods. Could the will of the gods have brought her back as well?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103301_DESCRIPTION":"The childhood friends that once fought by her side are no longer present. And yet she looks forward
column2: believing in the dawn of a new era."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10330_DESCRIPTION":"Who could that creepy man have been? He looked human enough
column2: but...does he live in Ishgria? He can't be trusted."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10331_DESCRIPTION":"Could crossing this long bridge made entirely of metal be really safe? Lightning won't stop flashing
column2: so you can't seem to calm down..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10332_DESCRIPTION":"The bridge is very high up
column2: and falling would send you head-first into the red water below. Your chances of surviving such a fall are slim though..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10333_DESCRIPTION":"Treading carefully
column2: you cross the bridge with extreme caution. Touching it could lead to an electric shock
column3: so you don't want to fight here
column4: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10334_DESCRIPTION":"You had no idea of what to do when Shusui attacked you on such a narrow bridge
column2: but you somehow survived the encounter. Just a little further now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1033_DESCRIPTION":"The cacophony of thunder threatens to burst your eardrums. Each time the lightning strikes
column2: so do your enemies' swords
column3: raising the hair on the back of your soaked neck."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103400_DESCRIPTION":"A heavily armored knight who saved many people during the escape to Elgaia. The white armor that once protected many now obstructs your path."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103401_DESCRIPTION":"A strong soul that aided those who led the escape to Elgaia. One to look towards the future
column2: his past remains a mystery. What path will he show you?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10340_DESCRIPTION":"Karl said he still has his doubts
column2: and those words echo in your head. However
column3: the enemy could care less and attacks you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10341_DESCRIPTION":"The fluids of demons lie scattered around everywhere
column2: making you feel sick. Mora claimed it was because of the flowers' miasma
column3: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10342_DESCRIPTION":"That demon seems to have been Lucius's old disciple
column2: but you've heard nothing of the sort before. Would Ark know about him?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10343_DESCRIPTION":"What could have happened to Owen and that man? Owen would never fall for the traps lying around these parts
column2: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10344_DESCRIPTION":"As you go deeper within the lair
column2: you feel a cold chill about you. Could there be something at the bottom? You should go take a look."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1034_DESCRIPTION":"You reach the opposite end of the marsh. It doesn't seem like Grahdens is being held anywhere around here. Proceed to the sea."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103500_DESCRIPTION":"A knight from the Bariura Empire who defied the emperor and led his people to Elgaia. Bearing great pride
column2: his soul has descended to Elgaia once more."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103501_DESCRIPTION":"Though you seek peace for Grand Gaia
column2: the ire he once held during the duel with his knight companion over their plan of escape is now directed at you!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10350_DESCRIPTION":"What could have that man meant to say? He said he resents the Summoners of Old...so could he be a Summoner himself?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10351_DESCRIPTION":"Crystals that sparkle amidst the darkness are beautiful. They are lovely to look at
column2: but could they really be as dangerous as that man claims?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10352_DESCRIPTION":"You've heard many legends that tell of beautiful crystals which can grant demonic powers. Could these be the same crystals of lore?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10353_DESCRIPTION":"The enemies here are stronger than those outside. Could it be the work of the crystals? Be careful not to get possessed by them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10354_DESCRIPTION":"You know you're almost out of the cave when you feel a draft. The old castle where the demon Melord awaits shouldn't be too far now."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103600_DESCRIPTION":"A curious stage has been found deep within ancient ruins. And with it
column2: a young songstress singing atop it. What could her message to the Summoners be?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103601_DESCRIPTION":"A diva found on the odd stage in the ruins. Her angelic voice continues to charm all Summoners. However
column2: a certain one among them would change her..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_103602_DESCRIPTION":"A diva found on the odd stage in the ruins. With a voice that once charmed the gods themselves
column2: its sound makes humans forget the passage of time. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10360_DESCRIPTION":"You don't mind being entrusted with Karl
column2: but you want to discuss what's going on with him. Look for Karl as soon as you finish that demon."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10361_DESCRIPTION":"The castle is in shambles. The passage of time
column2: the influence of that rotting demon
column3: and Owen's rage must have destroyed it. Time to find that demon."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10362_DESCRIPTION":"Grahdens mentioned that someone in Ishgria resents the Summoners of Old. However
column2: the existence of such a creature is surprising in itself."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10363_DESCRIPTION":"As you go deeper into the castle
column2: a familiar stench hits your nostrils. Melord seems to be near
column3: so hurry towards him."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10364_DESCRIPTION":"The slime on the walls is still fresh. You hear something that sounds like Owen on a rampage. You have to keep moving forward."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10365_DESCRIPTION":"Melord
column2: Lucius's former disciple
column3: now lives as a demon corrupted by the miasma and demon crystals. Make sure you're in top shape for this fight."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10370_DESCRIPTION":"You find Melord in a graveyard of rotting ships. Now the disciple of the Sealed God comes after you to do the bidding of his master!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104000_DESCRIPTION":"A strange airship shaped like a dragon suddenly appeared over the skies of Grand Gaia. Apparently
column2: an otherworldly warrior of fire rides inside it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104001_DESCRIPTION":"The otherworldly warrior riding the airship wields a very particular sword. In fact
column2: it is rumored that the blade has a will of its own."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104002_DESCRIPTION":"Aboard the airship
column2: the otherworldly warrior has combined his swordsmanship with the power of fire to create the ultimate attack. Best steer clear."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10400_DESCRIPTION":"Lava flows systematically around this place
column2: creating black smoke. According to Mora
column3: this place is based on a factory from another world."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104010_DESCRIPTION":"A strange airship shaped like a dragon suddenly appeared over the skies of Grand Gaia. Apparently
column2: an otherworldly warrior of fire rides inside it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10401_DESCRIPTION":"Owen advances even farther. The cowardly enemies that have avoided his path now come after you in return."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10402_DESCRIPTION":"The heat of the lava intensifies the atmosphere around you. Fighting under these conditions makes it hard to breathe. Careful not to break something."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10403_DESCRIPTION":"Apparently
column2: what's flowing around is not lava
column3: but molten metal. Is someone trying to build something with all this material?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10404_DESCRIPTION":"A wind that could burn your skin comes blasting in. This doesn't seem to be a part of the factory
column2: but of a strong enemy waiting ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1040_DESCRIPTION":"The sun starts to dye the sky a blood orange hue. Though you can't see the tower Tilith spoke of
column2: it mustn't be far. Keep going."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104100_DESCRIPTION":"A temple said to be the center of a certain religious group. There
column2: a lively female warrior seeks the precious otherworldly objects known as \"Lenses.\""

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104101_DESCRIPTION":"The otherworldly warrioress in the depths of the temple is obsessed with money
column2: and rumors say that she takes all visiting Summoners' possessions."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104102_DESCRIPTION":"No Summoner can handle this greedy and otherworldly warrioress. She toys with them using her skills with the sword and powers from another world."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10410_DESCRIPTION":"Paris was concerned about the large number of liquid-type monsters
column2: but it seems those creatures can adapt to the habitat of any world."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104110_DESCRIPTION":"A temple said to be the center of a certain religious group. There
column2: a lively female warrior seeks the precious otherworldly objects known as \"Lenses.\""

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10411_DESCRIPTION":"Luminous water flows freely around you. Could the speckles of light in it be bugs? Even the flowers growing around the basin seem to glow."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10412_DESCRIPTION":"Is this glowing water safe to drink? You spot a Squirty playing in it and can't help but wonder if this is the source of its larger evolutions."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10413_DESCRIPTION":"Though this shiny water is strange
column2: it is beautiful in its own way. If there were no danger lurking about
column3: it would be the perfect place for a stroll."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10414_DESCRIPTION":"The smell of the coast wafts in
column2: though there is no ocean in sight. It's safer to assume that a powerful enemy is behind it instead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1041_DESCRIPTION":"Mare's abduction of Karl was an act of suicide. But why would Zevalhua take Grahdens captive?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104200_DESCRIPTION":"In an otherworldly city where Blastia is studied in research facilities
column2: a girl immerses herself in her work. Some say she's quite strange..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104201_DESCRIPTION":"Although the girl is usually cool and collected
column2: she lost control of herself when a particular Summoner asked about the Blastia she studies."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104202_DESCRIPTION":"The genius girl from the Blastia research facility is an elite mage who can draw her battle tactics to life
column2: and use them against her opponents."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10420_DESCRIPTION":"Karl's secrecy has you very upset. But it doesn't seem like he has changed at the core
column2: so that relieves you somewhat."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104210_DESCRIPTION":"In an otherworldly city where magical devices are studied
column2: a girl immerses herself in her research. Some say she's quite strange..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10421_DESCRIPTION":"Seemingly a clump of plants from afar
column2: from up close one can see that a lot of care was put into planting these trees. This garden was man-made."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10422_DESCRIPTION":"The glass ceiling lets a strange light shine in. This light and the temperature are both regulated
column2: making the perfect environment for these plants."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10423_DESCRIPTION":"Taking a closer look
column2: you notice there are also plants from Elgaia in this garden. Scientists could potentially make great discoveries in this place."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10424_DESCRIPTION":"You're taken aback by the great tree in the middle of the garden. Could it be the great and otherworldly Alpha Tree?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1042_DESCRIPTION":"The sea breeze feels comfortable against your skin
column2: as does the sunlight coming from your left. But do not let your guard down. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104300_DESCRIPTION":"A girl has been spotted in the forest. Witnesses claim she wears her long pink hair in a ponytail."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104301_DESCRIPTION":"The girl who had been spotted in the forest was seen once again. This time
column2: witnesses claim she was riding a flying broom across the sky."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104302_DESCRIPTION":"Deep within the forest
column2: a girl with the knowledge of many types of magic is said to lurk. Rumor has it she even knows forbidden spells."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10430_DESCRIPTION":"Mirfah challenges you to a duel to learn your true intentions. You cannot just ignore him
column2: so prepare yourself and do the best you can."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104310_DESCRIPTION":"A girl has been spotted in the forest. Witnesses claim she wears her long pink hair in a ponytail."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10431_DESCRIPTION":"Independence from the gods. This is a story you have heard a few times before. However
column2: you must press forward for Tilith's sake."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10432_DESCRIPTION":"There are pieces of machinery scattered all over the place. They are piled up so high that you fear they make come crashing down."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10433_DESCRIPTION":"Could these metal scraps have been part of a failed experiment to revive otherworldly techniques? In that case
column2: this place could be a treasure trove."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10434_DESCRIPTION":"A thunderous roar makes the metal scraps come crashing down. This beast's underground cry resonates in the air. A powerful enemy must await ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1043_DESCRIPTION":"The rocky stretch under took some getting used to. But now that you have your feet planted
column2: it's the perfect fighting ground."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104400_DESCRIPTION":"A mysterious swordsman has been roaming the Valhalla Plains. Some say he came from another world
column2: and that he uses unique skills never seen before."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104401_DESCRIPTION":"A mysterious swordsman has been frequenting the Valhalla Plains. He is said to shock his foes not only with his skills
column2: but also with his decorum."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104402_DESCRIPTION":"The enigmatic swordsman wandering the Valhalla Plains is said to be in search of the evil people who attacked his home and killed his parents."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10440_DESCRIPTION":"A bright light shines over the great metropolis. Its size and structure rival those of Randall. However
column2: oddly enough
column3: no one seems to live here. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104410_DESCRIPTION":"A mysterious swordsman has been roaming the Valhalla Plains. Some say he came from another world
column2: and that he uses unique skills never seen before."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10441_DESCRIPTION":"Could developed metropolises such as this one exist in other worlds? Perhaps Randall will come to resemble it someday ."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10442_DESCRIPTION":"Could the demon ruling this land be an entirely different being? So far it doesn't seem interested in a fight."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10443_DESCRIPTION":"Though you're wondering why the demon of this land has not sought you out
column2: don't forget that a certain persistent demon may come seeking a fight."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10444_DESCRIPTION":"There is a great disc shining from above. It looks like it's at the top of a tower. However
column2: there's something odd about it..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1044_DESCRIPTION":"At this time of day
column2: you must pay attention to your position in battle. When your enemies stand between you and the sun
column3: their movements are hard to read."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104500_DESCRIPTION":"A young lady was seen in an otherworldly research facility. She has dubbed herself the Lord of Spirits
column2: and seeks to protect both humans and spirits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104501_DESCRIPTION":"A young lady was spotted in an otherworldly research facility. Not only is she skilled with the sword
column2: but apparently she can also manipulate spirits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_104502_DESCRIPTION":"The young lady seen at the otherworldly research facility is said to be a formidable warrior and sorceress. However
column2: she dreads any loss of life."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10450_DESCRIPTION":"You descend into a gloomy underground road completely different from the world above. The walls and floor are dirty
column2: and even the air feels polluted."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10451_DESCRIPTION":"The world above was magnificent
column2: but the world below leaves much to be desired. Why would demons come all the way down here looking for shelter?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10452_DESCRIPTION":"You can't help but wonder how people would be able to live underground in this place if it were truly a possibility."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10453_DESCRIPTION":"Underneath the city of light there is a place the light cannot touch. Even if technology fixed this in the future
column2: society wouldn't probably allow it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10454_DESCRIPTION":"There seems to be an even deeper darkness lurking ahead. Walking this underground city makes you feel like you've fallen into the underworld."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1045_DESCRIPTION":"You avoided the god of destruction
column2: but now you must face the warrior with eight blades on her back. This is a crucial stage--your enemies have no plans to rest."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10460_DESCRIPTION":"It turns out Mordlim was just like the demons before it--an enemy of humanity. What Mora said still has you worried
column2: but you must defeat this demon."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10461_DESCRIPTION":"Not only can this device control the weather
column2: but it can also cause disasters automatically. Such dangerous technology must be used with caution."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10462_DESCRIPTION":"Perhaps if Elgaia had the power this tower possesses
column2: there wouldn't be a need for humanity to fight the demons."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10463_DESCRIPTION":"The more you think about it
column2: the more Mordlim's plans sound terrifying. How would've things played out if you hadn't done anything about it?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10464_DESCRIPTION":"You can feel that the demon has a powerful foes awaiting you. A great foe climbs its way to the top
column2: while another descends from above. This is it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10465_DESCRIPTION":"Unbeknownst to anyone
column2: Mordlim had continued with her sinister plans. If you don't stop her now
column3: the future of humankind could be lost forever!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10470_DESCRIPTION":"There is a secret sky garden behind the botanical garden. You're pretty sure you will encounter the demon Mordlim there
column2: though she's been defeated."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10500_DESCRIPTION":"Having passed through lava belts all across the land
column2: you should be used to places like this. Avoid taking risks
column3: and watch your step."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10501_DESCRIPTION":"It seems the demon that rules this land has hair a color unlike any you have seen thus far. You could say it's very demonic
column2: or not demonic at all."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10502_DESCRIPTION":"The air here pulses with the heat. It is so intense that your sweat evaporates in an instant. Stay hydrated
column2: and always be prepared for combat."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10503_DESCRIPTION":"The enemies you face at every turn here are quite strong. However
column2: you have built up ample power to defeat them. Move ahead boldly!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10504_DESCRIPTION":"An incandescent wind blows by. The lava road seems to have an exit ahead
column2: where the heat is most intense. A formidable foe most likely awaits you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1050_DESCRIPTION":"These ruins were once the capital of Agni
column2: known as Mirvana. Exposed to the worst of warfare
column3: the city still bears its scars."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10510_DESCRIPTION":"Mora continues to use you. It might be time to start thinking about what she aims to achieve with all her plotting."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10511_DESCRIPTION":"A metallic scent unlike the rusted iron smell of the red sea tickles your nose. It seems that Elgaian common sense doesn't apply to Ishgria."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10512_DESCRIPTION":"Mora said that it was impossible to comprehend Amu Yunos's thinking
column2: but you have a feeling that the same is true of her and Shusui."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10513_DESCRIPTION":"Suddenly
column2: you can smell the salty breeze from a familiar sea. You should assume that this kind of change indicates a strong enemy is on its way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10514_DESCRIPTION":"You can see a dense forest ahead of you. It seems you will need to pass through it to reach the tower. Proceed down this beach just a little further."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1051_DESCRIPTION":"At time there are cracks in the darkness that appear to bones. Your ears pick up on what sounds like the woeful cries of long dead soldiers."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105200_DESCRIPTION":"In a meadow in another world
column2: the Summoner runs into a young woman who is looking for someone. Suddenly
column3: however
column4: a person identical to her attacks."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105201_DESCRIPTION":"The young woman claims to have lost her memory. The only things she seems to remember clearly are her abilities in battle
column2: and her intended purpose."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105202_DESCRIPTION":"The two identical women draw their swords at each other. Their mission: to destroy copies of themselves according to the Culling code of their world."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10520_DESCRIPTION":"It's good you were able to ask Karl's opinion. Even if your objectives are different
column2: Karl wants to help Tilith just as much as you do."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10521_DESCRIPTION":"As you head to the ruins that the forest has enveloped
column2: you catch unsettling glimpses of what seems to be a giant through the trees."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10522_DESCRIPTION":"The ancient cobblestones are so overgrown with moss that they are hardly recognizable. This seems like a nice place for a walk
column2: a rarity in Ishgria."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10523_DESCRIPTION":"The trees around you began to rustle. A wind is blowing past
column2: deeper into the forest. It seems someone is inviting you in. Be prepared for battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10524_DESCRIPTION":"When you think about it
column2: you haven't seen Shusui for a while. Could he have given up? If so
column3: you shouldn't need to worry about him
column4: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1052_DESCRIPTION":"The festering miasma in this town is not simply the remnants of warfare. You are certain that forbidden curses were used in these parts."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10530_DESCRIPTION":"The sky is filled with black clouds that flash with never-ending lightning. All there is to see around you is an expanse of barren earth."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10531_DESCRIPTION":"Since you have a good view and allies with you
column2: you can focus on enemies approaching from ahead. But watch your back just in case."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10532_DESCRIPTION":"Lightning flashes
column2: illuminating the sky. You hear an earsplitting roar and a suspicious shadow passes high above. It seems you have airborne enemies."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10533_DESCRIPTION":"You heard a cliff collapsing over the thunder. Something large is approaching
column2: shaking the earth as it does. You won't get away without fighting."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10534_DESCRIPTION":"You made your way close to the castle. Now you need to climb a trail up the cliffs
column2: but you'll have to fight difficult foes here as well."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1053_DESCRIPTION":"Judging by the dismal state of the town
column2: the people kept fighting even after the surrounding walls were destroyed. Their determination is to be respected."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10540_DESCRIPTION":"You have learned what the Akras Summoners' Hall was truly after. And you think it might tie into saving Tilith. There's no room for hesitation now."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10541_DESCRIPTION":"This castle seems to be quite old
column2: but it doesn't look weathered at all. Actually
column3: it seems in excellent condition. Is someone maintaining it?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10542_DESCRIPTION":"Despite its formidable exterior
column2: inside the castle is refined and sophisticated. It's said that Amu Yunos has always ruled this land
column3: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10543_DESCRIPTION":"From this high up in the castle
column2: you are able to see the giant's face directly. Once again
column3: you are amazed at its unimaginable size."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10544_DESCRIPTION":"It seems there's a passage that extends from the castle to the neighboring mountains
column2: offering an exit. But it also appears to lead toward the giant."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1054_DESCRIPTION":"Something unusual stands before you amidst the rubble. Made of metal
column2: it appears to be a summoned hero. Proceed slowly."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10550_DESCRIPTION":"You sensed something from Mora that wasn't there before; something like confusion. You feel like you understand Seria's concern a little better."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10551_DESCRIPTION":"You sense an almost-familiar presence. It could be that Shusui has caught up with you. Time to hurry."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10552_DESCRIPTION":"The great giant's remains seem to be holding their form without decaying or breaking down. Is this the power of Amu Yunos at work?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10553_DESCRIPTION":"Even while untouched by decay
column2: the giant's corpse somehow makes you starkly aware of death. Are you over-thinking things?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10554_DESCRIPTION":"You have reached the giant's feet. You should be able to walk to Amu Yunos's tower from here. You must be prepared for anything."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1055_DESCRIPTION":"The smell of blood coming from near the gate opposite to the one you entered fills your nostrils. The tower is clos
column2: but so is a very powerful enemy force."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10560_DESCRIPTION":"You never dreamed that a demon would call you chaotic. Maybe you should be more aware of the things you've done so far."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10561_DESCRIPTION":"You defeated the Four Fallen Gods and Lucius
column2: and now demons fall before you wherever you go. Will you also take out Karna Masta in the future?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10562_DESCRIPTION":"Mora said that eight of them sealed Karna Masta
column2: which means there are two other demons besides Amu Yunos."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10563_DESCRIPTION":"You need to defeat the demons to save Tilith. But if you do that
column2: the seal on Karna Masta will break..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10564_DESCRIPTION":"Before you knew it
column2: the top floor was but a few steps away. It's dangerous to fight while distracted. Make sure to keep yourself together."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10565_DESCRIPTION":"Amu Yunos is a demon you must face to save Tilith. That's all the reason you need to fight. Prepare for battle."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10566_DESCRIPTION":"For some reason
column2: you have to face Owen now. If you refuse
column3: Owen will probably flatten you anyway. So your only choice is to take him head on!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10570_DESCRIPTION":"When you step into the glistening crystal cave
column2: it seems there is a demon deep within. Amu Yunos's Shadow likely awaits you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10571_DESCRIPTION":"You sense serenity in Mirfah's expression
column2: unlike before. Sometimes
column3: fighting just to see who's strongest feels good."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105800_DESCRIPTION":"As you become lost in a strange forest
column2: eerie silence surrounds you. The moment you hear a noise in the bushes
column3: a girl jumps straight at you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105801_DESCRIPTION":"The girl resembles a wildcat and her movements are incredibly fast. The minute she sees an opening
column2: she may just trick you by sneaking in from behind."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105802_DESCRIPTION":"She is half-human
column2: half Sea Breeze Tribe. The reason why her pranks don't stop even in the heat of battle
column3: is because she's found beloved friends."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105900_DESCRIPTION":"As you come across a beautiful castle
column2: an intimidating air overcomes you. Before you awaits the warrioress dubbed the \"Holy Knight of Glamour.\""

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105901_DESCRIPTION":"The gallant and dazzling knight seems to grow even brighter with each battle. Her mere presence encourages her men
column2: who also come after you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_105902_DESCRIPTION":"The knight smiles without a hint of hesitation. Proud of her soldiers
column2: who gave their all in battle
column3: she attacks one last time seeking victory."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10600_DESCRIPTION":"An individual with the head of a dragon suddenly attacks. He identifies himself as a follower of the land's demon ruler
column2: and you must fight back."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10601_DESCRIPTION":"Disciple Liomerg addressed Karl respectfully. It seems that the demon in Karl's bloodline is the ruler of this land."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10602_DESCRIPTION":"The flames form first a firestorm
column2: then spin into towering fire whirls. Who knows what happens if you get close to them. Be careful as you advance!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10603_DESCRIPTION":"It might be your imagination
column2: but it seems like the enemies here are much more self-aware than any before
column3: and that their attacks are more strategic."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10604_DESCRIPTION":"You're almost clear of the land of burning winds. Your clothes smell a bit charred. You've got to hurry ahead before they catch fire."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1060_DESCRIPTION":"You finally reach the tower atop the cape. Head for its top for your showdown against Zevalhua. Defeat the Fallen God so you can save Grahdens!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10610_DESCRIPTION":"Karl seems dead set on fighting no matter what. You're not done trying to talk him down yet
column2: but you may need to face him in combat."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10611_DESCRIPTION":"You feel you need to defeat Karna Masta. If you don't
column2: humanity will forever live in fear of the god's resurrection."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10612_DESCRIPTION":"You really want to believe in Karl. Despite this
column2: you don't think the demon menace will go away even if Ishgria is unified."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10613_DESCRIPTION":"Even if Karna Masta weren't a threat
column2: you would need to eliminate the demon threat in order to free Tilith."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10614_DESCRIPTION":"Regardless of whatever the demon Barion thought
column2: you can't be sure without actually meeting it. Time to get moving."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1061_DESCRIPTION":"Sunlight pours into the tower
column2: as if cheering you on. But you must have no time for such thoughts and must head upward toward your enemy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10620_DESCRIPTION":"A beautiful view of the continent extends before you. Compared to some other places
column2: it's actually quite scenic."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10621_DESCRIPTION":"Circle around a cliff
column2: climb a slope
column3: look for a path
column4: and climb back down
column5: again and again. But you caught sight of something like a waterfall ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10622_DESCRIPTION":"On cresting a particularly high hill
column2: you realized that the waterfall was actually a structure damming the river. You will need to get through it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10623_DESCRIPTION":"Suddenly
column2: you remember Mora's words. You can't imagine her becoming an ally
column3: but if possible
column4: you'd rather not have her as an enemy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10624_DESCRIPTION":"You can faintly hear what seems to be rushing water. That dam-like structure must be close. The enemies are fighting harder
column2: as well."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1062_DESCRIPTION":"A hero from another world is waiting for you on this floor. Though it will not be an easy fight
column2: it should be a fair one since you made it this far. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10630_DESCRIPTION":"There's nothing you can say to Paris in her distress. You just have to believe she'll find an answer for herself."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10631_DESCRIPTION":"Apparently
column2: this massive dam also functions as a fortress. The interior is maze-like
column3: and it won't be easy to get through."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10632_DESCRIPTION":"Formidable foes lie in wait at key points. As you fight an unpleasant thought crosses your mind
column2: and you wonder if Karl sent them there."
