column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10633_DESCRIPTION":"You have gotten lost in the fortress. You need to focus on moving ahead after all
column2: without getting distracted by pointless questions."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10634_DESCRIPTION":"You arrived at the fortress's dam control room. According to the map found in the room
column2: you should be able to get out from here."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1063_DESCRIPTION":"As you climb up the stairs
column2: you see a tremendous enemy blocking the sunlight. Make the heroes before you proud and trounce this ten-winged tormentor!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10640_DESCRIPTION":"It seems that Karl wasn't able to fully awaken the demonic power within himself. Perhaps he still has some doubts..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10641_DESCRIPTION":"If Karl is still uncertain
column2: you know what you need to do. Eliminate the threats of the demons and Karna Masta
column3: and save Tilith."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10642_DESCRIPTION":"You leave the plaza and find yourself on the main street. Across the bridge ahead is the gate to the outskirts of town. Liomerg is probably there."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10643_DESCRIPTION":"Apparently
column2: formidable foes await you on the bridge. You want to conserve your strength before fighting Liomerg
column3: but that may be impossible."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10644_DESCRIPTION":"Liomerg stands before the gate. You don't see Karl
column2: but he's probably watching. You can't embarrass yourself now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1064_DESCRIPTION":"You have never felt air this thick with tension and signs of enemies nearby. Prepare yourself
column2: for the next battle may be your last."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106500_DESCRIPTION":"An Elgaian martial artist who served during the foundation of Akras Summoners' Hall. Even in death
column2: his soul seeks worthy opponents to battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106501_DESCRIPTION":"The martial artist only ever truly felt alive during a battle. He still longs to feel the thrill of a duel with another demon."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10650_DESCRIPTION":"This isn't your first fight with Lugina. But he says he'll show you a new power he had kept hidden
column2: so this won't go like the last time."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10651_DESCRIPTION":"You're advancing across a gigantic spider's web. The thick threads are stable
column2: but watch your step. Especially since you're up against Lugina."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10652_DESCRIPTION":"Lose your footing and you'll fall into the depths. It seems like there's water down there
column2: but this is Ishgria. You won't come out unscathed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10653_DESCRIPTION":"Lugina's fighting spirit... That feeling you get when you face a formidable foe... You need to get serious
column2: before Lugina summons his true strength."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10654_DESCRIPTION":"You see Lugina laughing as though he's invincible. He has the advantage no matter where you approach from. Be careful
column2: and give it your all!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1065_DESCRIPTION":"Everybody knows of the hero from Agni clad in flames. His reputation precedes him
column2: like the sinister air that fills the passageway in front of you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106600_DESCRIPTION":"Long ago
column2: the Elgaia Federation formed a secret Ishgria Expeditionary Force with convicts. What sort of officer could lead this unlikely team?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106601_DESCRIPTION":"Betrayed by the Federation and abandoned in a demon-ravaged land
column2: the souls of the Ishgria Expeditionary Force wander even now..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10660_DESCRIPTION":"As expected
column2: it's difficult to talk with demons. But they might be more cooperative if you demonstrate your power?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10661_DESCRIPTION":"You head for the summit
column2: defeating one enemy after another. You start to wonder if demons are only capable of understanding others through combat."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10662_DESCRIPTION":"You approach the midpoint of the mountain trail. Ahead
column2: at the peak
column3: you can sense a presence so powerful it stifles your spirit. Is it a dragon?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10663_DESCRIPTION":"A gate capable of moving Karna Masta
column2: seal and all... But you're worried that a power on that level just might break the seal."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10664_DESCRIPTION":"You see Liomerg on the final incline before the peak. This is probably the end of the line. Get ready for a decisive battle!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10665_DESCRIPTION":"Only the demon Barion remains. If you can't win here
column2: it would be foolish to face Karna Masta. It's time to show your power!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1066_DESCRIPTION":"You have made it to the top of the tower after defeating the burning hero. But now you must do what the gods couldn't and defeat the Fallen God Zevalhua!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106700_DESCRIPTION":"A brilliant Federation researcher obsessed with otherworldly technology. Could it be the master's own mad spirit that inhabits his precious automaton?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106701_DESCRIPTION":"It's said that his beloved automaton was further augmented to battle against demons. Its crazed spirit still seeks new targets to destroy."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10670_DESCRIPTION":"You have to face the demon Kalon's Shadow alongside Lugina. The true seal on Karna Masta should break soon as well. The time to fight draws near."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10671_DESCRIPTION":"It's been a long time since you fought with Paris. She wants to fight to overcome her doubts. With that in mind
column2: you want to give your all."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106800_DESCRIPTION":"A tribe of tenacious hunters once lived on Elgaia's frontier. When tragedy struck
column2: only one lived on to avenge their catastrophic downfall."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106801_DESCRIPTION":"After taking revenge
column2: the lone hunter wanted no more than to return to his people's traditions of living and dying by the hunt of powerful fiends."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106900_DESCRIPTION":"This Elgaian priestess was a devout believer of the Sealed God Lucius. In her mind
column2: justice was found only in the teachings of her infallible god."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_106901_DESCRIPTION":"Betrayed
column2: only one purpose remained to her: \"Destroy the enemies of our god.\" Even in death
column3: could her spirit ever find peace?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107000_DESCRIPTION":"A spy from the Randall Empire had infiltrated the Elgaia Federation. He fought alone to discover the truth behind the Ishgria Expedition."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107001_DESCRIPTION":"With no way to return home
column2: he continued his investigation. Even now
column3: his soul seeks a path home
column4: to give his final report."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10700_DESCRIPTION":"Mora states her goal is to unify the world and end all conflict. But she is a demon
column2: too. For that reason alone she won't avoid friction."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10701_DESCRIPTION":"Mora didn't come out and say it
column2: but she wants help. Even so
column3: everyone is resolved. They can't accede to her ambitions."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10702_DESCRIPTION":"It seems this facility pumps up oil from beneath the sea floor. A lot of devices made with otherworldly technologies use this oil."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10703_DESCRIPTION":"Some of the oil that is pumped up is burned to remove impurities. That is why this facility belches forth flames endlessly."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10704_DESCRIPTION":"Clouds of black
column2: poisonous smoke stand in your way. You want to hurry ahead to the snowy plains after Mora
column3: but the enemies in your way come first."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107100_DESCRIPTION":"You've crossed the Vortex gate and find yourself in a luxurious room. You proceed with caution
column2: though you seem to always end up in the same place..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107101_DESCRIPTION":"You keep wandering inside the lavish palace. Its internal structure seems improbable
column2: and you begin noticing that you can't really move forth."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107102_DESCRIPTION":"Walking around the extravagant palace
column2: you come across a terrible presence in its depths. Chills run through you as a giant door stands before you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10710_DESCRIPTION":"Your allies seem alright. Rescue can wait; focus on fighting Mora. Your fate was to face her. Hopefully this will be the last time for it
column2: though."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10711_DESCRIPTION":"You must assemble demonic powers to face Karna Masta. That means that if Mora wasn't lying
column2: you'll need her help."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10712_DESCRIPTION":"A raging wind chills you to the bone
column2: and drowns out the sound of your footsteps. All you can see is white
column3: and you still have a long way to go."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10713_DESCRIPTION":"You can barely keep to the path due to the blizzard. But you won't lose sight of your goal. Advance without wavering
column2: so you can rescue Tilith."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10714_DESCRIPTION":"All you can do is focus on advancing as you push through deep snowdrifts. Suddenly a fierce wind springs up
column2: and the blizzard intensifies."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107200_DESCRIPTION":"You take in the strange scenery before you. Overwhelmed by the divine atmosphere of the place
column2: you watch as a so-called angel begins his descent."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107201_DESCRIPTION":"While enjoying the magnificent atmosphere of the place
column2: you see countless angels floating above you. Their beautiful formation moves you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107202_DESCRIPTION":"The otherworldly beings in the room are immersed in keeping their order
column2: which makes you want to do the same. Make sure not to lose yourself as well."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10720_DESCRIPTION":"You were finally released from the blizzard's abuse thanks to your arrival in the frozen woods. But the cold is unchanged
column2: and your hands are numb."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10721_DESCRIPTION":"It feels as though time itself has frozen in the silence of these woods. You let out a deep sigh
column2: and continue to advance steadily."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10722_DESCRIPTION":"Snow falls through the gaps between trees. Sometimes
column2: a clump falls from the branches noisily
column3: startling you by sounding like an enemy's approach."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10723_DESCRIPTION":"The white snow and dark trees deceive your eyes. Deep snowdrifts entangle your legs. Protracted fighting here is harder than you imagined."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10724_DESCRIPTION":"The trees have thinned out. You are almost out of the woods
column2: and you miss warmer lands. Hopefully somewhere more sheltered is coming up next."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107300_DESCRIPTION":"You stand before a temple of curious design. Not only is its appearance overbearing
column2: but it also exudes an intense air of benevolence."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107301_DESCRIPTION":"Inside the temple
column2: a multitude of candles flicker in the darkness. You proceed with extreme caution atop the red carpet sprawled on the floor."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107302_DESCRIPTION":"You hear haunting voices chanting from afar. Their amalgamation strikes a cord deep within you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10730_DESCRIPTION":"There is a gate of appropriate size for the immense valley it blocks off built across the precipice. It seems to be mechanical."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10731_DESCRIPTION":"A single path extends toward the mechanical gate. It seems you will have to fight Shusui here after all. Prepare yourself."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10732_DESCRIPTION":"There's something weird and mechanical on the path. Could it be a device for transferring power generated at the oil well?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10733_DESCRIPTION":"While it's better than the plains or the woods
column2: it's still cold here. It's so cold that you're almost eager to fight with Shusui already."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10734_DESCRIPTION":"Is Shusui covered in wounds from his battle with Owen? Or was it one of Mora's traps? Either way
column2: you can't hold back against him."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10740_DESCRIPTION":"You are finally free of the cold. Truthfully
column2: it's cold here too
column3: but still so much warmer than you have been for a while. You feel alive again."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10741_DESCRIPTION":"You're inside a cave
column2: but its walls of transparent ice let the outside light shine in. It reflects off every surface
column3: eliminating all shadows."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10742_DESCRIPTION":"Sound reverberates in the cave just as light reflects. Your footsteps echo many times over
column2: and it sounds almost like you're leading a small army."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10743_DESCRIPTION":"You emerged into a spacious cavern. The refracted light is concentrated here
column2: and some of the ice is melted. It's also a bit warm
column3: thankfully."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10744_DESCRIPTION":"Your eyes are growing tired
column2: possibly because of the shining cave. They're also dry
column3: and your vision is blurry. Getting attacked now would be risky."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107500_DESCRIPTION":"A Quest designed by Mr. Just Nojima
column2: head of Famitsu App's Brave Frontier. Knowing his usual gimmicks is the key to clearing this dungeon!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107501_DESCRIPTION":"A challenging Quest designed by Mr. Misasagi
column2: a legitimate Brave Frontier player. Could an experienced player make for a good developer as well?!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107502_DESCRIPTION":"A mystical hidden Quest to celebrate our 3rd Anniversary. It is rumored that only the bravest of Summoners are able to clear it..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10750_DESCRIPTION":"Lugina said Karl's kindness was weakness. So what is strength? In all its grandeur
column2: nature gives no answer."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10751_DESCRIPTION":"A vicious
column2: howling wind rolls over the side of the cliffs. Your body is stripped of all the warmth it accumulated within the cave in an instant."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10752_DESCRIPTION":"You climb the path that juts out from the ice wall. At each crossroads you come across you must choose the safest-looking one from many options."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10753_DESCRIPTION":"You should arrive at the castle where Mora awaits once you make it up this cliff. Looking up or down is terrifying
column2: but you just have to keep going."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10754_DESCRIPTION":"You've gotten close to the top. If you lose your footing here you're finished
column2: yet your enemies fight without concern for the location. Be careful."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107600_DESCRIPTION":"You can see the great Royal Capital before you after crossing the gate. As you approach it with care
column2: a huge arena catches your eye."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107601_DESCRIPTION":"A blonde young man awaits in the otherworldly arena of the Royal Capital smiling fearlessly as he unsheathes his blade. Challenges seem to please him."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107602_DESCRIPTION":"The many marks around the arena suggest men and beasts have fought here before. How many battles to the death has this place seen on a regular basis?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10760_DESCRIPTION":"You proceed down the path that Lugina and Seria cleared as they went ahead. But then enemies appeared
column2: as though they were waiting. It's an ambush."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10761_DESCRIPTION":"This former stronghold of a demon leader is as elegant and impressive as you would expect. Even long years later
column2: that hasn't changed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10762_DESCRIPTION":"It's said that the demons fell into an era of chaotic war after their leader left. It would appear this castle's purpose was lost afterwards
column2: as well."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10763_DESCRIPTION":"The two Summoners of Old are here
column2: as are Bertz and Liomerg. The key will probably be whoever finds Mora first."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10764_DESCRIPTION":"Apparently
column2: this castle's original master had un-demonly dreams of eliminating conflict. Mora said she was taking up that quest
column3: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107650_DESCRIPTION":"You see a great arena before you past the gate to another world. A young man with flowing long black hair awaits with sword in hand."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107651_DESCRIPTION":"Amidst all the commotion in this new world
column2: you meet a young man with black hair that excels in swordsmanship. There is nowhere to run now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107652_DESCRIPTION":"The deep claw marks and gashes left upon the structure of the arena are a testament of the vicious battles that continuously take place here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10765_DESCRIPTION":"Alongside Seria
column2: you challenge Mora. Having absorbed the other demons
column3: Mora is much stronger than ever before. Don't hold back!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10766_DESCRIPTION":"Postpone your happiness for reuniting with Tilith and defeat Mora! Now is your chance
column2: while her power is out of control!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107700_DESCRIPTION":"Swallowed by the vortex
column2: the Summoner lands in a wasteland world. A Suddenly
column3: a swarm of outlaws begin surrounding the area... "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107701_DESCRIPTION":"One man stands among the swarm exuding an air of wildness
column2: and roaring loudly. \"The 300
column3: 000 World Dollars on your head...they're mine.\" "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107702_DESCRIPTION":"\"Tsch
column2: looks like I've been played\" he said
column3: as if he'd been fooled by someone. \"Don't worry
column4: I'll pay every hit of yours back with some of my own.\""

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10770_DESCRIPTION":"Face Seria's feelings
column2: and give this battle your all. It will help your friend find her own path."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10771_DESCRIPTION":"Barion shows his true power and form. Face him alongside Karl
column2: whose demonic powers have awakened! The answer Karl seeks must lie ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107800_DESCRIPTION":"Beyond the Vortex lay a luxurious court. Knights rush forward to kill the Summoner
column2: as the punishment is death for those who dare attempt regicide. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107801_DESCRIPTION":"The young king appears with a sword covered in lightning. He says \"It is the sword that asks what lies within a warrior's breast
column2: \" and a fight erupts."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107802_DESCRIPTION":"There are things that can only be told through a duel to the death. One's position
column2: one's feelings. And thus
column3: their swords clashed in \"danger time.\""

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107900_DESCRIPTION":"A celebration full of heroes from all over the world that's just begun! As they talk amongst themselves
column2: could they be sending us a message too...?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_107901_DESCRIPTION":"A celebration full of heroes from all over the world that's just begun! As they talk amongst themselves
column2: could they be sending us a message too...?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10800_DESCRIPTION":"It seems Kalon knows who lies ahead. But no matter what foe awaits
column2: you must defeat the Holy Emperor with Tilith."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10801_DESCRIPTION":"The blazing gate opens
column2: scorching the very air. Under cover of billowing smoke
column3: countless enemies have poured forth. Don't let them slow you down."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10802_DESCRIPTION":"Hellish flames roar all around. You must conserve your strength as you dispatch the approaching foes. The path looks longer than anticipated."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10803_DESCRIPTION":"As you clear the gate
column2: the heat fades
column3: but the onslaught intensifies. Behind you
column4: enemy reinforcements leap down from above the gate."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10804_DESCRIPTION":"Enemy resistance has subsided. One last group blocks your way. Dispatch them
column2: and you can finally escape the influence of the Eight Sealed Gods' Gate."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10810_DESCRIPTION":"Boiling water gushes from deep within the earth
column2: and falls on you like scalding rain. But you must focus on the enemies at hand."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10811_DESCRIPTION":"As Lugina suggests
column2: the lack of resistance so far is perplexing. You should seize the chance to press forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10812_DESCRIPTION":"The craggy ground is slick with mud
column2: and dotted with sinkholes connected by fierce streams. This footing is every soldier's worst nightmare."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10813_DESCRIPTION":"Rock crumbles underfoot
column2: unleashing a jet of scalding water and nearly sending you sprawling. The slightest misstep could cost your life."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10814_DESCRIPTION":"The expanse of countless hazardous geysers finally nears its end. An ominous feeling grows
column2: as you realize it won't continue to be this easy..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10820_DESCRIPTION":"The end of summoning arts? With the final battle impending
column2: you have no time to consider the ramifications. But
column3: it remains at the back of your mind."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10821_DESCRIPTION":"All around you lie mercilessly crushed ruins
column2: now covered with young forest. The foreboding silence tempts the mind to wander."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10822_DESCRIPTION":"Moment by moment
column2: the final battle draws near. How can you hope to overcome the might of the Holy Emperor
column3: who overshadowed even the Summoners of Old?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10823_DESCRIPTION":"Amidst the deep green
column2: you exhale deeply. At your side are Tilith and your companions. Lament will only sap your resolve. It's time to move on."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10824_DESCRIPTION":"Bertz's words seep into your heart like poison. But if you can't shake off something like this
column2: you'll never stand a chance against the Holy Emperor."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10830_DESCRIPTION":"The demon Kalon has watched over the seals of many lands. This must be a trial to gauge your worthiness. Show your strength!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10831_DESCRIPTION":"Karna Masta defeated even the Summoners of Old
column2: but with the Oracle Maiden's power
column3: you can challenge him. You must hold on to even the faintest hope."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10832_DESCRIPTION":"This place has been so utterly ravaged that its original purpose is a mystery. Such is the power of the Holy Emperor..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10833_DESCRIPTION":"The broken ground makes for treacherous footing
column2: but just brushing the surroundings with your hand could blast you with electricity. Be cautious."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10834_DESCRIPTION":"Some of the surrounding wreckage is relatively intact. You marvel at the unfamiliar materials and workmanship. Could these be otherworldly relics?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10840_DESCRIPTION":"Ark will attack with everything he has. Remain steadfast as you face him
column2: and convince him to aid your cause."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10841_DESCRIPTION":"You have never seen such a peaceful expression as on Ark's face. You silently gaze upon the gentle
column2: yet sad countenance."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10842_DESCRIPTION":"You have at last reached the heart of the brilliantly shining structure. This area is also heavily damaged
column2: leaving you to wonder what it once was."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10843_DESCRIPTION":"This must have once been a very important location. Some massive power lingers here
column2: throwing off dazzling flashes of light."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10844_DESCRIPTION":"As your eyes adjust to the light
column2: you find your way outside the structure. The sudden plunge into blackness leaves you disoriented and vulnerable."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10850_DESCRIPTION":"You emerge in a place defying description. It must be the ruins of a city...but nothing makes sense. So this is how this other world looks."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10851_DESCRIPTION":"Cutting through a maze of alleys
column2: you find yourself indoors
column3: then underground. You wonder how the inhabitants avoided losing their way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10852_DESCRIPTION":"The cities filled with otherworldly technology you have seen before were filled with light
column2: but this place becomes darker with each step."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10853_DESCRIPTION":"Lights flicker here and there
column2: but only make it more difficult to peer into the shadows. Before your eyes can adjust
column3: you press on ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10854_DESCRIPTION":"On the outskirts of town
column2: you feel a familiar air of destitution and desperation. You suppose the bad areas are not much different in any world."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10860_DESCRIPTION":"You have finally reached the place where the Holy Emperor Karna Masta was sealed. Make haste to find Ilia's power for the remaining Summoners of Old."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10861_DESCRIPTION":"Parting the thick mist
column2: you search for any sign of Ilia. You feel the overpowering aura of a mighty god
column3: but can find no trace of the Oracle Maiden."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10862_DESCRIPTION":"You must buy time while Ark awakens Ilia's power. You may be in over your head...but you know you can count on your companions."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10863_DESCRIPTION":"Were it not for the timely arrival of your companions
column2: all would be lost. But now you must regain your strength. Believe in your friends."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10864_DESCRIPTION":"Ilia and Tilith have merged their powers
column2: opening a route to strike down Karna Masta. The Summoner pours everything they have into the final battle!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10870_DESCRIPTION":"The Holy Emperor's physical form has been annihilated. However
column2: two seals remain. As the Summoner searches for the secret
column3: who should appear but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10900_DESCRIPTION":"The Summoners arrive in Mildran
column2: where Karna Masta's soul is imprisoned. Who could be waiting for them in these lands?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10901_DESCRIPTION":"Mildran
column2: the former home of great royalty. The ruins still visible in the thin fog remind you of those long-gone days of luxury."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10902_DESCRIPTION":"There are those who came to this place of their own will
column2: to face the past. But the \"Rejecting Seal\" gives them second thoughts."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10910_DESCRIPTION":"Amidst the falling ash
column2: you eventually reach something like a town center. Many months and years of history lay in ruins all around you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10911_DESCRIPTION":"Wordlessly you progress through the lonely scene. What areas of this capital would most interest Paris if she were here?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10912_DESCRIPTION":"As you progress through the capital
column2: Ark's demeanor seems to grow more serious. Perhaps he senses something waiting ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10920_DESCRIPTION":"Waiting in the floating castle was a black mass of residual energy and the wandering souls of heroes. Ark steps forward alone for this fated battle!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10921_DESCRIPTION":"Ark has reconfirmed his strength after defeating the Six Heroes. Along with the Summoner
column2: he moves forward towards his goal anew."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10930_DESCRIPTION":"The story of a hero toyed with by the gods to bring back a loved one. In the end will he find hope
column2: or despair...?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10970_DESCRIPTION":"With Karna Masta totally defeated
column2: Ark is free to be with Ilia
column3: now released from her seal. Yet
column4: his worries haven't dissipated..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_10_DESCRIPTION":"Your journey as a Summoner traveling across Grand Gaia has begun! Go forth
column2: and don't forget what Tilith taught you!"

column2: though
column3: surely the fire wielding hero waits ahead."

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1102_DESCRIPTION":"Flames rise from the lava
column2: robbing you of the little oxygen which remains
column3: and the further you run ahead
column4: the more fiery heroes block your path."

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_110480_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_110490_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Elgifs once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1104_DESCRIPTION":"An overwhelming force stands in your way. Prepare yourself
column2: as it seems the last Fallen God has sent forth the legendary Disastrous Beast."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_110500_DESCRIPTION":"This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_110510_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_110520_DESCRIPTION":"You can only enter the Garden of Elgifs once a day. There you will find the legendary guardians protecting their precious tablets..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1110_DESCRIPTION":"Zurg... What could the last of the Fallen Gods be plotting. You can't help but wonder as you gaze upon the beautiful aquatic metropolis."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1111_DESCRIPTION":"You can see to the bottom of the beautifully flowing river. Remembering Zurg's words
column2: you search for a path to Vriksha."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1112_DESCRIPTION":"A gorgeous palace stands in the center of town. However
column2: the fountain in its courtyard stands frozen. Soon an ice wielding hero is upon you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1113_DESCRIPTION":"Leaving the palace alongside the river
column2: the surface of the water suddenly explodes. The water freezes above as bullets of ice are shot your way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1114_DESCRIPTION":"You can see a massive object blocking the exit from the Sea Capital. There's no mistake
column2: it's the legendary freezing weapon."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1120_DESCRIPTION":"This forest was once home to a prosperous city
column2: the ruins of which can be seen periodically through the undergrowth. What could've happened to it?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1121_DESCRIPTION":"Though the way has been spotted with ruins
column2: there are now none in sight. This area has likely been a simple forest since long ago."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1122_DESCRIPTION":"The heroes who block your path are the same ones who once opposed the gods. Now summoned by those same gods
column2: what could they be thinking?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1123_DESCRIPTION":"Though Lugina warned you not to overthink things
column2: you can't help but get lost in thought. Something just isn't right."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1124_DESCRIPTION":"You're nearly out of the forest
column2: but you must defeat the legendary guardian before you. Prepare yourself as you face off with the stone-like guardian."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1130_DESCRIPTION":"Just past the bridge is Alnakeid Castle. You must defeat the wicked presence there to proceed to Vriksha
column2: as far off as it may still be."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1131_DESCRIPTION":"Passing the castle walls
column2: you venture through a watch tower to find another wall. The roar of lightning around you holds the power of a massive army."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1132_DESCRIPTION":"Doubt grows within you. The Four Fallen Gods should have been fighting together. What difference is there in the disputes between gods and humans?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1133_DESCRIPTION":"There are now cracks to be found in the fortress walls. As unnecessary as it is
column2: the stronghold between the three capitals still serves its purpose."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1134_DESCRIPTION":"A fight awaits you at Danrard's final gate. You're greeted by an angel who once took to the sky in search of freedom."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1140_DESCRIPTION":"Though it now lies in ruins
column2: the town remains lit by a glass-sided
column3: gravestone-like tower. The scene is quite mysterious."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1141_DESCRIPTION":"Could scenes like this be commonplace in the otherworld? Also
column2: what happened to the god who was supposed to have destroyed this town?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1142_DESCRIPTION":"It seems the cave just outside the city could be your way to Alnakeid Castle. Surely
column2: incredibly powerful foes await you there."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1143_DESCRIPTION":"The lit path you walk suddenly opens up into a large plaza. You're awaited by a just swordsman and the roar of a dragon."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1144_DESCRIPTION":"You spot a white figure in front of the gate leading from the town. Is it the legendary Keeper of Order? All you can do is fight your way through."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1150_DESCRIPTION":"Tilith seems to be acting strange. On top of that
column2: even Paris isn't her normal cool self. What's going on?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1151_DESCRIPTION":"An oddly glowing crystal floats inside the darkened cave. Stare at it too long and you might find yourself under its spell."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1152_DESCRIPTION":"As the enemy's attack reaches a whole new level
column2: you sense a powerful force coming from deep inside the cave. Surely
column3: a strong foe awaits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1153_DESCRIPTION":"Exhausted by all the fighting
column2: you stop for a quick break. However
column3: upon moving forward a chill runs down your spine. Something wicked lies ahead..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1154_DESCRIPTION":"Feeling the wind
column2: you realize you might soon be out of the cave. But before proceeding
column3: you must first defeat a legendary demon."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1160_DESCRIPTION":"Entering the hall
column2: you're surrounded by enemies. You must defeat them before moving forward
column3: as exhausted as you may be."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1161_DESCRIPTION":"Leaving the hall
column2: you come across a pair of foes harvesting the powers of light and dark. Defeat the minions before taking on these two."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1162_DESCRIPTION":"You exit into a grand space decorated with swords. The countless scars that adorn the walls and pillars show the intense battle that took place here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1163_DESCRIPTION":"This seems to be the courtyard. It is lined with beautiful sculptures
column2: and the pond is filled with clean water. However
column3: enemies still lurk nearby."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1164_DESCRIPTION":"Entering once again inside
column2: your eyes spot a great fireplace glowing red. Nearby
column3: in the dimly lit room
column4: stands a chair made of leather."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1165_DESCRIPTION":"You exit onto the castle's roof. The god Zurg spoke of should be at the top of the tower ahead. However
column2: a hero of lightning blocks your way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1166_DESCRIPTION":"You've reached the spiral staircase inside the tower of the castle. It isn't tall
column2: but it's full of enemies
column3: the strongest awaiting you at the end."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_11_DESCRIPTION":"The calm grasslands keep on going.The monsters here are just right for a beginner.Keep moving forward."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1200_DESCRIPTION":"It seems that Zurg's words are still bothering Tilith. Keep moving forward to bring her spirits back up
column2: never looking back."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1201_DESCRIPTION":"Though the temperature is rising
column2: the morale of your party never wanes. Combine your powers and aim for the last Fallen God together."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1202_DESCRIPTION":"The cries of the drake echo through the mountains
column2: but this is no foe to fear now. Make your way through the scorching path ahead as fast as you can."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1203_DESCRIPTION":"As if answering to your fighting spirit
column2: strong warriors await ahead. Enveloped in wings of flames
column3: these two swordsmen are swelling with energy. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1204_DESCRIPTION":"A gigantic shadow blocks your path at the top of the mountain. It seems there is no way to pass through the volcano without a confrontation."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1210_DESCRIPTION":"It looks like something's on Tilith's mind. If everyone said they trust her
column2: then what could be wrong? It's a tad worrisome."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1211_DESCRIPTION":"Surprised by the sounds of footsteps
column2: they turn out to be only small crabs. Walking on the rocky area washed by the waves
column3: you feel like you'll slip."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1212_DESCRIPTION":"The sounds of waves mix with a voice in song. They sing the magical song of a water spirit. The enemy isn't strong
column2: but don't let it slow you down."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1213_DESCRIPTION":"You reach the sand after the rocky area. A hero with an ambition as great as the sea
column2: and another with a will of ice
column3: ambush you upon arrival."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1214_DESCRIPTION":"The cliff in the distance you were headed towards begins to move. It was actually your enemy
column2: and you have no choice but to defeat it to move forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1220_DESCRIPTION":"What could be the truth Zurg keeps mentioning? Regardless of how reliable his testimony may be
column2: it still gets the imagination going."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1221_DESCRIPTION":"The forest capital of Vriksha. Seeing how much it truly differs from the Vriksha of yore
column2: you can't help but wonder what happened to this country."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1222_DESCRIPTION":"Strange
column2: this is the same path you took before. It seems that the forest is enchanted. You must find the source of this spell and eliminate it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1223_DESCRIPTION":"Exiting to an open space lit by the sun
column2: the birds shriek. A hero with a weapon from another world
column3: and another with a magic lance
column4: stand before you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1224_DESCRIPTION":"A mountain made of stone suddenly appears before you. Just when you thought it was in your way
column2: it swings at you. It's a puppet controlled by magic!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1230_DESCRIPTION":"Though Paris is hostile towards the Summoners' Hall
column2: there's a particular antagonism in the air when she looks at Grahdens. It must mean something."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1231_DESCRIPTION":"Water tainted red and a mysterious creature shining light by it. Out of all the places you've been to so far
column2: this one feels the eeriest. Be careful."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1232_DESCRIPTION":"A deafening voice combined with the flash of thunder. A bird soars the skies creating electric shocks as it revolves. But it's not just one bird..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1233_DESCRIPTION":"As the thunder clouds roar in the sky
column2: rain starts to fall. At the same time
column3: two heroes appear and obstruct your path. You sense a fight is imminent."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1234_DESCRIPTION":"The rain has ceased and light trickles through the clouds. As if on a staircase of light
column2: an angel descends. Defeat her and proceed to the Sky Palace."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1240_DESCRIPTION":"No matter how true Zurg's words may be
column2: helping him to destroy humans is not an option. Of course
column3: you wouldn't betray the Goddess anyway."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1241_DESCRIPTION":"You can't believe that such a beautiful garden floats in midair just like that. What sort of magic could be at work here?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1242_DESCRIPTION":"A fighting goddess forbids you from moving forward
column2: as if she cannot forgive those who disturb her garden. However
column3: there's no stopping now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1243_DESCRIPTION":"You reach the castle at the heart of the garden. When you set foot there
column2: a hero wielding a holy blade and a knight with a great sword appear."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1244_DESCRIPTION":"You can see the gate that marks the exit of the Sky Palace. However
column2: in front of it stands a shiny and pale king of beasts. It's time for battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1250_DESCRIPTION":"Tilith seems to be feeling better
column2: which is a relief. No one else is hung up on Zurg's words either. With a unified front
column3: head towards Adan's Tower."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1251_DESCRIPTION":"This eerie place makes it feel like ghosts could appear at any moment. Proceed with caution. You're getting closer to enemy territory now."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1252_DESCRIPTION":"A feeling of uneasiness lingers in the air
column2: but you travel lightly on your feet. Knowing you must defeat the Fallen God
column3: there's no time to waste."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1253_DESCRIPTION":"The ill wills of revenge and madness prevent you from stepping any further. The hero waiting ahead looks powerful
column2: so prepare yourself."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1254_DESCRIPTION":"A young woman awaits outside the rear gate of the castle. It would seem she's holding a sword in her right hand
column2: and concentrated magic on the other."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1260_DESCRIPTION":"The surroundings are overflowing with the presence of the enemy. Head for the top while Karl serves as a distraction. The real battle draws near."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1261_DESCRIPTION":"You cannot find the staircase that leads upstairs
column2: so you take the only way available deep inside. The path seems slanted
column3: slowly curving upwards."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1262_DESCRIPTION":"The curved hallway spirals upwards and upwards. If you stumble when you lose in battle
column2: you may end up tumbling all the way down..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1263_DESCRIPTION":"You reach the top to find a large room. As if the same type of powerful enemy had been waiting for you all along
column2: you're suddenly attacked."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1264_DESCRIPTION":"You go upstairs
column2: open the doors
column3: and find another large room. After just one step
column4: the doors close and a strong enemy is summoned. Just a bit more."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1265_DESCRIPTION":"After a fierce battle
column2: you climb your way up through some narrow stairs. On your way to the top an enemy shows itself
column3: but there's no going back now!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1266_DESCRIPTION":"Finally at the top
column2: there's no doubt that Zurg is waiting. If you defeat the disciple of the last Fallen God
column3: Afla Dilith will be the only enemy left!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_12_DESCRIPTION":"You can see a rocky mountain faintly on the horizon. Tilith is waiting at the \"Cave of Flames\" just beyond here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1300_DESCRIPTION":"You look far into the distance and notice the shadow of an eerie castle. They say that it is the last form Afla Dilith morphed into..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1301_DESCRIPTION":"The footprints of Lugina and the others who had gone ahead have vanished. Strong gusts of wind hit the sand dunes
column2: continuously changing their shape."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1302_DESCRIPTION":"The blazing sun is wearing you down
column2: dehydrating you. You've crossed many scorching territories so far
column3: but somehow never seem to grow used to them."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1303_DESCRIPTION":"As the sparkling sand reflects the sunlight
column2: your feet grow hotter and hotter. At this rate they'll end up well-done while they roast..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1304_DESCRIPTION":"Your thirst and the sun aren't your only enemies. Afla Dilith has dispatched assassins who are closing in on you. The end of the desert isn't far now."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1310_DESCRIPTION":"Indeed there are other gods besides the Four Fallen that reject the existence of humans. However
column2: let's focus on the task at hand for now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1311_DESCRIPTION":"The sun shines through an ice wall and though no light is lit within the temple
column2: it's bright inside. The light suddenly refracts
column3: creating a rainbow."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1312_DESCRIPTION":"The solitude of the ice temple makes for a very relaxing atmosphere. However
column2: with enemies incoming
column3: you have no time to rest."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1313_DESCRIPTION":"Could this temple also be the work of the gods? Or is it the masterpiece of a person with otherworldly powers? It piques your curiosity."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1314_DESCRIPTION":"Everything is gradually turning brighter. The exit may be close
column2: but things will probably not be as simple as you think."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1320_DESCRIPTION":"An ancient forest that few have visited before. There seem to be no natural paths. You'll have to use your sense of direction to get out of this one."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1321_DESCRIPTION":"A strange feeling overcomes you. You've sensed this atmosphere in many of the forests you have passed through so far. No doubt spirits are near."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1322_DESCRIPTION":"Along with a shrilling cry
column2: a flock of birds flies off frightened. A loud roar follows after. It's the sound of an otherworldly machine at work!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1323_DESCRIPTION":"You get the feeling that something is inviting you deep into the sea of trees. You can't help thinking you're being led to a den full of enemies."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1324_DESCRIPTION":"The space between the trees has widened. The end of the forest may be near. This can only mean that enemies more powerful than before await you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1330_DESCRIPTION":"The fate of the future... What Paris told you is starting to make sense. However
column2: you must first focus on defeating the last Fallen God."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1331_DESCRIPTION":"The large drops of rain won't stop
column2: striking you as they fall. Your body gets colder
column3: and as you sneeze
column4: the sound of thunder resonates around you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1332_DESCRIPTION":"You can tell that in Aldahlia the buildings soaked in rainwater have been eroding away. You start to wonder how long this rain will keep falling."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1333_DESCRIPTION":"A bright bolt of lightning tears the sky apart. After a second of waiting
column2: a deafening sound hits your ears. Lighting struck dangerously close."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1334_DESCRIPTION":"The continuous roaring of the thunder has made your ears feel funny. You wouldn't survive an ambush in this state
column2: so you best be cautious."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1340_DESCRIPTION":"It's still a long way to Afla Dilith
column2: but everyone keeps talking about what will come after that. Let's not worry about those things for now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1341_DESCRIPTION":"The herd of Pegasus was just frightened
column2: but something more alarming soars the skies. War goddesses spread their wings to prepare for battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1342_DESCRIPTION":"This road offers a clear view of the surroundings
column2: so there's no fear of an ambush. However
column3: there's nothing you can use to deflect aerial attacks."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1343_DESCRIPTION":"How long have you advanced? Now you can really see the castle Afla Dilith has assimilated with. Is that what you will face in the future?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1344_DESCRIPTION":"A road for pilgrims. Long ago
column2: pilgrims passed through here to pray to the gods. Ironically
column3: you're taking this road in order to defeat a god."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1345_DESCRIPTION":"The end of the road is near. A strong power can be felt coming from it. The enemy lurking there will most likely be your last obstacle here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1350_DESCRIPTION":"You are overwhelmed by the gigantic stature of the castle-like Afla Dilith. However
column2: everyone is counting on you
column3: so there's no time to waste."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1351_DESCRIPTION":"There are still many enemies left on the way to the castle. Surely Karl and the others will have to face even more of them as you move on ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1352_DESCRIPTION":"The sound of your allies fighting behind you grows louder. Head towards the castle while everyone else draws the enemies' attention."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1353_DESCRIPTION":"The enemies in your path continue getting stronger. It can only mean that your last target is drawing near. The castle's gates should be just ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1354_DESCRIPTION":"The castle is within a stone's throw
column2: and the god's powerful presence grows stronger. However
column3: it's no time to buckle under pressure. Step inside."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1355_DESCRIPTION":"You can see the last hoard of enemies in front of the gate. If you can get past them
column2: you will finally be inside Afla Dilith!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1360_DESCRIPTION":"Tilith
column2: Karl
column3: everyone... You're worried about the friends you left behind fighting. However
column4: there's no turning back now. You must press forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1361_DESCRIPTION":"Looking inside the castle
column2: nothing really seems out of place. Although without Tilith's protective barrier
column3: you might have fallen prey to Afla Dilith."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1362_DESCRIPTION":"You can hear Tilith fighting from the entrance. Inspired by her courage
column2: your feet rush forward at full speed!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1363_DESCRIPTION":"As you proceed further in
column2: the sounds of battle coming from the entrance disappear. You can still feel Tilith's barrier protecting you
column3: though."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1364_DESCRIPTION":"You've made your way through a big portion of the fortress. Past this corridor lies its center. The real body of the Fallen God is probably there."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1365_DESCRIPTION":"You exit into a room enveloped in tree roots. The next step should lead you to the heart of the castle
column2: but a dark hero blocks your path."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1366_DESCRIPTION":"The time for the real final fight with the last Fallen God
column2: the Beast God Afla Dilith
column3: has come... Defeat him and return to your friends!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1370_DESCRIPTION":"After visiting the temple a second time
column2: you think you hear the voice of a young girl singing. Her song made the rough waves vanish like the sea foam."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1400_DESCRIPTION":"A hair raising howling can be heard. It looks like many monsters seem to inhabit this town
column2: so there seems to be no easy escape from here."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1401_DESCRIPTION":"A beautiful singing voice lingers in the air. Could this be the work of a demon as well? And why have so many monsters gathered in this ghost town?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1402_DESCRIPTION":"How strange. No matter how much you advance
column2: you keep finding yourself back where you started. It's like being in the fairies' grove all over again."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1403_DESCRIPTION":"There are too many enemies. What could've led them here? As you think that to yourself
column2: a piercing and thunderous sound resonates around you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1404_DESCRIPTION":"The neigh of a Pegasus reaches your ears
column2: a pure sound ill-fitted for this ghost town. A battle with the maidens awaits ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1405_DESCRIPTION":"You can feel many more enemies obstructing your way now. If you're lucky enough
column2: defeating the last hoard of them might be your ticket out of here. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1410_DESCRIPTION":"You can see a vast desert in front of you. There seems to be no end to it
column2: but you must take this cruel path in order to move forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1411_DESCRIPTION":"You confirm the sun's location to avoid losing your way. Short on patience and with your body almost boiling
column2: beads of sweat fall from your forehead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1412_DESCRIPTION":"A cloud of sand starts covering your clothes. You swallow the fine pieces of sand the wind picks up as you breathe. Deserts are still not your forte."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1413_DESCRIPTION":"As the sunshine gets hotter
column2: heat haze begins to rise from beneath. Beyond the shaky mirage in front of you
column3: you spy the creeping shadow of the enemy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1414_DESCRIPTION":"A cloudless
column2: blue firmament above
column3: and scorching
column4: yellow sand beneath. As you look behind you
column5: everything grows darker. A sandstorm is on its way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1420_DESCRIPTION":"After leaving the great the desert behind
column2: you come across a river so big that the shore seems invisible. It will take a lot of effort to cross it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1421_DESCRIPTION":"At times
column2: the river fish jump high up. Surprised by the sound
column3: you finally see the enemy closing in. You realize now the fish were trying to warn you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1422_DESCRIPTION":"Halfway up the river you hear a creaking noise and see that the surface of the river has begun to freeze. It seems the enemy is here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1423_DESCRIPTION":"As you admire the grandeur of this river
column2: you reminisce of battle. Even though you have defeated the Four Fallen Gods
column3: other battles still lie ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1424_DESCRIPTION":"A strong wind blows. The water's surface ripples
column2: and then crashes in a big splash. It may be a sign of the road up ahead
column3: which makes you nervous."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1430_DESCRIPTION":"As you walk through the thick forest
column2: you get lost. The path to a free future... You'll have to make your own way to get there."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1431_DESCRIPTION":"You arrive at a place in the forest where a small spring bubbles. You consider taking a rest
column2: but enemies start appearing one by one. Break's over."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1432_DESCRIPTION":"A strong wind blows in the forest. As the leaves brush upon each other they sound like the waves of the ocean. It's a sea of trees indeed."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1433_DESCRIPTION":"Breeze blows strongly through the trees
column2: picking up old leaves
column3: and fluttering new ones. This is the force that transforms the forest anew."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1434_DESCRIPTION":"The sea of trees sways as the wind hits it. One could say that even these living beings feel anxious about the future fate of the world."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1440_DESCRIPTION":"The rough
column2: shiny rock around shows traces of lightning. It seems it has been absorbing it during the endless storms. Pressing forward won't be easy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1441_DESCRIPTION":"As you climb an electrified cliff
column2: you pass peaks as sharp as needles. You can't help but feel like this road is a premonition of the future to come."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1442_DESCRIPTION":"The thunder and lightning that falls here is absorbed by the mountain. It has accumulated so much after the years that it might burst any minute now."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1443_DESCRIPTION":"You've reached the Mt. Granakia's highest peak
column2: where you can see the whole of Atharva. You see a giant castle in the distance. Is that Eriole's base?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1444_DESCRIPTION":"You can see Paris at the bottom of the cliff. It seems she followed you here. You were told to talk to her
column2: but what exactly do you have in mind?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1450_DESCRIPTION":"After climbing over the mountain
column2: you reach a beautiful garden. However
column3: no people seem to come here
column4: so how has it been kept so well maintained?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1451_DESCRIPTION":"Beautiful flower beds are arranged next to each other in the garden. These amazing flowers couldn't have bloomed without lots of care
column2: and yet..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1452_DESCRIPTION":"You can see a fountain amidst the flower beds. The water sparkles as it flows from a beautifully carved pedestal. What a great spectacle to behold."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1453_DESCRIPTION":"Small birds flutter about
column2: chirping a song. One flees suddenly
column3: and when you follow it with your eyes
column4: you see a great shadow dropping from the sky..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1454_DESCRIPTION":"The floral aroma
column2: the chirping of the birds
column3: and the beauty of the trimmed hedges... Looking at it now
column4: this is a beautiful
column5: if not perfect

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1455_DESCRIPTION":"Could this garden have been made by human hands? How could it have remained so beautiful without any people left to care for it?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1456_DESCRIPTION":"Small flowers sway in the wind
column2: butterflies flutter about
column3: and the birds fly high in the sky. A wind of new beginnings is leaving the old age behind."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1460_DESCRIPTION":"Having passed the gorgeous garden
column2: you reach a gloomy cemetery. Among the expressionless tombstones standing
column3: a voice calls from within the silence."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1461_DESCRIPTION":"Tesla said Paris was useless to them now. If Eriole truly feels that way
column2: then just what could he be after...?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1462_DESCRIPTION":"This part of the cemetery seems to be dedicated to soldiers fallen in battle. You can see that their tombstones have a sword symbol carved onto them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1463_DESCRIPTION":"If a civil war breaks in Elgaia
column2: many lives will be lost. This must be prevented at all costs."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1464_DESCRIPTION":"Reading the few words you can make out from the headstones
column2: you gather that this was once one of the most important places in Atharva."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1465_DESCRIPTION":"You feel something cold run down your spine. Feeling an evil presence
column2: you look around you. Darkness is closing in
column3: the enemy's coming!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1466_DESCRIPTION":"Not even the wind seems to reach this place
column2: and your movements start to feel sluggish. The smell of moss and mold lingers in the air."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1470_DESCRIPTION":"The spark of battle has been ignited. Defeat the enemies standing in your way
column2: and head towards the depths of Eriole's castle!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1471_DESCRIPTION":"A cold steel blade strikes at you
column2: and fiery claws rush towards you. No matter who the enemy may be
column3: you must not falter!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1472_DESCRIPTION":"A fist cracks the floor open
column2: and a lance tries to pierce you as you counterattack. Strong enemies have gathered here
column3: but you must press on!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1473_DESCRIPTION":"Lightning flashes in the hall
column2: and a sword that seems to block darkness shimmers brightly. If you want to stop the revolution
column3: focus on the enemy now!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1474_DESCRIPTION":"Light pierces the walls
column2: and countless arrows begin to rain down. The enemy is strong
column3: but you still have morale. Hurry and make your way through!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1475_DESCRIPTION":"Dual blades dance in the air
column2: and one strike from a hefty lance breaks the floor open. Just a bit more till you face Eriole deep in the castle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1476_DESCRIPTION":"The shadow overhead is just as strong as the light. The world is being distorted
column2: probably tearing at the seams. You're just steps away from Eriole!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1477_DESCRIPTION":"Eriole's ideas are warped. The idea that a bloody revolution can bring about a peaceful future cannot possibly be true. He must be stopped."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1480_DESCRIPTION":"You discover a cave dispersing an ominous miasma. There are traces of a strong seal at the entrance
column2: but you seem to be able to come and go freely."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150000_DESCRIPTION":"Fire Hero Vargas vol. 1 - Vargas
column2: in his younger days. It wasn't long before the proud title he built for himself crumbled before him."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150001_DESCRIPTION":"Fire Hero Vargas vol. 2 - The days he ventured in search of strength. His countless fierce battles gave birth to the \"Hero of the Fierce Flame.\""
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150002_DESCRIPTION":"Fire Hero Vargas vol. 3 - The violent battle with the gods. Fighting alongside his comrades as well as rivals
column2: this is where the fire hero's legend began."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150010_DESCRIPTION":"Ice Hero Selena vol. 1 - Continuing to reject taking on the responsibility of head of the Savat people
column2: she ventures out to slay monsters."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150011_DESCRIPTION":"Ice Hero Selena vol. 2 - Upon inheriting the treasured sword Lexida as proof of her leadership
column2: Selena ventures to many lands under her new title."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150012_DESCRIPTION":"Ice Hero Selena vol. 3 - As the gods begin their attack
column2: the people unite as one
column3: and the legend of the Ice Goddess begins."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150020_DESCRIPTION":"Earth Hero Lance vol. 1 - Lance and his demon pike. Continuing his fateful journey
column2: many a powerful foe appeared before him."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150021_DESCRIPTION":"Earth Hero Lance vol. 2 - Led by his demon pike
column2: Lance headed for the World Tree. However
column3: something was waiting for him there."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150022_DESCRIPTION":"Earth Hero Lance vol. 3 - The gods' invasion had at last begun. Inspired by the demon pike
column2: this is where the earth hero's legend began."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150030_DESCRIPTION":"Thunder Hero Eze vol. 1 - Eze
column2: in his younger days as a demon bounty hunter. Experience the fateful meeting that changed his life forever."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150031_DESCRIPTION":"Thunder Hero Eze vol. 2 - Aware of his own weaknesses
column2: he immerses himself in training. That is when he finds his partner for life."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150032_DESCRIPTION":"Thunder Hero Eze vol. 3 - In the violent battle with the gods
column2: he almost loses what matters to him most. Watch
column3: as he unlocks his true power!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150040_DESCRIPTION":"Light Hero Atro vol. 1 - After driving a bandit away with a tree branch
column2: Atro's hidden talent leads him to begin training in La Veda fencing."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150041_DESCRIPTION":"Light Hero Atro vol. 2 - After acquiring the legendary sword of light
column2: Urias
column3: Atro becomes a master swordsman. However
column4: many people begin appearing..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150042_DESCRIPTION":"Light Hero Atro vol. 3 - The invasion of the gods has begun. Though in pain
column2: Atro fights against the God Army for the people and is struck by tragedy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150050_DESCRIPTION":"Dark Hero Magress vol. 1 - Magress
column2: a knight of the Bariura Empire trains arduously every day in hopes of meeting the emperor's expectations."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150051_DESCRIPTION":"Dark Hero Magress vol. 2 - After his family's murder
column2: an angry Magress spends his days in battle fueling the fire of vengeance within."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150052_DESCRIPTION":"Dark Hero Magress vol. 3 - Eliminating all enemies from his path the ever angry and resentful Magress has finally attained the power of the gods!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1500_DESCRIPTION":"As you approach the heart of the gloomy forest
column2: you think you hear the cry of the ancient dragon rumored to be sealed within it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150100_DESCRIPTION":"4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 1 - After receiving a revelation
column2: Edea sets off on a journey to search for allies to help repel the gods' attack on Palmyna."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150101_DESCRIPTION":"4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 2 - The warriors head towards their decisive battle against Cardes! They must save Palmyna from the gods' invasion!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150102_DESCRIPTION":"4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 3 - The price paid to seal Cardes was a great one. All the heroes come to gather around a dormant Edea."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1501_DESCRIPTION":"After fighting away the dragons
column2: you hear the voices of the deceased singing around you. It looks like the creatures of this forest mean to stop you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150200_DESCRIPTION":"Sefia - Foes manifesting from another world are invading Elgaia. She will exert divine justice upon them with her eight sacred blades!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150201_DESCRIPTION":"Kikuri - A young woman from another world. She means to redecorate the new stage of Grand Gaia by dying it crimson as she dances!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150202_DESCRIPTION":"Sefia & Kikuri (Continue Unavailable) - Red flowers are bound to bloom on the battlefield when these two opposing forces work together!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1502_DESCRIPTION":"You get the eerie feeling that someone's watching you. Could it be Ark? No
column2: this stare is from the beings dwelling in the forest."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150300_DESCRIPTION":"Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 1 - A white presence suddenly appears
column2: destroying all in its path. Elsewhere
column3: a suspicious dark presence awakens as well."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150301_DESCRIPTION":"Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 2 - Michele and Crabby set off on a journey to face the Ten Winged Destroyer
column2: making some strange friends along the way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150302_DESCRIPTION":"Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 3 - Michele's dear friends are defeated by Melchio's unbelievable power. That's when she..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1503_DESCRIPTION":"The dim forest is full of silence. The moment you think your ears have grown accustomed to it
column2: a flock of birds suddenly lets out a shrilling cry."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150400_DESCRIPTION":"Disastrous Beast vol. 1 - A girl born of two races never meant to be together looks for a fight alongside the enchanted doll her father left her."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150401_DESCRIPTION":"Disastrous Beast vol. 2 - An angel meets a beast and confronts the will hiding deep within her heart. Her desire for freedom has been liberated."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150402_DESCRIPTION":"Disastrous Beast vol. 3 - A group that fights against the gods with their own hopes in mind. They had been hidden from them before
column2: but no longer."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1504_DESCRIPTION":"After the flock of birds has gone
column2: you encounter a group of fighting goddesses. They study you as if trying to gauge your power."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150500_DESCRIPTION":"12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 1 - Before Sodis's rebellion
column2: Farlon takes his fellow Guardians on many different missions."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150501_DESCRIPTION":"12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 2 - Sodis's younger brother
column2: Alyut
column3: joins the Guardians. His talents begin to blossom with the support of his comrades."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150502_DESCRIPTION":"12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 3 - The Guardians face off against the demon Zorbadel. They must overcome this menace by working together!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150503_DESCRIPTION":"12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 4 - A mission calls for the execution of the traitor Sodis
column2: but each of the Guardians begins to follow their own path."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150504_DESCRIPTION":"12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 5 - Luly becomes the catalyst for the fight between Alyut's forces and Sodis's supporters."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150505_DESCRIPTION":"12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 6 - The final battle of the 12 Guardians draws near. They haven't even stopped to consider each other's feelings..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150506_DESCRIPTION":"12 Guardians of the Gods (Extra) - Years pass since the Guardians' last battle. The only two survivors foresee the war between mankind and the gods."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1505_DESCRIPTION":"You're almost out of the forest. You want to meet Tilith as soon as possible to talk to her
column2: but the demonic miasma around you refuses to allow it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150601_DESCRIPTION":"Leaders of the Escape Vol. 1 - After the defeat of the Six Heroes
column2: all regions fall into chaos. Leaders must step up to guide the people anew."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150602_DESCRIPTION":"Leaders of the Escape Vol. 2 - As the people try to flee
column2: Reed and Eru butt heads with each other. The promised land is almost at their reach
column3: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150700_DESCRIPTION":"Cursed Fire Armor vol. 1 - A scientist with her creation
column2: and a twin sword wielding knight are after the demon Vishra and his cursed existence."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150701_DESCRIPTION":"Cursed Fire Armor vol. 2 - A fierce battle erupts when those after the demon Vishra finally meet their target."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150702_DESCRIPTION":"Cursed Fire Armor vol. 3 - The fight against Vishra begins changing everyone individually
column2: including Vishra himself..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150703_DESCRIPTION":"Cursed Fire Armor (Extra) - Logan regains his senses after his friend sacrifices his life for him. However
column2: what awaits Reeze and Lilith henceforth?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150800_DESCRIPTION":"Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 1 - The great gods known as the Divine Ten once had powerful disciples who would eventually turn against them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150801_DESCRIPTION":"Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 2 - The disciples of the Divine Ten draw their weapons against their masters. They all have their reasons for fighting."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150802_DESCRIPTION":"Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 3 - The Six Pillars are sealed in to pay for their betrayal. The one who survives this will be granted freedom
column2: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150900_DESCRIPTION":"The Princess & the Knight vol. 1 -  Priscilla and Arus chase after a rampaging ancient dragon. However
column2: a demon seems to lie behind it all..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150901_DESCRIPTION":"The Princess & the Knight vol. 2 - Shera and Belfura join Priscilla and Arus to confront the ancient dragon once again."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_150902_DESCRIPTION":"The Princess & the Knight vol. 3 - Priscilla and Arus land in another world. The demon who had plotted it all finally reveals his existence to them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151000_DESCRIPTION":"Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 1 - The Oracle Knight lives to serve the god Lucius. Amongst the many to bear that title
column2: one went by the name of Ark..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151001_DESCRIPTION":"Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 2 - The Oracle Knight and the Oracle Maiden follow Lucius's orders and head towards the Holy Emperor with their comrades."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151002_DESCRIPTION":"Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 3 - The final battle between the Oracle Knight's Troop and Karna Masta
column2: the god who seeks to destroy humanity
column3: begins now!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1510_DESCRIPTION":"The combination of Seria's excessively threatening attitude and all your memories of Tilith leave you in silence. You best follow the Goddess anyway."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151100_DESCRIPTION":"After having lost his memory in battle
column2: Avant comes across a blade of flames. What awaits him after having overcome the loss of his son?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1511_DESCRIPTION":"The heat haze rising from the sand is as hot as fire itself. It even makes you wonder whether it is actually aflame."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151200_DESCRIPTION":"The Noble Thief Zelnite's story has yet to be told... Follow our mysterious hero as he uncovers the sinister plot of the Bariura Empire!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1512_DESCRIPTION":"It is only normal to feel hot in a desert
column2: but you've never felt this degree of heat before. It's a premonition of the enemies who want to stop you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151300_DESCRIPTION":"A Master's Wisdom vol. 1 - Mythic Kulyuk treats all living things equally. Many races have gathered around him as disciples..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151301_DESCRIPTION":"A Master's Wisdom vol. 2 - Kulyuk sets out to meet the Holy Emperor
column2: but this is just the beginning of the tragedy for him and his followers..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151302_DESCRIPTION":"A Master's Wisdom vol. 3 - Kulyuk's disciples spring into action
column2: each acting on their own beliefs
column3: but an even harsher fate awaits them..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151303_DESCRIPTION":"A Master's Wisdom vol. 4 - Kulyuk vanished suddenly after being called by the Holy Emperor. What could have happened to him?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1513_DESCRIPTION":"The scorching desert is draining your energy. It doesn't seem like Tilith will appear here
column2: but if you meet her again
column3: you should try talking to her."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151400_DESCRIPTION":"Heroes of a New Era vol. 1 - Humanity has found hope in the new land of Elgaia. However
column2: a threat quickly approaches!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151401_DESCRIPTION":"Heroes of a New Era vol. 2 - The Randall Guard has finally been formed
column2: but its members seem rather peculiar..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151402_DESCRIPTION":"Heroes of a New Era vol. 3 - A demon suddenly appears in the city to test the Randall Guard. Are they truly worthy of being called heroes?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1514_DESCRIPTION":"You feel a presence. There's no doubt that Tilith is near. You want to avoid a fight with her
column2: but how will it all turn out...?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151500_DESCRIPTION":"Blue Blooded Truth vol.1 - Princess Mariela possesses special powers and predicts that otherworldly demons will come for her in an invasion..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151501_DESCRIPTION":"Blue Blooded Truth vol.2 - As the head of the dragon clan's new wife
column2: Mariela gained a child
column3: but that gives rise to a new tragedy..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151502_DESCRIPTION":"Blue Blooded Truth vol.3 - Desires violently collide as Lyonesse seeks to protect the child of the dragon clan's chief from Sonia and Serge."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_151503_DESCRIPTION":"Blue Blooded Truth vol.4 - Times passes
column2: and Karl arrives in the land of Ishgria as a Summoner. There he encounters a certain dragon clan warrior..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1520_DESCRIPTION":"A red river flows ahead. It reminds you of a red forest from your previous exploits. Just like during those hard times
column2: Tilith is still by your side."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1521_DESCRIPTION":"What could be awaiting you? You are not completely sure
column2: but watching the crimson waves makes you all the more uneasy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1522_DESCRIPTION":"The red splash is freezing. You have now seen this omen of the strong opponents ahead a number of times. Beware of your surroundings and get ready."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1523_DESCRIPTION":"The red current looks just like blood. If humans were to be destroyed once again
column2: the landscape would probably resemble an image like this one."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1524_DESCRIPTION":"The reflection of the light on the water makes the river sparkle. Its color made you uncomfortable before
column2: but it may make for a beautiful view now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1530_DESCRIPTION":"You have arrived at a ghost town. It was probably a normal village before it was destroyed. Thick grass grows along the remnants of the streets."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1531_DESCRIPTION":"You were only worried about were stepped
column2: but now you've noticed a gigantic tower in the distance. It must be the so-called Tower of the Oracle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1532_DESCRIPTION":"The greenery around you has grown louder. It could all be in your head
column2: but is it possible that the insects are trying to warn you? The enemy's here!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1533_DESCRIPTION":"Humans don't fully understand the concept of a god yet. However
column2: looking at Tilith you can't help but to feel there's not much of a difference."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1534_DESCRIPTION":"In the outskirts of the village lies a small shrine. As you go past it
column2: you lay your eyes upon the tower standing ahead. Ark awaits you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1540_DESCRIPTION":"What could Ark's real motives be? Why is he attempting to test the Summoners' power? Or could he be trying to end it all here?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1541_DESCRIPTION":"The enemy is strong. However
column2: you won't just stop fighting. Your ability to stop the Four Fallen Gods was no hoax
column3: but Ark is well aware of that."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1542_DESCRIPTION":"Thunder clouds roar within the walls of the tower. Did you set off a trap
column2: or could this be the enemy's power? Either way
column3: you must push through."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1543_DESCRIPTION":"You're close to the top of the tower. As you continue forth
column2: you feel a strong presence. Could the beings Ark mentioned be waiting ahead?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1544_DESCRIPTION":"What could have those enemies been? Many seemed to have been related to Ark somehow. That must mean that the next enemy is..."
