"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1550_DESCRIPTION":"Ark's words had a strong impact. What does Lucius plan to do with humanity now? There's no choice but to seek him and ask him directly."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1551_DESCRIPTION":"When Ark removed his mask
column2: his determination was written all over his face. Will you be able to hear any more important information from him again?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1552_DESCRIPTION":"Tilith seems completely at a loss about what Ark said regarding Lucius. It seems even she doesn't know everything about her master."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1553_DESCRIPTION":"A tension in the air is putting everything on edge. Is this the wrath of the heroes? Ark's figure is slowly becoming visible."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1554_DESCRIPTION":"The curse of Karna Masta... Summoning was believed to be a power granted by Lucius
column2: but things seem more complicated than that."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1555_DESCRIPTION":"The history left behind is only a small portion of the history that has actually taken place. What new knowledge could be awaiting in the future?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1556_DESCRIPTION":"Tilith said she became Lucius's disciple after the great war with the gods. There may be even more things Tilith doesn't know than initially thought."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1560_DESCRIPTION":"It seems a fight against Lucius is imminent now. If only you could convince Tilith otherwise..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1561_DESCRIPTION":"This place is said to have been where people received divine commands from the gods. It must be a special place for the Oracle Knight Ark."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1562_DESCRIPTION":"The rocks' tough exterior seems to want to keep people away
column2: but it may be testing if you have enough strength to finish the dreaded climb."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1563_DESCRIPTION":"How many moons have passed since this mountain lost its original purpose? The darkness that lingers in these mountain paths is quite dense."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1564_DESCRIPTION":"A shadow lurks in the ridge below. This figure clad in jet black armor is perhaps the lone knight the Six Heroes mentioned. It's time for battle."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1565_DESCRIPTION":"As you make your climb down the steep cliff
column2: demons come after you. Only a little bit more until you reach the Grand Gaia Crater where Lucius awaits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1566_DESCRIPTION":"If only Lucius would reconsider his decision of destroying humanity
column2: a battle could be avoided... Is this mentality perhaps too idealistic?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1570_DESCRIPTION":"The battle has finally begun. Lucius seems to have no intentions of listening to humans. Tilith's words are also cause for concern..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1571_DESCRIPTION":"If Lucius is defeated
column2: only Tilith will be able to control the gate. You must think of a countermeasure to deal with the sealed calamities within."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1572_DESCRIPTION":"You were victorious against all Four Fallen Gods. However
column2: now you fully understand that Lucius's power surpasses that of any previously defeated god."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1573_DESCRIPTION":"Gods and humans seem to be looking at things quite differently. However
column2: if they mean to destroy humanity
column3: you've no choice but to stop them."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1574_DESCRIPTION":"Lucius doesn't speak much. Did he fool everyone? Or did humans selfishly come up with their own expectations of him?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1575_DESCRIPTION":"You wonder if Karl and the others are unharmed. They must have crossed many a powerful enemy on the way here. Quickly
column2: you must reach Lucius!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1576_DESCRIPTION":"Grand Gaia's Crater... Is this the place where countless calamities lie sealed within? No
column2: now is not the time for distractions."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1577_DESCRIPTION":"Tilith has led you all the way here. That was Lucius's will. However
column2: now you must fight with your own will in mind!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1580_DESCRIPTION":"You have reached the depths of this territory sealed by the gods. Within it lies the results of an experiment that offends their divinity..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_1_DESCRIPTION":"It's time to discuss basic combat techniques!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000000_DESCRIPTION":"You think you have what it takes to defeat my mock Units? You should be really familiar with your opponent this time! I wonder how long you'll last?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000001_DESCRIPTION":"Hmm
column2: you're better than I expected. However
column3: if you think you can beat my next Unit
column4: you're wrong! I doubt you'll even be able to survive the first blow!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000002_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000003_DESCRIPTION":"I used entirely different materials to make
this new mock Unit
column2:
you know!
You'll get quite the surprise when
you start fighting against it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000004_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000005_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000006_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000007_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000008_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000009_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000010_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000011_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000012_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000013_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000014_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2000015_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20000_DESCRIPTION":"Welcome to the newly discovered realm of Cordelica. A huge gate towers above you
column2: as if it were beckoning Summoners inside..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20001_DESCRIPTION":"Beyond the huge gate unfolds a fiery cave. It doesn\u2019t look like you\u2019ll find anything worthy of investigation here
column2: so keep moving forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20002_DESCRIPTION":"You\u2019ve stumbled into a thriving monster habitat. Judging by the hungry glint in their eyes
column2: you\u2019re probably the first human they\u2019ve seen in centuries."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20003_DESCRIPTION":"There\u2019s no respite from the scalding heat. A gust of hot wind blasting through the maze of caverns."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20004_DESCRIPTION":"A cold wind dries the sweat from your forehead. Could the exit be nearby? You spot a shaft of light
column2: but it\u2019s guarded by a formidable-looking foe..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20010_DESCRIPTION":"You exit the infernal cave and come upon a huge waterfall spanned by a breathtaking rainbow. Finally
column2: some beautiful scenery to soothe your weary soul."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20011_DESCRIPTION":"A monster ambush interrupts your reverie with the scenery. Dispose of them and continue with your investigation."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20012_DESCRIPTION":"You pass behind the cascading waterfall and continue to the next area. Lugina\u2019s warning plays in your mind
column2: but you\u2019re too curious to turn back now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20013_DESCRIPTION":"The roar of the waterfall cascading around you drowns out the sound of approaching demons. They lurk in the water and shadows
column2: waiting for their moment to pounce."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20014_DESCRIPTION":"Just as you\u2019re about to exit on the other side of Ignia Falls
column2: a watery monarch emerges from behind the waterfall. He\u2019s come to expel the intruders in his domain..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20020_DESCRIPTION":"On the other side of the huge waterfall a vast forest stretches as far as the eye can see. According to Lugina
column2: the monsters here are the most dangerous you\u2019ve faced."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20021_DESCRIPTION":"The overgrown foliage deep inside the forest is maze-like in its complexity. What lies on the other side?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20022_DESCRIPTION":"Even after the world has been reduced to rubble
column2: the souls of bandits continue to exist deep within the forest. They target travelers\u2019 valuables
column3: just like when they were alive."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20023_DESCRIPTION":"The bandits tell of a dragon who protects all the trees in the forest. Could that be where this distant roar is coming from?"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20024_DESCRIPTION":"A massive tree stretches into the heavens from the center of the forest. There's no chance of passing through the forest's twisting maze without its blessing."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20030_DESCRIPTION":"Do as Lugina says and defeat the hordes of monsters dwelling within the fortress. You\u2019ll be able to continue with your investigation afterwards."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20031_DESCRIPTION":"Scores of monsters block your path forward
column2: but there\u2019s no turning back now. Show them who\u2019s boss by attacking them head-on."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20032_DESCRIPTION":"You break through the frontal defenses only to find yourself ambushed yet again
column2: but this time from above! Time to quiet this raging beast."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20033_DESCRIPTION":"Two monstrous birds
column2: more ferocious than anything else you\u2019ve encountered
column3: lie in wait to stop the advance of any would-be intruders into their territory."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20034_DESCRIPTION":"Danger awaits you in the great courtyard at the center of Valtan Fortress. Defeat whatever it is to complete Lugina's mission."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20040_DESCRIPTION":"You arrive at the Tower of Light hot on the heels of Lugina and Paris. Could the mystery of Cordelica really lie within its radiant and lofty walls?"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20041_DESCRIPTION":"The roar of an ancient dragon reverberates inside the walls of the tower. Only those able to conquer their fear are worthy of scaling the tower\u2019s heights."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20042_DESCRIPTION":"The higher you climb
column2: the tougher the monsters seem to get. Amid all the chaos
column3: the sound of a beautiful and bewitching singing voice beckons you ever higher."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20043_DESCRIPTION":"Nothing poses a greater threat to Summoners than monsters of opposite elements cooperating to launch a combination attack. Fire and water
column2: for instance..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20044_DESCRIPTION":"Countless monsters appear as if to drive the intruders from their hallowed tower. But what are they protecting? Part of Cordelica's past
column2: or some other hidden truth?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20045_DESCRIPTION":"As the fight continues to escalate
column2: the sound of gunfire mixed in with the roar of monsters hints at even more danger to come. Could Lugina have found something?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20046_DESCRIPTION":"An overwhelming presence emanates from the top of the tower. Could it be the legendary power bestowed upon those who\u2019ve heard the voice of the gods?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20050_DESCRIPTION":"A mine shaft winds its way in the direction of the Giant's Ruins. Monsters fond of the dank conditions lurk in the shadows
column2: their fangs occasionally glinting in the darkness."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20051_DESCRIPTION":"Spots of nature continue to exist even in this most man-made of environments. Unfortunately
column2: nature isn\u2019t always man\u2019s ally..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20052_DESCRIPTION":"The dark mineshaft continues to beckon weary travelers deeper inside its murky maw. Monsters can smell fear
column2: so whatever you do
column3: beware your sweet scent."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20053_DESCRIPTION":"You emerge from what you thought was a never-ending tunnel to be greeted by a bright light
column2: only to find out the light was actually a flash of lightning."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20054_DESCRIPTION":"An evil air pervades the pitch-blackness of the mine\u2019s innermost reaches. Exhausted by their travails
column2: despair nibbles at the heart of any weary traveler on this road."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20055_DESCRIPTION":"A glimmer of hope crosses your mind as you feel the route slowly ascending
column2: though the air of death continues to loom about in the shadows around you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20056_DESCRIPTION":"A faint light glimmers at the end of what seemed like never-ending darkness. Standing before it
column2: a nightmarish monster rears its head
column3: revealing a bewitching smile."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20060_DESCRIPTION":"You come to some vast and ancient ruins
column2: cloaked in an air of solemnity. The time of Cordelica\u2019s reckoning is soon at hand. Prepare yourself for the battle ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20061_DESCRIPTION":"You follow Lugina\u2019s orders and launch yourself into the path of the marauding monsters. You have to give it all you've got on the front lines!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20062_DESCRIPTION":"As if drawn by the heat of battle
column2: monsters from far and wide descend upon your position. You can\u2019t afford to rest until Lugina has defeated Grantos!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20063_DESCRIPTION":"Locked in the throes of battle
column2: a strange sensation overcomes you momentarily. You don\u2019t know what caused it
column3: but you decide to track its source..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20064_DESCRIPTION":"The carvings here are even more ornate than those near the entrance of the ruins. A fresh gash runs horizontally across one of the giant frescoes. What could've done this?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20065_DESCRIPTION":"Continuing deeper into the ruins in search of the strange sensation\u2019s source
column2: you come across souls driven mad mad by anger. What could have done this?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20066_DESCRIPTION":"The source of the strange sensation is revealed in a legendary giants with powers rivaling those of the gods. Do you run
column2: or stay and fight?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20067_DESCRIPTION":"After defeating the giants
column2: you now face the toughest challenge of all in their king
column3: Grantos. The final showdown to determine the fate of Cordelica is about to begin."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20070_DESCRIPTION":"There's a cavern just behind the Ignia Falls. A mysterious beast has awaken deep inside
column2: seemingly disturbed by your battle with the giants. What could it be?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_200_DESCRIPTION":"Your journey through Morgan begins in a huge desert. The scorching haze indicates the fierce battle to come."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20100_DESCRIPTION":"Now you can't rely on anything else but your own physical power. And although Tilith may be helping
column2: you should stay alert."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20101_DESCRIPTION":"Even surrounded by enemies
column2: at least you were able to meet with Lugina's subordinate
column3: Reda. Watch how she fights."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20102_DESCRIPTION":"This is what it is to fight for yourself
column2: feeling the resistance through your weapons. You can see how much you've depended on Summoning until now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_201_DESCRIPTION":"The bandits in this burning desert have much stronger resolve that those in Mistral
column2: and it seems they intend to block your way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20200_DESCRIPTION":"A bizarre scene of machines making machines unfolds before you. They make machines in Elgaia
column2: too
column3: but there is no comparison in scale."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20201_DESCRIPTION":"Machines are everywhere you look. There's no sign of any people. Could this be related to the collapse Reda spoke of?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20202_DESCRIPTION":"You've gotten used to fighting without Summoning. Even so
column2: it might not go well if you run into a powerful enemy as you are now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_202_DESCRIPTION":"A summoned being known as the king of beasts is rampaging in the desert. A fierce battle with him is unavoidable."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20300_DESCRIPTION":"You've won the trust of a strange automaton. Your goal keeps moving further away. You've got to fight through swarming enemies to get there."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20301_DESCRIPTION":"The land around you is covered in broken machines
column2: and the sharp debris makes for bad footing. You have to hurry or you'll lose sight of your goal."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20302_DESCRIPTION":"Your target has slowed down. You're almost there. You've grown confident in your fighting skills
column2: so now it's time to close the gap."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20303_DESCRIPTION":"Your target has stopped moving. However
column2: you sense a powerful feeling of malice close by. You won't be able to avoid a difficult fight."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_203_DESCRIPTION":"You've reached the desert's mid point. An incarnation of flames blocks the way
column2: further scorching the land around it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20400_DESCRIPTION":"Hatch and Tull
column2: you've picked up some unexpected companions on your journey. More importantly
column3: these automatons seem oddly human."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20401_DESCRIPTION":"You proceed into the tower made of geometric crystal and metal. It looks like it was built for people to live in
column2: but there's no sign of anyone."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20402_DESCRIPTION":"According to Hatch and Tull
column2: humans vanished from this world long ago. Yet the city seems to be perfectly preserved..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20403_DESCRIPTION":"There are some mechanical experts and actual machines among those you can Summon
column2: but are any of them connected to this world?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20404_DESCRIPTION":"Leaving Mersas
column2: you're finally almost at the Information Tower. It would be nice if you could get there without trouble
column3: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_204_DESCRIPTION":"The end of the desert is in view
column2: and the wind now smells of the sea. However
column3: a giant silhouette stands blocks your path..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20500_DESCRIPTION":"You made it to the Information Tower
column2: your present goal. You're able to use Summoning again for whatever reason
column3: so you might as well start climbing."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20501_DESCRIPTION":"You've gotten used to fighting for yourself alongside Summoning. You feel like you've grown to understand why Karl and Seria fight this way."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20502_DESCRIPTION":"There's probably a device you can get information from on the top floor
column2: but before that a powerful enemy you must fight awaits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20600_DESCRIPTION":"You probably shouldn't be surprised
column2: but it seems Bertz made it to this world first. Reda doesn't even need to tell you that you have to hurry."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20601_DESCRIPTION":"This wasteland is wildly different from the rest of Bectas. Is this an area they've extracted ores from in order to make machines?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20602_DESCRIPTION":"You can see a building past the wasteland. That's probably your destination. What is the being that protects this world? Does this world have gods?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20603_DESCRIPTION":"You feel something unpleasant
column2: but it's not malice. Is it a premonition? Watch for dangerous enemies near the building as you advance."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20700_DESCRIPTION":"As expected
column2: the building was full of machines. It also seems to be full of enemies. Be careful
column3: you don't know what else awaits you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20701_DESCRIPTION":"Massive numbers of machines are attacking. It's exhausting and there's no end in sight. Reda appears to be sick of it
column2: too."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20702_DESCRIPTION":"Hatch and Tull seem to have told the truth about lacking combat abilities. Maybe this would have been easier if they could fight with you..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20703_DESCRIPTION":"You hear an unnatural sound that you recognize. It seems a formidable foe you've fought many times awaits you. Take up your weapon and move forward."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20704_DESCRIPTION":"You've arrived at the central block. Find the being that protects Bectas
column2: and your mission is complete. Yet you feel like you're forgetting something."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20705_DESCRIPTION":"Lugina breaks through a wall and appears. You don't have time to ask questions. For now
column2: defeat the massive automaton he called the \"Divine Machine\"!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20800_DESCRIPTION":"You've arrived at the building Reda discovered and was set on exploring. This place is clearly different from the other buildings on Bectas."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_20_DESCRIPTION":"The magma flowing within this cave gives off an intense heat. The enemies in this cave have the power of fire."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2100000_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2100001_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2100002_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2100003_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2100004_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2100005_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2100006_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2100007_DESCRIPTION":"These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21000_DESCRIPTION":"The old castle ringed with a half-frozen lake like a moat makes you think of scenes from Grand Gaia. Who could possibly live here?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21001_DESCRIPTION":"You can see the castle more clearly as you approach
column2: and it really does seem similar to some ruins you've seen before."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21002_DESCRIPTION":"Did the culture of this world influence Grand Gaia just as the one on Bectas did? Or was it Grand Gaia that influenced this world?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21003_DESCRIPTION":"The gate is right ahead of you. You can tell now that you're close. You're pretty sure you've seen extremely similar architecture on Grand Gaia..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21010_DESCRIPTION":"You were shocked to learn that humans fled to places other than Elgaia during the war with the gods. Are there other cases of this
column2: as well?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21011_DESCRIPTION":"Fearing attack by the Mystical Wolf's minions
column2: the townsfolk keep their doors shut tight. And thus the town itself is overrun with monsters."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21012_DESCRIPTION":"The Mystical Wolf's change is probably related to this land's sealed god. If so
column2: your survey will probably also help to save this world's people."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21020_DESCRIPTION":"Luciana has moved ahead despite Liana's effort to stop her. It seems our presence has had negative effects. You have to catch up to her."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21021_DESCRIPTION":"Luciana believes the legends
column2: and probably thinks the gods are still humanity's enemies. Liana seems terrified of Tilith
column3: too."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21022_DESCRIPTION":"According to Liana
column2: it's not especially cold right now. This is the normal weather all year. Elgaia might seem like a paradise next to this world."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21023_DESCRIPTION":"The snow on the trees sometimes falls to the ground noisily. How did the people of this world survive in such a cold land?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21030_DESCRIPTION":"The three of you proceed along the lake's shore. The lake is frozen in patches
column2: and it seems like a person could walk out onto the ice in some places."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21031_DESCRIPTION":"There was no snow in Tull's world
column2: so advancing through it is a real struggle. You have to walk ahead and pack down the snow."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21032_DESCRIPTION":"The problem with this world is the enemies that hide in the snow and leap out at you. If you get thrown into the lake
column2: you might even die of the cold."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21033_DESCRIPTION":"You're almost to the site of one of the shrines. However
column2: you're well aware from experience that \"almost there\" is a dangerous place to be."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21040_DESCRIPTION":"There's a fantastical scene unfolding in the sky. You want to observe closely
column2: but there's no time if you intend to catch up to Luciana."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21041_DESCRIPTION":"These snowfields seem to be filled with lurking enemies
column2: but with Hatch scouting ahead you should still be able to avoid most fights."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21042_DESCRIPTION":"You can see far across the vast snowfields
column2: but the enemies hide in the snow and ambush you at times. Stay alert for their presence as you advance."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21043_DESCRIPTION":"You're close to the border between the snowfields and the ice lake. Powerful enemies often lie in wait in places like this. Keep your wits about you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21050_DESCRIPTION":"The sealed god of this land appears from nowhere. Beat it and you'll complete your mission here. All you can do now is fight with all you have!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21051_DESCRIPTION":"It seems that the Mystical Wolf was actually this world's sealed god. You need to find a way to win before you fight it again..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21052_DESCRIPTION":"The cold
column2: dry air makes your nose hurt. Reda seems to be freezing
column3: too
column4: but Luciana and Liana appear used to it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21053_DESCRIPTION":"Enemies attack frequently
column2: but at least it warms you up a bit. It might be nice to fight for yourself under these circumstances."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21054_DESCRIPTION":"The air has shifted. There must be an exit nearby. The sisters say that it's still quite a ways to the polar regions even after you leave this cave."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21060_DESCRIPTION":"You can't let sudden meetings and attacks confuse you. They attacked after determining you were a Summoner of the Summoners' Hall
column2: which must mean..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21061_DESCRIPTION":"The Abel Faction was ahead of you in this world
column2: too. How much information are they getting before the Summoners' Hall does?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21062_DESCRIPTION":"You can't tell how deep the cracks in the massive ice blocks go. All you can do is take extreme care in where you step as you advance."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21070_DESCRIPTION":"Cold air...no
column2: a presence so tense it hurts. This alone tells you the immense power of the sealed god. Just what is this sealed god?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21071_DESCRIPTION":"Although you're fairly used to it by now
column2: things are still harder when your Summoning is restricted. You have to get stronger."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21072_DESCRIPTION":"You restored the power of Summoning on Bectas by fighting the sealed god. Will that happen again if you fight the mystical wolf?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21073_DESCRIPTION":"The frequency of enemy attacks has changed... You have a bad feeling about this. You could be wrong
column2: but it feels like you're being chased somewhere."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21074_DESCRIPTION":"It seems the Mystical Wolf's minions have surrounded the area
column2: but you can't let yourself lose for Luciana and Liana's sakes!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21080_DESCRIPTION":"Rene calls you deep underground
column2: beneath the lake castle. Once inside
column3: you experience a sense of deja vu recalling Bariura in Grand Gaia."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21090_DESCRIPTION":"You see something unexpected as you progress deep into the polar region. It's shocking to see a place so verdant in this snowbound world."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_210_DESCRIPTION":"You've reached the shore
column2: escaping the desert. A calm
column3: beautiful beach awaits you
column4: but you must still be cautious."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_211_DESCRIPTION":"A huge ship is anchored on the beach. It's a pirate ship
column2: and it seems there's no easy way past..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_212_DESCRIPTION":"The beautiful view continues
column2: as do the number of enemies you encounter. Prepare yourself for a water assault."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_213_DESCRIPTION":"The end of the coastline is now in view. A Water Spirit is said to appear around here. How strong could it be?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_214_DESCRIPTION":"You've finally reached the coast's end. A dark forest is visible ahead
column2: but surely something is lurking near..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_21_DESCRIPTION":"Continue deeper into the Cave of Flames. Beings who control fire are waiting ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22000_DESCRIPTION":"The sun is warm
column2: and the winds are gentle. The climate near here seems nice. Even the leaves make a pleasant sound."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22001_DESCRIPTION":"You see a band of people in black chasing a woman. You don't understand the situation
column2: but she's clearly in danger!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22002_DESCRIPTION":"Who were those people in black? They might attack again
column2: so you need to get somewhere with better visibility."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22010_DESCRIPTION":"You've heard of warriors called shinobi. Does that mean someone from Ohbanahara became a Grand Gaian hero?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22011_DESCRIPTION":"Seria's decision caught you off guard. She must be growing up. You can't let her show you up
column2: though."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22012_DESCRIPTION":"You're going to help Suzune reclaim the country
column2: but that will probably take more than civil discussions to achieve. Be ready to fight."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22013_DESCRIPTION":"The watery fields around you are apparently called paddies
column2: and they're strangely beautiful when they glisten in the sunlight."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22020_DESCRIPTION":"You've seen many signs of wartime destruction already
column2: but this is the first time you've seen the site of a battle that was only days old..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22021_DESCRIPTION":"Broken swords
column2: shattered armor... You should probably stop looking so closely at the things around you. Suzune's looking pale
column3: too."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22022_DESCRIPTION":"Sakunoshin said that people who dress and cover their faces like the one you just passed are called begging monks. They dress very suspiciously."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22023_DESCRIPTION":"Apparently there's a checkpoint and a city once you get past Calamity Plains. Maybe you should dress like you're from this world to get through it?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22030_DESCRIPTION":"Sakunoshin is unconscious
column2: but you can't leave him behind. For now
column3: try to focus your attacks on the enemy leader and make an opening!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22031_DESCRIPTION":"You got free thanks to the begging monk. If he's helping you
column2: he's probably an ally of Suzune's. Trust him for now and focus on escaping."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22032_DESCRIPTION":"You doubt that the enemy will risk harming Suzune
column2: but you're not sure. You have to escape this castle as soon as possible!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22040_DESCRIPTION":"There's a river down the hill and past the checkpoint. The large bridge over it that seems to lead to a city
column2: and the castle lies just beyond."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22041_DESCRIPTION":"You're fascinated by this culture so unlike that of Elgaia
column2: but you need to hurry to Suzune's rescue. You'll have time for sightseeing later."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22042_DESCRIPTION":"Genba's minions are in position on the bridge
column2: and it won't be easy to get across. You need to hurry and push through it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22043_DESCRIPTION":"You come to a sudden stop when you sense a powerful foe. You may have been too hasty in this. You need to calm down and stay centered as you fight."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22044_DESCRIPTION":"As expected
column2: you've run into a skilled warrior. But why does this warrior know about the sealed god? You'll have to fight to find out."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22050_DESCRIPTION":"There are too many enemies to count! They did know you were coming
column2: so it's not shocking. All you can do is fight your way through."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22051_DESCRIPTION":"You dash through the chaotic melee
column2: crushing autumn leaves as you go. Get into the castle while the begging monk keeps Kagenui busy!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22052_DESCRIPTION":"You've finally gotten through the maze-like castle walls to the main building. Now you can charge the entrance that Sakunoshin mentioned."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22060_DESCRIPTION":"You're surprised that the floors are soft. It seems like all of the flooring is made of woven leaves. You notice that Sakunoshin is going barefoot."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22061_DESCRIPTION":"The castle doesn't seem to be that big inside. That makes it easy to explore
column2: but the low ceilings make it hard to swing heavy weapons."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22062_DESCRIPTION":"You rush up the steps for a higher floor. The creaking of the stairways informs you that the castle is made of wood."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22063_DESCRIPTION":"Kagenui has caught up to you from behind
column2: and Genba
column3: the enemy leader
column4: is right ahead. But if you make it through this fight
column5: Suzune will be safe."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22070_DESCRIPTION":"Sakunoshin saved your life. That Phoenix Strike is terrifying
column2: but it won't be so easy to use with Sakunoshin around."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22071_DESCRIPTION":"You proceed over a roof made of bizarre tiles. You're so high up you couldn't help but look down. There's no coming back if you fall."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22072_DESCRIPTION":"You've made it far enough to see Raka
column2: but you face more foes than ever. Seria's eyes tell you that she'll handle it
column3: so you keep heading up."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22073_DESCRIPTION":"You don't have time to wait on Seria
column2: so you'll be facing Raka alone. It seems she won't use her Phoenix Strike
column3: but she's too strong to take lightly."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22074_DESCRIPTION":"This should be your last fight in the castle. You can sense more power from the Mystical Phoenix than any other sealed god so far. Give it your all!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22080_DESCRIPTION":"Suzune has asked you to investigate a monster with Kagenui. Sakunoshin also came along for some reason. Will that cause problems?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22090_DESCRIPTION":"Myoukei gave you a letter. When you had Sakunoshin read it
column2: it said to come to this field. What does this have to do with you?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_220_DESCRIPTION":"Your eyes haven't adjusted to the dark since coming in from the coast. Are Karl and the others OK?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_221_DESCRIPTION":"Dark forests like this are usually full of bandits. Is it that they work better in the Dark? Either way
column2: be careful."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_222_DESCRIPTION":"The discomfort you felt in the forests of Mistral is back
column2: but this time it's worse. Could this be the work of a time mage?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_223_DESCRIPTION":"It's hard telling which trees are just trees and not just monsters in hiding. If only you could escape this forest..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_224_DESCRIPTION":"The darkness has lightened. The exit should be close
column2: but there's tension in the air. Surely
column3: the sign of a formidable foe."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_22_DESCRIPTION":"You've come far
column2: but there's still no exit in site. There are supposed to be bandits in this area."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23000_DESCRIPTION":"The Abel Faction got here ahead of you
column2: but supposedly you're among the first humans ever to set foot here. No one knows what to expect."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23001_DESCRIPTION":"It seems you're on a vast
column2: flat grassland
column3: but there are stones scattered across the plains. You'll trip if you don't watch your step."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23002_DESCRIPTION":"Despite the excellent visibility
column2: the footing is poor. It's not a great place to fight
column3: but at least the climate is better than some you've endured."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23003_DESCRIPTION":"A gentle breeze stirs the grass at your feet. The birds in the sky seem like they're enjoying it
column2: too. Wait... Are those really birds?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23004_DESCRIPTION":"There's more rubble at your feet now
column2: and you can see a building somewhere far off. Dangerous enemies are often found lurking in areas like this..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23010_DESCRIPTION":"You hide from the magical puppets amid the shadows of the ruins. You don't know what the puppets were made for
column2: but they seem to be combat-ready."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23011_DESCRIPTION":"The ruins nearby are obviously too large to have been for human use. But why are they half-destroyed? Was there a battle here?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23012_DESCRIPTION":"The temperature is still nice
column2: but it's very dark inside the massive ruins. It feels even darker given the light outside
column3: and your eyes won't adapt."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23013_DESCRIPTION":"You've been discovered by the magical puppets. Judging by their response
column2: they don't mean to let you get away. It looks like you'll have to fight."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23020_DESCRIPTION":"You managed to escape from the puppets and arrived at a flooded sector. This section of the ruins looks even more degraded than the others."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23021_DESCRIPTION":"Once you get through the building with water up to your waist
column2: you find yourself walking on muddy ground. You don't want to spend very long here."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23022_DESCRIPTION":"The ruins are a jumble
column2: and there are several paths through them. Maybe one of them was easy to use once. You just want dry ground to walk on."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23023_DESCRIPTION":"You agreed to work with the Abel Faction in order to defeat the magical puppets. The plan is to form three teams of two and surround the puppets."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23030_DESCRIPTION":"Just as Reda said
column2: the way past here seems rather difficult. Still
column3: the magical puppets will catch you if you stop to complain."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23031_DESCRIPTION":"You attempt the challenging climb carefully. You don't sense anyone ahead of you. Did those two from the Abel Faction find another route?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23032_DESCRIPTION":"You stretch out to grab a stone
column2: then search for footing amid the waterfall's spray. It's slippery
column3: and you watch each other as you climb."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23033_DESCRIPTION":"Your almost-submerged waterfall climb is finally at an end. It's a major accomplishment
column2: but you feel like there had to have been an easier route."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23040_DESCRIPTION":"You reunite with Grahdens and advance along a sheer cliffside route. It's still extremely dangerous
column2: but much easier than the waterfall climb."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23041_DESCRIPTION":"You advance carefully along the narrowing red cliff route. Reda sometimes takes stone samples from the cliff walls; maybe they're unique to Rokkzalm?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23042_DESCRIPTION":"As you face off against the Abel Faction
column2: more enchanted puppets suddenly enter the fray. You'll have to handle them if you're going after Rahnas!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23050_DESCRIPTION":"You're concerned about Bertz and Lugina
column2: but you have to get back to the Sealed God mission. The cavernous temple before you is utterly silent."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23051_DESCRIPTION":"Supposedly this world itself is a Sealed God
column2: and apparently this temple is its center. You approach with caution as you seek the Sealed God's heart."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23052_DESCRIPTION":"Since they're ahead of you
column2: the Abel Faction has probably already reached this temple. Be careful
column3: attacks could come from any direction."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23053_DESCRIPTION":"This temple is clearly split into bright and dark locations
column2: and it seems this was deliberate. Who
column3: or what
column4: could've built this place?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23060_DESCRIPTION":"You felt someone watching you as you stepped into the temple's heart. Is this world itself watching you?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23061_DESCRIPTION":"The atmosphere is solemn
column2: and you can feel tension building with each step you take. It's definitely connected to whatever lies ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23062_DESCRIPTION":"Mel and Garrett are attempting to hold you back
column2: and combat seems unavoidable. You have to eliminate them both and catch up with Rahnas right away!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23063_DESCRIPTION":"You lost a lot of time fighting Mel and Garrett and now you have to hurry. Rahnas may have already reached the Sealed God's core."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23064_DESCRIPTION":"It won't be easy to face Rahnas unless you can fully defeat the enchanted puppet. It's a powerful foe
column2: but you can beat anything if you try!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23070_DESCRIPTION":"You were investigating a Sealed God signal with Grahdens when magical puppets emerged from the ground. You've got to break their encirclement!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_230_DESCRIPTION":"After escaping the pitch black forest
column2: you entered a vast wasteland. The area is being torn apart by lightning."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_231_DESCRIPTION":"You move forward as lightning strikes down all around you. Beware of incoming aerial attacks."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_232_DESCRIPTION":"You're nearing the center of the wastelands. Did Karl and his team successfully bring down the demon they were chasing?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_233_DESCRIPTION":"There's a temple barely visible in the distance. There's no sign of Karl
column2: what has happened to him..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_234_DESCRIPTION":"A summoned thunder king is blocking the path at the end of the wasteland. You must defeat him before continuing."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_23_DESCRIPTION":"Looks like you'll be able to leave this cave soon
column2: but there seems to be something sinister awaiting you at the end."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24000_DESCRIPTION":"Look up and you'll see a myriad of stars twinkling in the blue sky even in the daytime
column2: reflecting the many dragons flying overhead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24001_DESCRIPTION":"Bertz and the Abel Faction's objective is unclear
column2: but as Karl says
column3: one strategy may be to give priority to crushing their plans."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24002_DESCRIPTION":"Looking up at the stars under a blue sky is also something you feel you could get used to. You may come back for stargazing once everything's done."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24003_DESCRIPTION":"Red flickers are visible in the distance. Seems like it's time to say farewell to this hill of falling stars. Look sharp and let's move ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24010_DESCRIPTION":"The gods of Grand Gaia were surprised you came to this world
column2: and perhaps not so surprisingly
column3: you don't seem to be welcome. Prepare for a fight..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24011_DESCRIPTION":"The seal of Alza Masta...the role of the Sealed Gods... Too many things have become obvious. It might pay to reassess all the information."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24012_DESCRIPTION":"You make your way along a fire lit path. The power a Summoner needs to subdue the Pious Emperor Alza Masta...naturally you can't hide your shock."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24013_DESCRIPTION":"If you lack focus
column2: you'll risk falling into a grave of scorching flames. Forget about the conversation a moment ago and concentrate on the battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24014_DESCRIPTION":"You have come close to the foot of a mountain that emits lightning. You turn to the Dragon's Flame Tomb and feel a strong heat approaching..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24020_DESCRIPTION":"Lugina appeared to be a little stressed. Perhaps he can see ahead to what will happen if he can't stop Bertz."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24021_DESCRIPTION":"Amidst the flashes of light and resounding thunder
column2: in this place you're no longer able to think of anything other than the Dragon's Flame Tomb."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24022_DESCRIPTION":"As usual it was impossible to know what Bertz was thinking. It may be your imagination
column2: but there looked to be benevolence in his eyes."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24023_DESCRIPTION":"A rumbling sound fills your ears. It's not thunder
column2: this seems to be a roar. A battle with the owner of that voice may be unavoidable."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24030_DESCRIPTION":"A fantastic light is being reflected off the peaceful surface of the lake. This is a place where you want to take your time and enjoy the scenery."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24031_DESCRIPTION":"Not a ripple stirs on the surface
column2: and the view of the surrounding scenery reflected in the water is tranquility itself."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24032_DESCRIPTION":"It's quiet
column2: peaceful...you calm down more than necessary. This won't do. You need to stay alert in case of an enemy attack."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24040_DESCRIPTION":"What Bertz was after...and Rahnas's past. There's no point dwelling on it. Your first priority is to prevent Rahnas from getting hold of power."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24041_DESCRIPTION":"Like the lake
column2: this forest also makes you introspective. It's clear what you need to do now. Stop thinking about unnecessary things."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24042_DESCRIPTION":"Going along this dark trail for some reason makes you recall the paths you've traveled so far. When you think about it
column2: you've traveled many places."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24043_DESCRIPTION":"This forest doesn't have an especially strange atmosphere
column2: yet it feels like you've come to a very faraway place..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24044_DESCRIPTION":"While walking through the forest
column2: you recall your adventures so far and become lost in thought. You need to focus on the battle awaiting you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24050_DESCRIPTION":"Once you've passed through the forest
column2: a majestic temple-like structure appears before you. Could it be something that the gods of Grand Gaia created?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24051_DESCRIPTION":"The temple has comparatively little damage and is well maintained. Maybe those two gods you encountered in this world are taking care of it?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24052_DESCRIPTION":"You didn't expect to come across two Elder Summoners fighting Rahnas! Owen probably won't like it
column2: but back him up as Grahdens instructs."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24053_DESCRIPTION":"Rahnas was an even stronger opponent than you imagined. However
column2: Owen's strength seemed to be slightly superior. If you fight now
column3: you might win."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24060_DESCRIPTION":"No one could hide their surprise at Owen taking a severe wound. He's been treated now
column2: but you can't help but feel the scope of Rahnas's power."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24061_DESCRIPTION":"If Rahnas gains true Summoning power
column2: what does he intend to do with it? Bertz said he wanted to protect Elgaia
column3: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24062_DESCRIPTION":"You've let your mind wander again
column2: and that won't do. Clear your head and fix your attention on the battle happening right in front of you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24063_DESCRIPTION":"You've only just now noticed the beauty of this cave. With so much on your mind you're beginning to get tunnel vision. Stay alert."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24064_DESCRIPTION":"You have the uneasy feeling you're being watched from the darkness. To get through the cave
column2: probably your only option is to defeat a powerful foe."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24070_DESCRIPTION":"The power left behind after the Holy Emperor battled Ark in Ishgria lies deep within this place. You don't feel any aggression yet
column2: but..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24071_DESCRIPTION":"You've stopped the Sealed Gods from going berserk on many other worlds. Here that journey will likely come to an end. Just focus on what you must do."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24072_DESCRIPTION":"Rahnas is one step ahead of you. If your power is stolen
column2: a painful battle most likely awaits you. You have to stop him before that can happen!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24073_DESCRIPTION":"Rahnas has gained Karna Masta's power and it's formidable! But remember your battles in Grand Gaia and Ishgria
column2: and seize victory once again!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24074_DESCRIPTION":"The story of the Summoner who continued to fight alongside a goddess gives people hope. You can't let them down in this battle!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24080_DESCRIPTION":"The two gods who were cooperative until now have challenged you to a fight. Best to just comply with whatever is necessary for them to move forward."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_24090_DESCRIPTION":"You didn't expect to come up against Alza Masta again... Could this be the fated outcome of gaining Karna Masta's power...?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_240_DESCRIPTION":"There is a temple bathed in light. Despite it being thousands of years old
column2: it's as beautiful as the day it was built."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_241_DESCRIPTION":"You continue even deeper into the massive temple. You can make out the solemn silhouettes of pegasi standing about."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_242_DESCRIPTION":"You've nearly reached the middle of the temple. You can imagine the days when many would gather at this impressive alter."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_243_DESCRIPTION":"You can feel the enemies growing stronger the deeper you go. Unfortunately
column2: the only way to the Tower of Morgan is forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_244_DESCRIPTION":"You reached the temple's innermost area. A mighty swordsman awaits you
column2: and you can surely expect a fierce battle..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25000_DESCRIPTION":"The mission this time is to pursue Mel and Garrett. You never thought that would mean traveling all over Elgaia with Tilith."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25001_DESCRIPTION":"You meet Lugina and proceed into a barren grassland. You never knew there were parts of Elgaia like this. What happened here?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25002_DESCRIPTION":"This is a complete wasteland. It looks as though some massive power once shattered the land. The damage doesn't seem that old
column2: though..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25003_DESCRIPTION":"You thought you knew everything about Elgaia
column2: but it seems this journey will be as hard as the rest. Get ready to face a formidable foe."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25010_DESCRIPTION":"Mel and Garrett are ready for a fight to the end. You can't avoid fighting
column2: even if just to back them off. It's not the first time
column3: but be careful!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25011_DESCRIPTION":"Neither Mel nor Garrett
column2: nor even Bertz would listen to you. There really shouldn't have been any need for combat."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25012_DESCRIPTION":"The area around you is devastated. Lugina said it wasn't due to the demons of Ishgria. But if it wasn't demons
column2: what was it?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25020_DESCRIPTION":"You can't allow the demon to go free. You have to get Mel to stop standing in your way somehow
column2: and hurry after Garrett!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25021_DESCRIPTION":"Mel is coming along complacently. You're glad you didn't have to restrain her
column2: but her behavior seems a bit odd."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25022_DESCRIPTION":"Perhaps it's because you weren't a great student
column2: but you've never heard about any demons appearing here. The information may have been suppressed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25023_DESCRIPTION":"How many years will it be until this region is habitable once again? You must stop the demon's resurrection
column2: at any cost."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25030_DESCRIPTION":"According to Bertz
column2: Mel is an artificially-created human. Yet you can't help but treat her as a person
column3: and Tilith seems to approve."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25031_DESCRIPTION":"You've seen countless ruins throughout Grand Gaia. Though it seems to have been a while since this place was destroyed
column2: it still feels lively."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25032_DESCRIPTION":"If the demon is revived
column2: more places like this town will come to be. And in Elgaia
column3: it will affect so many people!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25040_DESCRIPTION":"You were shocked to learn that Lugina and Bertz were born in this region. Both probably have terrifying memories of the demon that destroyed it."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25041_DESCRIPTION":"Bertz's desire to prevent another such tragedy is pure. For all that's happened
column2: you can probably still reach an understanding with him."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25042_DESCRIPTION":"You have to stop Garrett's plan no matter what. Countless people will be harmed if the demon awakens. You have to prevent that no matter what."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25050_DESCRIPTION":"Mel says she intends to obey Garrett when he speaks of Rahnas's wishes. Did she choose to do so of her own accord?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25051_DESCRIPTION":"Garrett laid his trap meticulously. All you can say is that you're impressed
column2: given how badly injured he was when he set it up."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25052_DESCRIPTION":"You sense a repulsive presence. It's definitely distinct from the other demons you've faced. You're probably close to where it's sealed; keep moving."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_25053_DESCRIPTION":"You face the demon after it absorbs Garrett's life energy
column2: but you have no fear. You're not fighting for the past. This is for the future."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_250_DESCRIPTION":"You see ruins as you escape from the temple. It seems that whatever existed here before was destroyed by a great power."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_251_DESCRIPTION":"As you proceed
column2: you realize the ruins cover a large area. It must have been a large city before."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_252_DESCRIPTION":"You've come to a plaza in the middle of the ruins. An enormous church embodies the former power of this devastated city."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_253_DESCRIPTION":"Leaving the church
column2: you continue through the ruins. The temple was so beautifully preserved
column3: what could've happened here?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_254_DESCRIPTION":"You reached the ruins' end. The majestic Tower of Morgan stands before you. However
column2: a knight in thick armor awaits..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_260_DESCRIPTION":"Don't let Karl and Seria's wishes go to waste. Ascend the tower quickly and track down Abaddon and Graham!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_261_DESCRIPTION":"This tower is like a gigantic fortress. The spiral stairs that surround its vast outer walls are the only way up..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_262_DESCRIPTION":"Is this only the halfway point? You can still hear the cries from the fierce battle raging below... It's time to hurry."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_263_DESCRIPTION":"Past the halfway point
column2: warriors summoned by Maxwell and Abaddon block the path. There's no turning back now."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_264_DESCRIPTION":"The Stairway to the Heavens has narrowed. You can no longer hear the shouts from the base. You're almost there."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_265_DESCRIPTION":"You've reached the top at last. Continue on and defeat Abaddon and Graham
column2: you can't let Karl and the others down!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_2_DESCRIPTION":"Memorize the strengths and weaknesses of each elements and how to trigger the Brave Burst!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000000_DESCRIPTION":"Welcome to a special dungeon created in honor of Brave Frontier's 1 year anniversary. Tough enemies await you to help you remember the good 'ol days!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000010_DESCRIPTION":"A system Noel created in order to help Summoners train themselves. Strong opponents will attack any challenger that steps before them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000011_DESCRIPTION":"A system Noel created in order to help Summoners train themselves. Strong opponents will attack any challenger that steps before them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000012_DESCRIPTION":"A system Noel created in order to help Summoners train themselves. Strong opponents will attack any challenger that steps before them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000013_DESCRIPTION":"A system Noel created in order to help Summoners train themselves. Strong opponents will attack any challenger that steps before them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000014_DESCRIPTION":"A system Noel created in order to help Summoners train themselves. Strong opponents will attack any challenger that steps before them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000015_DESCRIPTION":"A system Noel created in order to help Summoners train themselves. Strong opponents will attack any challenger that steps before them."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000100_DESCRIPTION":"A new training program to test your abilities. Find an opening to strike your opponents and break their impregnable defenses!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000180_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Fire Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000181_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Fire Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000190_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Water Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here
column2: your summoning skills will be tested."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000191_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Water Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here
column2: your summoning skills will be tested."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000200_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Earth Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000201_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Earth Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000210_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Thunder Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here
column2: your summoning skills will be tested."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000211_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Thunder Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here
column2: your summoning skills will be tested."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000220_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Light Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here
column2: your summoning skills will be tested."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000221_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Light Units. How will you beat your foes under such conditions? Here
column2: your summoning skills will be tested."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000230_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Dark Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000231_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Dark Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000240_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Units of 6-star rarity or below. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000241_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to Units of 6-star rarity or below. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000250_DESCRIPTION":"A short trial program to test attacks. All foes will self-destruct in 3 turns
column2: so try to inflict as much damage as possible on them before they do!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000260_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000261_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000262_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000263_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000264_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000265_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000266_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000267_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000268_DESCRIPTION":"This trial will test your limits until you use the last of your strength. Adapt to every situation thrown at you and use your most formidable defense!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000270_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to male Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000271_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to male Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000280_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to female Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000281_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program exclusive to female Units. Use the Units at your disposal to face off against powerful opponents!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000290_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program made for Grand Gaia adventurers. Fight foe after foe until you reach the strongest opponent awaiting you!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000291_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program made for Grand Gaia adventurers. Fight foe after foe until you reach the strongest opponent awaiting you!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000300_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program made for Ishgria adventurers. Fight foe after foe until you reach the strongest opponent awaiting you!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000301_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program made for Ishgria adventurers. Fight foe after foe until you reach the strongest opponent awaiting you!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000310_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Thunder and Light type Units. Choose wisely and get as far as you can!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000311_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Thunder and Light type Units. Choose wisely and get as far as you can!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000312_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Thunder and Light type Units. Choose wisely and get as far as you can!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000320_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Fire and Dark type Units. Choose wisely and get as far as you can!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000321_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Fire and Dark type Units. Choose wisely and get as far as you can!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000322_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Fire and Dark type Units. Choose wisely and get as far as you can!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000330_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Water and Earth type Units. Test your limits under these demanding restrictions!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000331_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Water and Earth type Units. Test your limits under these demanding restrictions!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000332_DESCRIPTION":"A trial program where you fight to the end using only Water and Earth type Units. Test your limits under these demanding restrictions!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000340_DESCRIPTION":"A training program that tests the number of Sparks before you defeat a specified foe. Test the limits of your Units' Spark ability!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000350_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000351_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000352_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000353_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000354_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000355_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000356_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000357_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000358_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000359_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000360_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000361_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000362_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000363_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3000364_DESCRIPTION":"A system created to test your limits and endurance. Do the best you can against the never-ending hordes of foes coming your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_300_DESCRIPTION":"You're now in Maxwell's stronghold
column2: St. Lamia. Many tall mountains are visible in the distance. The land looks rugged."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_301_DESCRIPTION":"Magma is gushing out all over
column2: and it's scorching hot as far as the eye can see. Nothing could possibly live here."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_302_DESCRIPTION":"It's getting hotter and hotter as you near the mouth of the volcano. It's getting hard to even move..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_303_DESCRIPTION":"You finally made it through the pass. The intense heat hasn't gone
column2: but at least it's all downhill from here. Hurry on ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_304_DESCRIPTION":"Just as you were about to escape the volcano
column2: it seems an undead beast is blocking your path..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_30_DESCRIPTION":"You've emerged into a blizzard. It's so cold
column2: watch out for enemies with water attacks."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_310_DESCRIPTION":"You've emerged from the base of a mountain. Now it's intensely cold
column2: and it seems to be taking its toll on Tilith. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_311_DESCRIPTION":"Unlike the Volcano Eldent
column2: this blizzard-covered sacred mountain has many steep cliffs. Watch your step."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_312_DESCRIPTION":"This place is also inhabitable. It's doubtful anyone could even last a minute around here. Hurry on ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_313_DESCRIPTION":"Around the summit
column2: stones are stacked in a alter-like pattern. Is this proof that the mountain was a place of worship?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_314_DESCRIPTION":"The summit is in sight
column2: and you've spotted the altar. The end is near
column3: but there are signs of a beast nearby..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_31_DESCRIPTION":"You are making progress
column2: but the end of the snowscape still isn't visible. Don't forget to plan for water enemies."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_320_DESCRIPTION":"Beyond the sacred mountain lies the Blood Forest. Tilith is acting a bit odd
column2: though
column3: she might be sick..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_321_DESCRIPTION":"A sea of red surrounds you as you walk through this forest. The grass
column2: the flowers
column3: everythings red. What's the meaning of this?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_322_DESCRIPTION":"You continue deeper into the crimson forest. Suddenly
column2: drops as red as blood fall down on you from the trees above."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_323_DESCRIPTION":"You feel your senses numbing as you're enveloped in a sea of red. It's probably not a good idea to stick around here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_324_DESCRIPTION":"You've finally reached the end of the crimson forest. You see a color other than red and race towards it."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_32_DESCRIPTION":"You've reached the center of the icy field. Beware
column2: apparently there are pirates about on the ice..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_330_DESCRIPTION":"You're halfway through St. Lamia
column2: and Tilith's deteriorating condition has worsened. It's time to hurry."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_331_DESCRIPTION":"Mt. Wistorea is the steepest in the area
column2: but its calm weather makes it the most comfortable environment so far."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_332_DESCRIPTION":"Hold off the hordes of giants as you move forward. You can't waste time with Tilith's current condition."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_333_DESCRIPTION":"The Thunderbird circles above
column2: letting out a piercing cry. You've no choice but to confront it and take it down."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_334_DESCRIPTION":"You can make out St. Lamia Palace in the distance
column2: but the roar of a beast from the foothills nearby are concerning..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_33_DESCRIPTION":"The end of this cold snow field has come into view at last. However
column2: it seems one of Maxwell's knights is waiting just ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_340_DESCRIPTION":"You come across a clearing bathed in a dazzling light
column2: but as Tilith's curse is growing stronger there is no time to enjoy it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_341_DESCRIPTION":"This area is obviously sacred
column2: bathed in light and covered in green
column3: but being so close to St. Lamia Palace surely strong foes await."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_342_DESCRIPTION":"Without provocation
column2: hordes of shining demons swoop down on you. These demons must've been called upon by Maxwell..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_343_DESCRIPTION":"Seems even a holy goddess has been called on to block your path. However
column2: you must defeat her and press on if you're to save Tilith."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_344_DESCRIPTION":"The exit is in sight
column2: but a giant entity can be seen swooping down from the heavens
column3: possibly to deliver your final trial..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_350_DESCRIPTION":"In a complete change of scenery
column2: you come across a dark
column3: rancid cave. Pass through this
column4: and St. Lamia Palace awaits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_351_DESCRIPTION":"This cave not only looks horrid
column2: but is also full to the brim with fearsome beings. You mustn't lose focus here or else."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_352_DESCRIPTION":"There is a nagging chill in the air
column2: though it isn't necessarily cold. Could it be this malicious air that surrounds you?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_353_DESCRIPTION":"It seems you've reached the dark
column2: damp reaches of this hellish cave. Follow the wind to find your way out."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_354_DESCRIPTION":"You seem to have finally figured your way out of the cave
column2: but all of the sudden an unsettling evil presence descends upon you..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_360_DESCRIPTION":"You've finally reached Maxwell's stronghold. You continue forward
column2: having vowed to Tilith to destroy this depraved god."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_361_DESCRIPTION":"This castle once was revered for its majesty. While still impressive
column2: it's surrounded in a sinister atmosphere."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_362_DESCRIPTION":"As expected
column2: Maxwell has filled her base with incredibly powerful beings. Liberating them is going to be difficult."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_363_DESCRIPTION":"You've entered the castle's banquet hall. The sacred walls reek of wickedness
column2: but you mustn't hesitate. Advance
column3: for Tilith!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_364_DESCRIPTION":"You can feel the fallen god's presence grow stronger as you proceed. However
column2: surely she has set up a powerful defensive line before her."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_365_DESCRIPTION":"At last
column2: you've reached Maxwell. The battle to save Tilith and destroy the first of the four fallen gods begins now..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_3_DESCRIPTION":"Practice combat while using everything you've learned!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_400_DESCRIPTION":"Amdahl
column2: one of the islands in the Palmyna Archipelago which is ruled over by Cardes the Malevolent. A town can be seen near the entrance
column3: having been devastated by war. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_401_DESCRIPTION":"Past the damaged houses lies nothing but fiery ruins. Could these flames be the work of monsters?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_402_DESCRIPTION":"You can feel the flames growing stronger. This might be a sign that something dangerous is waiting ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_403_DESCRIPTION":"When lightning strikes it sometimes ignites the earth where it hits. The force that controls the lightning and flames has set their aim on you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_404_DESCRIPTION":"A figure watches you from the shadows as you attempt to leave the village. It seems all the intense fighting has attracted the attention of a fire god."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_40_DESCRIPTION":"Beyond the snow lie the forests that the sun doesn't reach. Beware
column2: there are signs of monsters are all around."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_410_DESCRIPTION":"Monsters snarl in unison as they scheme to make you their main dish at this ghost ship party."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_411_DESCRIPTION":"What could be waiting unbeknownst to history in this ship that appeared so long ago? You can't deny your curiosity."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_412_DESCRIPTION":"You can hear a water dragon's roar even from inside the ship. Is this howl meant to get rid of those who disturb the souls of the dead crew members?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_413_DESCRIPTION":"As you try to escape the ghost ship to investigate
column2: a frigid swordsman appears before you
column3: along with his sword techniques which can turn anything to ice."
