column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_414_DESCRIPTION":"It seems you must leave Amdahl if you are to defeat Cardes
column2: but before that you need to escape the ghost ship."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_41_DESCRIPTION":"This monster-packed forest just goes on forever. Everything's the same
column2: seems like you're walking in circles..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_420_DESCRIPTION":"You stop in a field
column2: surprised by a mysterious man who now blocks your path. There's no time to loiter
column3: you need to shake your fear and push ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_421_DESCRIPTION":"On your way toward Amdahl Castle
column2: an incredibly graceful figure appears before you. Vanquish it and move ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_422_DESCRIPTION":"You've come to a prairie covered in trees and shrubs
column2: but what is that lurking in the shadows
column3: seemingly ready to strike..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_423_DESCRIPTION":"Nearing a pond at the edge of the prairie
column2: some Water Nymphs stand in your way as if they're protecting something. What could it be?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_424_DESCRIPTION":"On your way from the prairie
column2: someone has been sent to block your path. Carefully proceed forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_42_DESCRIPTION":"It's said that bandits occupy this forest. They may be tough
column2: but there's no way to avoid them."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_430_DESCRIPTION":"After parting with Karl and Seria you proceed through the mines. Making your way through the monster infested tunnels
column2: you come across a decaying bridge."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_431_DESCRIPTION":"It seems the demon Graham who escaped from Mistral has shown up around here. Could this strong presence coming from ahead be him? Or maybe..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_432_DESCRIPTION":"Continuing through the mines
column2: you occasionally hear the sound of thunder. Whether it's natural or the roar of some thunder beast
column3: surely you'll find out soon."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_433_DESCRIPTION":"The center of the mine is full of traps. Blades are also quickly flashing about. Eliminate those who stand in your way and advance!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_434_DESCRIPTION":"A sanctuary can be seen shining just beyond the mine. The exit seems to be within reach. All you have to do is defeat the enemies before you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_43_DESCRIPTION":"Dangerous hunters wielding longbows inhabit the depths of this forest
column2: and they attack anyone who dares enter."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_440_DESCRIPTION":"According to a mysterious old man
column2: this sanctuary holds information on the Four Heroes of Old. Take a quick detour and check it out. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_441_DESCRIPTION":"A warrior carrying a massive sword appears before you as you're searching for information on the Four Heroes. He swings at you as he approaches."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_442_DESCRIPTION":"The sunlight shining on the sanctuary is as pleasant as Tilith said it would be
column2: but who is this coming in to bathe in the light the same as she would have..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_443_DESCRIPTION":"A gunshot suddenly echoes through the solemn sanctuary interior. As startled as you are
column2: you see a shining marksman before you. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_444_DESCRIPTION":"There doesn't seem to be any particularly important information in the sanctuary. It's time to end your detour and set your sites back on Amdahl Castle."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_450_DESCRIPTION":"According to Karl and Seria
column2: Graham has already left this place. However
column3: you should still be cautious as you proceed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_451_DESCRIPTION":"The remains of a city thought to have at one time prided itself on its extravagance. It seems someone is controlling the spirits who would otherwise be at rest here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_452_DESCRIPTION":"Your senses suddenly heighten. Could it be this intense blood-thirsty presence you feel up ahead? It's already too late to turn back."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_453_DESCRIPTION":"You pick up an item while advancing through the destroyed city. It's a powerful magic barrier
column2: the likes of which have never been seen."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_454_DESCRIPTION":"As you exit Edila you're able to see the entrance to Amdahl Castle
column2: but suddenly
column3: a figure consumed by darkness blocks your way forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_460_DESCRIPTION":"Amdahl Castle
column2: where vengeful ghosts of the past are said to reside. Through here is the only way to get to Palmyna
column3: the land sealed away by Cardes the Malevolent."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_461_DESCRIPTION":"According to Elder Grah
column2: a vengeful ghost that resents humans lives here. Still
column3: you mustn't lose your way
column4: even if only to prevent yourself from becoming a ghost as well."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_462_DESCRIPTION":"The beautifully decorated interior of the castle suggests that at one time many an extravagant banquet was held here. But all relics aside
column2: it's time to head further inside."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_463_DESCRIPTION":"There is light and darkness wherever you go. But still
column2: where did the darkness in the Amdahl Empire come from? There's probably no longer anyone around that knows."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_464_DESCRIPTION":"The end of Amdahl
column2: the first island in the Palmyna Archipelago
column3: is within sight. However
column4: there are still some rather troublesome enemies about..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_465_DESCRIPTION":"You sense a strikingly ominous presence coming from the path ahead. What awaits you isn't a god like before
column2: but some being with a strong resentment toward humans."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000000_DESCRIPTION":"Shortly after defeating Maxwell
column2: one of the Four Fallen Gods
column3:
Karl suddenly appears to ask the Summoner's help in defeating a dragon.
Not only is this dragon quite strong
column4:
but it is said to flee the second it senses danger.
The Summoner and Karl plan a strategy to prevent the dragon from running away
column5: when suddenly..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000001_DESCRIPTION":"After the crisis in Cordelica
column2: the Summoner and Karl run into Lugina
column3:
who has a special request from Summoners' Hall.
He says they are to survey a great forest where the treasure of an empress is hidden.
The Summoner and Lugina take different routes to reach the same forest
column4: but end up running into each other on a third route where they spot Paris..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000002_DESCRIPTION":"Not long after defeating Zevalhua
column2: one of the Four Fallen gods
column3: Karl and Seria show up to ask the Summoner for help in defeating Graham
column4:
the demon they have been after for so many years.
As the three of them reach the region Graham oversees
column5: many of his sly traps lie in waiting unbeknownst to them."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000003_DESCRIPTION":"After defeating Maxwell
column2: the Summoner receives an urgent request from Akras Summoners' Hall. The Demon Algmos has been spotted and a squad has been sent to slay him
column3: but Seria ignored orders and went to seek him out alone. The Hall wants you to bring her back safely.It seems Algmos's decimation of a squad Seria had led in the past started it all..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000004_DESCRIPTION":"After facing Lucius
column2: the Summoner receives a request from Elder Grahdens.He wants the Summoner to defeat the Demon Mashreed as a training exercise. However
column3: Mashreed is not the only demon in the area
column4: as there are many others in the mix.Grahdens is ready to wipe the floor with these demons
column5: but it seems he has some particular expectations in mind."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000005_DESCRIPTION":"Shortly after defeating Maxwell
column2: one of the Four Fallen Gods
column3: the Summoner receives a mission from Lin. She wants to use her mechanical tools to survey a territory that seems to be connected to Grand Gaia
column4: and wants the Summoner to act as her bodyguard. Thus
column5: the two leave together on their journey
column6: unexpectedly running into many monsters along the way..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000006_DESCRIPTION":"Having defeated Lucius
column2: Paris takes a moment to herself in the Imperial Library when Noel appears. He says there is a place where she can find her true self
column3: and thus she sets off on a journey there. While on her way
column4: she runs into the Summoner who's in the area
column5: though she decides to continue on her own. However
column6: another sudden meeting turns the tables..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000007_DESCRIPTION":"Moments after defeating the sealed god Lucius
column2: Noel sends the Summoner on a mission along with Lugina. However
column3: the demon they are after has the ability to reflect the souls of its opponents
column4: unexpectedly drawing Lugina into a fierce battle with his doppelganger. Meanwhile
column5: Karl is on a mission in the area under orders from Grahdens

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000008_DESCRIPTION":"During the great war with the gods
column2: Palmyna suffers an invasion from the troops led by Cardes the Malevolent. With the kingdom facing a terrible danger
column3: Princess Edea dons the enchanted armor Lafdranya and sets off on a journey to meet companions Lorand
column4: Loch
column5: and Dean. Together they join the rest of the royal army and head towards the last battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000009_DESCRIPTION":"After a fierce battle
column2: Edea and her friends succeed in sealing Cardes away. However
column3: the price paid to accomplish this was far too high
column4: as Princess Edea has fallen into a deep slumber. Having been scattered in different directions by Edea's powers
column5: her friends begin regrouping in order to save her. The three believe there is still hope."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500000_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Crush every enemy you encounter to increase your innermost potential!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000010_DESCRIPTION":"Not long before the great war with the gods
column2: a young lady from the La Veda Republic called Michele witnessed a strange dark object fall from the sky. After meeting Duel-GX and learning that it has come from another world chasing the winged armor \"Melchio
column3: \" which had been destroying neighboring towns
column4: Michele begins her journey to destroy Melchio..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000011_DESCRIPTION":"Not long after Maxwell's defeat
column2: Noah and the Summoner decide to accept a new Raid mission. However
column3: since Elise has taken the day off from her duties as the receptionist
column4: she's not there. Owen then suddenly appears to report that a demon has appeared on the mountain where Elise and her friends are having a picnic. She must be saved as soon as possible..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000012_DESCRIPTION":"Just before the great war with the gods
column2: the Guardians of Meirith receive new orders. They travel to Ishgria in order to defeat the demon Ragruvord
column3: who is attempting to invade Grand Gaia. However
column4: before they can confront him
column5: a messenger appears from the gods. They hear that someone is after Karna Masta
column6: and are ordered to return to Grand Gaia immediately."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000013_DESCRIPTION":"The 7 leaders of the Akras Summoners' Hall Demon Slayers--Griff
column2: Iris
column3: Kafka
column4: Rhoa
column5: Libera
column7: and Mirfah--head to the world of Ishgria to survey the land. However
column8: they face an enormous demon soon after arriving. Their leader
column10: goes after the demon alone. As acting commander
column11: Krantz leads the rest to where the return gate should be

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000014_DESCRIPTION":"It began not long after Maxwell was defeated... Sera had always been serious
column2: but she had begun to make odd statements to herself while lost in thought. Lin happened to overhear her while passing by and became fixated on the changes in Sera. Lin soon reached a conclusion
column3: then invited Elise and the Summoner to follow Sera after work one day..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000015_DESCRIPTION":"In the closing days of the war between gods and humanity
column2: Reed
column3: Lucana
column4: and Aneil attempted to save survivors. They led the people with them as they headed for Mistral
column5: the site of the promised land. The group encountered Rhein
column8: and together they managed to make it to where the promised land was just ahead. But Mistral was also home to a threatening presence..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5000016_DESCRIPTION":"During the final stages of the war against the gods
column2: the Bariura Empire is surrounded by the God Army. As the capital crumbles before their eyes
column3: Sirius and the first princess Selvia decide to act to protect the imperial family's legacy. However
column4: their plan could result in national unrest
column5: which drives Sirius to question whether he should go forth with it..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500001_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Defeat incoming enemies to see your innermost potential soar!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500002_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Defeat all foes standing in your way and develop your battle strength!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500020_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to hone the Summoning Arts. Defeat all foes in your way to grow more proficient!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500021_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to hone the Summoning Arts. Exterminate all foes heading towards you to hone your techniques!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500022_DESCRIPTION":"A battle simulator designed to hone your Summoning skills. Defeat all foes standing in your way to hone your techniques!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500040_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Vanquish all incoming enemies to develop your skills!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500041_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Destroy any enemies on the field to test your weapons' limits!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500042_DESCRIPTION":"A battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Defeat all foes standing in your way and seize further power!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500060_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Destroy all foes before you and allow your true talents to shine!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500061_DESCRIPTION":"A special battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Crush all foes after you and watch yourself grow in the process!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500062_DESCRIPTION":"A battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Defeat all foes standing in your way and go beyond your own limits!"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5008001_DESCRIPTION":"The relics of Athensphere have yielded interesting results. Noel\u2019s thirst for knowledge has the summoner searching for a particular figure in the memory gear\u2026"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5008011_DESCRIPTION":"The Summoner is --

Wel\u0335l
column2:
\u0340t\u0327ha\u0335t\u0340 wasn't so\u0362 di\u0328f\u0337f\u0315icul\u0315t. Tha\u0337t\u0340 annoying Voidling ma\u0360de it seem \u0327like a bi\u035fg deal.\u035f

I will bring peace to \u0322t\u035dh\u035cis universe at l\u0361o\u0315n\u0340g la\u0337s\u0341t\u031b... an\u0337d \u034fnot\u0334hi\u0315n\u0361g \u0322shal\u0322l\u0362 stop me t\u0328hi\u0327s\u0361 \u0321ti\u0361m\u0328e\u035d.\u0360"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_500_DESCRIPTION":"Encervis
column2: the second island in the Palmyna Archipelago. You first come across its scorching hot volcanic ash covered hills."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_501_DESCRIPTION":"As you head toward Cardes
column2: your way is blocked by nymphs and dragons that command the power of fire. Their presence is like that of an overwhelming pillar of flames. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_502_DESCRIPTION":"You can hear the cry of not one beast but many coming from the fiery hills. Who could possibly command such fearful roars?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_503_DESCRIPTION":"Fire has both the power to incinerate everything and to restore life. Harnessing these powers
column2: fallen gods continue to roam these lands as they always have."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_504_DESCRIPTION":"As you cross over the ash stained hills
column2: a figure blanketed in black flames appears before you. A smile comes across your face
column3: delighted to have come across such a warrior."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_50_DESCRIPTION":"Lightning occasionally roars throughout this damp land. It's quite unpleasant here. Prepare yourself for thunder."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_510_DESCRIPTION":"You cross over the ash covered hills to find a beautiful lakeside. However
column2: before you can rest another horde of new monsters appear before you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_511_DESCRIPTION":"As you're searching the lakeside
column2: you suddenly see a great shadow on the surface of the water. It's likely the ruler of Lake Aldela."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_512_DESCRIPTION":"While gazing upon the beautiful lake
column2: you hear a lovely singing voice. However you mustn't be seduced by it
column3: because the being it's coming from surely isn't human."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_513_DESCRIPTION":"You proceed alongside the lake
column2: headed toward the Sky Fort. Alongside the light of the sun being reflected off the lake is the reflection of a single icy blade."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51400_DESCRIPTION":"The Guardians of Meirith receive new divine orders. They are to depart for Ishgria
column2: to defeat the demon Ragruvord."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51401_DESCRIPTION":"Just before facing the demon
column2: a new demon's presence becomes known. Moreover
column3: this new deity appears to be a threat to Karna Masta."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51402_DESCRIPTION":"The group decides Fadahl and the siblings will return
column2: and the other three will slay the demon. They promise to reunite later
column3: and head for battle."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51403_DESCRIPTION":"After some discussion
column2: Quaid
column3: Diana
column4: and Ivris decide to return to see how things are developing. However
column5: something still seems off..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51404_DESCRIPTION":"Shusui appears before Fadahl
column2: Claire
column3: and Colt as they search for the Gate to Grand Gaia
column4: and attacks without giving any warning or reason."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51405_DESCRIPTION":"Fadahl is concerned for Claire
column2: but she has already cast off her doubts. Just as they move forward with new resolve
column3: Shusui appears before them again."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51406_DESCRIPTION":"Fadahl and the others sense the presence of the gate to Grand Gaia. However
column2: Shusui's dogged pursuit hinders their progress."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51407_DESCRIPTION":"Shusui states that he will let the group go for now
column2: and vanishes. Reaffirmed in their mission
column3: Fadahl and the others enter the gate to Grand Gaia."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51408_DESCRIPTION":"Shusui appears before Quaid's team as they search for a gate to Grand Gaia. They fight with all their might in order to shake off their pursuer."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51409_DESCRIPTION":"Ivris notices the change in Diana's attitude toward Quaid. Meanwhile
column2: Quaid keenly senses Shusui's continued pursuit."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51410_DESCRIPTION":"Ivris is concerned by the lack of progress in Quaid and Diana's relationship. Then
column2: as Quaid attempts to clarify the matter
column3: Shusui appears."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51411_DESCRIPTION":"Shusui states that he will let the group go for now
column2: and vanishes. The three prepare themselves to face what enemy awaits them in Grand Gaia."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51412_DESCRIPTION":"After Shusui sees through his doubts
column2: Quaid halts his return to Grand Gaia and rejoins the group to help. All to overcome a sense of trouble ahead..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51413_DESCRIPTION":"Demons and gods have met in Ishgria. The demons speak to the gods
column2: but the gods do not respond. Both sides' plots go into motion."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51414_DESCRIPTION":"Graham and the Guardians meet
column2: and after they battle
column3: he seems to be defeated. However
column4: Graham is utterly unconcerned as he departs."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51415_DESCRIPTION":"Feeling the plan has failed
column2: Quaid tells Diana and Ivris to flee. However
column3: there is no way the two can accept that order."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51416_DESCRIPTION":"Everything has gone as the gods planned. The Guardians are split up
column2: and destined to die on separate battlefields."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51417_DESCRIPTION":"Quaid and the others survived slaying the demon Ragruvord
column2: but records do not state that they returned to Grand Gaia."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51418_DESCRIPTION":"Colt is still hostile toward Quaid. While Claire is out scouting
column2: Fadahl tells Colt about Quaid."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51419_DESCRIPTION":"Quaid's decision causes the gods' plot to collapse. With all members present
column2: the Guardians of Meirith face their foes to protect one another."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51420_DESCRIPTION":"The Guardians of Meirith survive their battle with the gods
column2: and reaffirm their bonds with each other. As they do
column3: a lone demon appears before them."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_514_DESCRIPTION":"The path toward the old castle is open before you on the other side of the lake. However before you waits a sea god
column2: wearing a fearless smile."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_51_DESCRIPTION":"It looks to be a vast wetland. The terrain may prove more troublesome than the thunder-wielding enemies hiding in it."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5200000_DESCRIPTION":"Under Lucius's orders
column2: Tilith
column3: Karl
column4: and Seria travel to another world to defeat a demon
column5: but they're somehow unable to return. Grahdens believes this is connected to the demon which appeared right after they had crossed over
column9: they unexpectedly run into three otherworldly beings on the way..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_5200002_DESCRIPTION":"The Akras Summoners' Hall has been notified of the appearance of a great god-like presence from another world
column2: so the Summoner and Grahdens head towards it. There they run into Karl and Seria
column3: who are protecting people who fight for humanity in their home world amidst a  war among multitudes of gods. The Summoners must now help these girls get back home."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_520_DESCRIPTION":"Now knowing how dangerous the Sky Fort really is
column2: you must put all you have into taking it down per Elder Grah's request."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_521_DESCRIPTION":"The Sky Fort is still far off. A faint magical power lingers in the pleasantly windblown air within the old castle. What could it be?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_522_DESCRIPTION":"One can feel the history of Castle Avenia in all its elegance. After its original lord perished
column2: a new royal family settled in. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_523_DESCRIPTION":"Among the many remaining legendary epics
column2: there is a tale of a young boy who saved the World Tree. Could this be what has shown itself just now?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_524_DESCRIPTION":"An otherworldly warrior with some tricks up his sleeve blocks your exit from the old castle. He attacks with an indiscriminate barrage of gunfire!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_52_DESCRIPTION":"Seems there are bandits around here
column2: too. They used to call the skies their own
column3: but what strength that must've taken..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_530_DESCRIPTION":"There is a rumor about a monster that lives in this ravine that turns everything it sees into stone. There are few who view this widely known ghost story as being true."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_531_DESCRIPTION":"As a stiff wind blows down on you from the ravine making it difficult to even stand
column2: in an instant the sky grows dark. You look up to see something hovering above you..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_532_DESCRIPTION":"You look below to see a horrifyingly deep ravine. A thunderous roar can be heard from deep beneath. A single massive eye peeks at you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_533_DESCRIPTION":"Two beasts block your path forward through the Gadillian Ravine. One has an enormous body
column2: while the other is a wild and beastly warrior."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_534_DESCRIPTION":"In this harshly windblown wasteland exists a lone warrior whose solitary lifestyle aptly befits their surroundings."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_53_DESCRIPTION":"At the end of these unpleasant wetlands the way is blocked by a former hero of Grand Gaia who was summoned by Maxwell."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_540_DESCRIPTION":"Karl and Seria
column2: will those two be able to fight their way out of this predicament? There's no time to worry as a monster with a taste for mischief appears before you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_541_DESCRIPTION":"There is a solemn atmosphere in the mausoleum where the natives pray to their god of light. However
column2: there isn't enough time to investigate this supposed god any further..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_542_DESCRIPTION":"You progress through the Alman Mausoleum
column2: keeping your eye on the Sky Fort. Sensing a strong presence
column3: you turn to find a warrior waving a large sword."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_543_DESCRIPTION":"One's belonging to the light is not set in stone. This is because one can never be fully clear that their principles are just. One must prove their righteousness with their blade."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_544_DESCRIPTION":"What could that knight be thinking? How could anyone who fought and died for humanity's sake find themselves fighting for the gods!?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_550_DESCRIPTION":"You feel the ominous presence of countless lost souls wandering about the area. What could this evil force be amidst the sorrowful howls?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_551_DESCRIPTION":"A devilish presence stands before you as a hazardous obstacle in your path. Be careful not to get seduced into a vulnerable state."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_552_DESCRIPTION":"Monsters rush at you as if under some sort of spell. This appears to be a challenge from one who possesses power that transcends even death."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_553_DESCRIPTION":"Resentment is one of the strongest emotions people have. Though it can sometimes be used as a motivating force to accomplish a goal
column2: there are few who desire it."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_554_DESCRIPTION":"You look up to see the Sky Fort! Have faith in Tilith and push your way through this final obstacle!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_560_DESCRIPTION":"Escape the Sky Fort for the sake of the wounded Tilith and those who stand guard over her! Mow down any who stand in your way!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_561_DESCRIPTION":"Hordes of monsters are blocking your path. Defeat them all as you advance forth! You've nearly made your way to Zebra!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_562_DESCRIPTION":"The monsters' aggression grows stronger as if they're trying to buy time for Zebra to recover from the wounds he was dealt during his battle with Tilith."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_563_DESCRIPTION":"Your enemies' aggression continues to grow
column2: but as long as your comrades are behind you there's no choice but to fight your way forth."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_564_DESCRIPTION":"You're reached the deepest reaches of the Sky Fort. Zebra is close at hand
column2: but your way is blocked by what were some of the greatest warriors to have ever lived."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_565_DESCRIPTION":"Powerful enough to surpass even a goddess
column2: the demonic Zebra is waiting just ahead. Strengthen your will as preparedness may become a vital weapon in the end."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_570_DESCRIPTION":"Mysterious ruins were discovered in Encervis. It seems that a fiendish apparition haunts the place..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_6000000_DESCRIPTION":"A place where Summoners can train for battle by setting certain settings and conditions."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_600000_DESCRIPTION":"Here you will face a monster from Raid Battle. Rumor has it Noel is behind its enhanced power..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_600010_DESCRIPTION":"A fight against an Elder Summoner who has watched over you since the very beginning. It would seem he wants to test how far you have come."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_600020_DESCRIPTION":"A battle with a demon that has thrown itself into an endless whirlwind of war. Keep elements in mind as you fight or victory will elude you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_600030_DESCRIPTION":"Behold the divine creatures summoned to seal an incredible power. They will be the judges of your true abilities as a Summoner."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_600_DESCRIPTION":"Your sights now rest on Cardes
column2: one of the Four Fallen Gods. However the path ahead is scorching hot due to the blistering hot sun above. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_601_DESCRIPTION":"You've arrived at the increadibly hot Dejour Ruins. Monsters trapped in the red hot winds block your way forth. "
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_602_DESCRIPTION":"A man-eating demon and an ancient dragon wrapped in flames block the path toward Obselion Castle where Tilith awaits you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_603_DESCRIPTION":"Thirst and hunger line the scorching path ahead. In the steamy distance awaits a chef unmoved by the heat. What ingredients could she be looking for?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_604_DESCRIPTION":"Two warriors
column2: locked in combat since long ago
column3: take a break from their intense fighting to block your way forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_60_DESCRIPTION":"These ancient ruins have a solemn
column2: holy air. It's much better than where you were before
column3: but it's still ominous."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_610_DESCRIPTION":"The royal family of Palmyna once resided in this magnificent castle. It's beautifully frozen corridors now give off a feeling of sadness. "
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_611_DESCRIPTION":"The castle grounds are silent
column2: and Tilith is nowhere to be found. There's nothing but frozen hallways leading in each direction. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_612_DESCRIPTION":"A brisk wind blows upon you as you continue investigating the castle grounds.  The cool breeze feels like an invitation to death..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_613_DESCRIPTION":"You couldn't find Tilith
column2: but just as Grahdens said
column3: you must put your faith in her and move forth. Your goal is to defeat Cardes."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_614_DESCRIPTION":"As you try to escape the castle
column2: you come to a giant wall of ice. Worse than that
column3: two daunting warriors are lying in wait for you. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_61_DESCRIPTION":"It appears that a sage with the power of light is in the ruins. A guardian
column2: perhaps?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_620_DESCRIPTION":"After parting from Seria and Karl
column2: you head toward the place where Cardes is sealed away
column3: vanquishing enemies who appear from the silent forest. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_621_DESCRIPTION":"All manner of beasts try and stand in your way as you work towards the Spirit World
column2: the land where Cardes is sealed away... "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_622_DESCRIPTION":"It's been countless years since the last of the humans died out
column2: but still the forest doesn't sleep. It seems it has thrived in their absence. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_623_DESCRIPTION":"Proceeding along a lightly foggy path
column2: you come across the rulers of the forest. The ruler of trees and the master of fairies now stand before you. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_624_DESCRIPTION":"Those with great power are often overcome by it. However
column2: legend speaks of one mighty warrior who succeeded in gaining control."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_62_DESCRIPTION":"A shining
column2: gallant white horse blocks the path. It defends its position
column3: attacking mercilessly."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_630_DESCRIPTION":"Grandelt was once the most vibrant city in Palmyna
column2: but it has since turned into a ghost town. Lined with abandoned buildings
column3: it now stands in ruins. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_631_DESCRIPTION":"Tilith injured herself investigating how to get to the Spirit World. You must repay her by making your way to Cardes!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_632_DESCRIPTION":"You're now headed for the Noera Battlegrounds. However
column2: the sky suddenly turns black as you look up to see a massive figure above."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_633_DESCRIPTION":"Escaping between the rows of crumbling buildings
column2: you're jolted by a sudden tremor. Could this be Gaia's rage? Or maybe..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_634_DESCRIPTION":"The Heroes of Old longed for the life of a lone warrior
column2: and if ever two of such warriors should meet their joy would rain down like lightning."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_63_DESCRIPTION":"A warrior of light lies in wait in the depths of these ruins
column2: testing adventurers before they're allowed to pass."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_640_DESCRIPTION":"Grahdens's question planted a seed in its wake. However this is no time to get distracted. You must repay the goddess's favor."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_641_DESCRIPTION":"Many students with bright futures ahead of them once studied here. The presence awaiting you in this sacred place is one clad in light. "
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_642_DESCRIPTION":"Lorand
column2: one of the Heroes of Old. The place where he once taught as a professor has now been overtaken by dangerous monsters. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_643_DESCRIPTION":"A brightly shining gun-wielding warrior stands before you. You must fight against this force which threatens to rip away your very soul. "
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_644_DESCRIPTION":"The atmosphere is ominously heavy in this solemn seminary. Maintain focus and keep moving forward.  "
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_645_DESCRIPTION":"Despite the rumors they were the strongest around
column2: those two never crossed swords. Perhaps they understood what it really meant to be strong."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_650_DESCRIPTION":"This place once hosted a battle between humans and the gods. Even after many years
column2: it still bears the scars of those days. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_651_DESCRIPTION":"A spirit possessed by the thrill of battle
column2: and the one who pursues it. As long as their fight continues
column3: they will never disappear. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_652_DESCRIPTION":"These grounds are haunted by those who couldn't be saved. It serves no purpose other than to create further casualties. "
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_653_DESCRIPTION":"The entrance to the Spirit World is now within view. All that's left is to believe in Tilith's words and move forth
column2: knocking away any who get in your way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_654_DESCRIPTION":"You come across an unending battle
column2: where man and brute fight over who gets to lay claim to the other's soul.  "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_655_DESCRIPTION":"You're now at the entrance to the Spirit World
column2: but your way is blocked by two dark soldiers. Overflowing with power
column3: their eyes brim with madness. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_660_DESCRIPTION":"You've all made your way to the Spirit World. Now you must put your heads together to defeat Cardes
column2: and then get back together safely. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_661_DESCRIPTION":"The air is ominous where a Fallen God was once sealed away. You can feel the presence of enemies exponentially more powerful than any you've seen before."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_662_DESCRIPTION":"The Spirit World grows unstable as the seal nears its breaking point. Uncertain of where Cardes may be
column2: you must believe in your comrades and move forth!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_663_DESCRIPTION":"Just as Tilith said
column2: the seal is nearly broken. As you wonder how you should deal with it
column3: hordes of crazed monsters are looking to prey on you. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_664_DESCRIPTION":"The unstable seal reveals a being of dark and light from within it. However
column2: an unexpected opponent has set their sights on you!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_665_DESCRIPTION":"You feel a wicked pulse coming from deep within the Spirit World
column2: but before you can reach it you must defeat a once legendary hero."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_666_DESCRIPTION":"The path to Cardes is now open. Now's your chance to put an end to him
column2: and once again show your power over the gods!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_7000000_DESCRIPTION":"\"I wanted to see you fight for real\" says the man with the blunt weapon. \"I'll give you this sword if you win. Is that motivation enough to fight?\""
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_7000010_DESCRIPTION":"The enemy is knocked down in body
column2: but not in spirit. The Summoner shudders in trepidation at the \"heavy\" explosion that wells forth from within. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_700_DESCRIPTION":"A new investigation has begun into the land of Lizeria. The path to the once thriving La Veda Republic lies open
column2: covered in weeds as it may be."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_701_DESCRIPTION":"The crumbling paved road stretches forth
column2: though there are no signs that humans ever lived in this area. Be cautious as you proceed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_702_DESCRIPTION":"How many years have passed since someone last walked this path? Surely this was a beautiful road back when it was taken care of."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_703_DESCRIPTION":"If you look closely it is obvious this road wasn't made this way by nature alone. It seems a great battle took place in this area."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_704_DESCRIPTION":"The enemies attack quite aggressively. It's as if they're determined to keep anyone from setting foot inside the old capital."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_705_DESCRIPTION":"The end of the road is in sight. However
column2: as you advance the monsters only grow in numbers. You must maintain focus as you move ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_70_DESCRIPTION":"This spine-chillingly eerie mansion reeks of an evil presence. Here you'll need the power to oppose darkness."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_710_DESCRIPTION":"Entering the mountains the sky grows dark. Could it be because of the smoke rising up from the volcanic ash? Dead trees line the path ahead."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_711_DESCRIPTION":"Though not hot enough to burn the skin
column2: the air here is hot. In addition
column3: it is also very thin. Do your best to retain consciousness."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_712_DESCRIPTION":"No matter where you look there's nothing but dried up trees
column2: ash
column3: and rocks. This place has no hopes of ever seeing water. You must get out of hear quickly."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_713_DESCRIPTION":"There are now a lot of paths leading out. It looks like you'll be able to escape the mountains soon
column2: however
column3: you can feel something ahead
column4: the presence of a strong enemy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_714_DESCRIPTION":"The air is dry as always
column2: but it's getting harder and harder to breath. After a short break
column3: an intense roar echoes from afar."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_71_DESCRIPTION":"Light energy is strong against dark
column2: but it's also its weakness. You must plan your strategy here carefully."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_720_DESCRIPTION":"Before you lies a frozen lake. It seems the only way to get to the beach on the other side is to cross over it. Be careful as you proceed forth."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_721_DESCRIPTION":"It is dry here as well
column2: but for a different reason than it was up in the mountains. It's impossible to stand still in this cold. Could Lugina really be waiting here?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_722_DESCRIPTION":"Step after shaky step
column2: you cross the surface of the frozen lake. Looking back
column3: you realize you've made it exactly halfway. How long will the ice hold?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_723_DESCRIPTION":"A chilling wind blows across the lake. Attempting to shrug off the piercing cold
column2: the temperature around you drops unnaturally. What could it be?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_724_DESCRIPTION":"The shore is in view
column2: you can finally get off the ice. Hurry up and get to the shore where there's no chance of slipping."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_72_DESCRIPTION":"A monster with snakes for arms has appeared. Beware
column2: it seems many adventurers have been subdued by its strength."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_730_DESCRIPTION":"You've come to an odd smelling marshland. A strange fog hangs above the water's bubbling bottomless surface. There's no use sticking around here any longer."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_731_DESCRIPTION":"A stomach-turning stench fills the moist humid air. Even when the bad smell breaks
column2: you're left with the choking fragrance of vegetation."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_732_DESCRIPTION":"Monsters leap in attack from both the muddied water as well as the thick shrubs. You'd like to catch your breath
column2: but it seems there's nowhere to rest."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_733_DESCRIPTION":"Suddenly
column2: the miasma from the bog disappears. The air which was once difficult to breath is now fresh and clean. This is likely cause for concern."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_734_DESCRIPTION":"You've made it a long way down the muddy path. The end of the marsh is near
column2: but a remarkably large tree stands in front of you. Surely it isn't an ordinary tree."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_73_DESCRIPTION":"A grotesque swordsman awaits you
column2: and you must overcome him in order to reach the Tower of Mistral."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_740_DESCRIPTION":"Deep black storm clouds fill the sky. Lightning falls in endless waves upon the forest below. There's no way anything could live here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_741_DESCRIPTION":"Your ears begin ringing as lightning endlessly crashes down. The air is thick with the odor of a burnt tree which has been struck by lightning."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_742_DESCRIPTION":"The trees here seem able to withstand exposure to lightning. However
column2: in noticing this it seems you have become lost."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_743_DESCRIPTION":"A paralyzing presence inhabits the forest. You recognize this aura. It seems a warrior you've faced before awaits you once again."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_744_DESCRIPTION":"The sky has become brighter. It seems you might soon be able to escape this strange weather. Is Lugina waiting ahead like he said he'd be?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_750_DESCRIPTION":"You've arrived at the ruins of the La Veda Republic. As ravaged as it is
column2: there are still traces in the rubble of the people who used to live here."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_751_DESCRIPTION":"You notice elaborate carvings in the pieces of stone around your feet. The powderized remains of buildings speak of the violent battle that took place here."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_752_DESCRIPTION":"Despite how desolate these ruins are
column2: there are no signs of weapons or human remains
column3: and the air is fresh and clean."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_753_DESCRIPTION":"Continuing your search of the ruins
column2: an overwhelming presence stops you in your tracks. Up ahead
column3: a knight of the La Veda Republic lies in wait."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_754_DESCRIPTION":"Burnt houses
column2: crumbling churches. There must've been many residents in a city as large as this. You can't help but hope that the victims have found peace."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_755_DESCRIPTION":"Paris said there should be a shrine dedicated to the God of Light around here. A great force stands before you as if to protect the souls of those betrayed by the gods."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_756_DESCRIPTION":"Arriving at the outskirts of the city you see a shockingly massive bridge. Before you can get to it you must confront the huge dragon on your tail."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_760_DESCRIPTION":"Now that you stand near the bridge it looks a lot bigger than it seamed from far away. You can see an ominous tower far in the distance
column2: but could that be the end?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_761_DESCRIPTION":"Turning back
column2: you see the ruins. Compared to that desolate yet pure place
column3: the bridge is soaked in an ominous miasma. What could be waiting ahead?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_762_DESCRIPTION":"The closer you get to the tower
column2: the more hightened your fear becomes. It's as if the tower itself was infused with some sort of evil energy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_763_DESCRIPTION":"You've finally made it to the bridge's halfway point. As the enemies are growing stronger
column2: it seems fighting through the second half will only be more difficult."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_764_DESCRIPTION":"Enemies continue attacking
column2: allowing no room for rest. Could they be protecting the power that Paris said was hidden here?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_765_DESCRIPTION":"You're close enough to the tower that you have to look up to see where it ends. It's odd appearance causes a lump in your throught."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_766_DESCRIPTION":"Not much longer to the tower. Lugina still hasn't shown up yet so it's highly likely he's waiting somewhere around here. Proceed with caution."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_770_DESCRIPTION":"There is a thick steel door at the entrance to the tower. Although it is open
column2: you must defeat the monsters around you before going inside."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_771_DESCRIPTION":"Entering inside you notice the entire tower is slightly trembling. You must shake off this bad feeling and focus on the enemy in front of you."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_772_DESCRIPTION":"It's a long way to the top
column2: and on top of that there are even more enemies here than outside. What Paris said now stirs uneasiness within you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_773_DESCRIPTION":"The tower's shaking has grown stronger. The oppressive rythmic sound bears heavily on your chest. What is it that Paris saw here?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_774_DESCRIPTION":"What floor is this? Suddenly looking outside
column2: the once massive bridge now looks relatively small. The top is near
column3: prepare yourself and move forth."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_775_DESCRIPTION":"This could be the final floor. However
column2: you feel the presence of the Four Heroes coming from behind the door leading to the roof. You must defeat them to advance."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_776_DESCRIPTION":"You can hear a ghastly noise coming from the roof. It's the final gate protecting Lizeria's hidden power. Muster your courage and go forth."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_780_DESCRIPTION":"You can feel the immense energy coming from the depths of the lake. But for what purpose does it continue to radiate the surface?"

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_800_DESCRIPTION":"A thick fog hangs around you as the light stench of rotten eggs fills the air. Be careful as it would all be over if you fell in the hole from which the steam pours."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_801_DESCRIPTION":"It's like a steam bath here
column2: the hot steam making it hard to breathe. It'd be difficult to wear armor travelling through a place like this."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_802_DESCRIPTION":"It's hot. Some cold water would be nice
column2: but there's nothing here but boiling water. You're drenched in sweat
column3: might as well wash off while you're here."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_803_DESCRIPTION":"Pushing aside the steamy air
column2: a scorching hot wind blows in. The parched air instantly dries your once sweat covered body."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_804_DESCRIPTION":"A wind blows in from outside. It's fresh feel invigorates you. However
column2: you sense a powerful thirst coming from where the wind is blowing. It's likely a strong foe."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_810_DESCRIPTION":"All you see goes from steam to snow
column2: and your once steaming hot body is instantly cooled. Worried about Karl
column3: you continue after him."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_811_DESCRIPTION":"Before you notice
column2: your once wet hair and clothes are frozen. Surely you'll catch a cold in this radically changing weather. Brush away the frost and hurry ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_812_DESCRIPTION":"The sprawling snowscape before you is gorgeous
column2: but as much as you'd like to stare this isn't the time to get distracted. You must catch up to Karl."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_813_DESCRIPTION":"You notice that the softly falling snow is starting to cover Karl's tracks. You must find him before you lose trace of him."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_814_DESCRIPTION":"As you traverse the whitewashed landscape
column2: you're surprised by a firm
column3: icy sound. It's the echo of icy gunfire headed your way!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_81_DESCRIPTION":"You've reached the Tower of Mistral at last. This is Maxwell's base inside Mistral. Hurry your way inside!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_820_DESCRIPTION":"Plants that you've never seen before flourish everywhere. Smash your way through this overflowingly vibrant forest just as Seria would expect you to."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_821_DESCRIPTION":"It's hot and humid in this dark forest. It's not as hot here as it was in that steamy cavern
column2: but you're already beginning to sweat."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_822_DESCRIPTION":"Various strange flowers bloom proudly around you. Their mixing smells produce a strange aroma. It's almost...intoxicating..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_823_DESCRIPTION":"From far away you thought you saw a large tree
column2: but now it seems to be coming toward you. Is this an illusion
column3: or is the tree really moving?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_824_DESCRIPTION":"As sunlight begins to peek into the forest
column2: it seems you might be able to get out. Karl and Seria are in the ruins ahead. You must hurry to them."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_82_DESCRIPTION":"This tower reaches amazingly high into the sky. Fearsome monsters await with blood-soaked claws."

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8300031_DESCRIPTION":"A group of maidens barged in here and demanded to use my sacred lab to test each other's strength!! Get in there and appease them so I can return to my experiments!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8300811_DESCRIPTION":"It seems a strange creature from Paskua has come to Grand Gaia in search of something. What could it be after
column2: and why?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8300812_DESCRIPTION":"Although it seemed as if Cotton was after Carrol
column2: it was actually after the eggs she's been collecting. Will she just hand them over?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8300813_DESCRIPTION":"Carrol and Cotton face off in a battle for the mystical eggs. However
column2: kindness is one of Carrol's most admirable traits..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301001_DESCRIPTION":"You have arrived at the tower where the formidable monster is rumored to be dwelling. It's dark and the cold
column2: still air sends a chill up your spine."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301104_DESCRIPTION":"Learn to harness the power of Fire and Thunder with a sparring match versus Mai and Benimaru! Are you ready for this?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301105_DESCRIPTION":"Learn to harness the forces of Water and Earth with a sparring match against Kula and Terry! Are you going to be okay?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301106_DESCRIPTION":"Learn to harness the energy of Light and Dark with a sparring match against Athena and Iori! Care to wager on your odds?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301107_DESCRIPTION":"Time to put your skills on the line in a royal rumble fit for legends! Embrace the elements and let them guide you to victory!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301131_DESCRIPTION":"You've been sent to check on the phenomena caused by newcomers from beyond the \"Backyard.\" Are you ready for wild dragons and thunderstorms?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301132_DESCRIPTION":"More newcomers have arrived
column2: including a strange two-winged girl
column3: and her blond companion. They claim to be looking for a friend in a wedding gown..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301133_DESCRIPTION":"Two more deadly beauties have arrived. Is it heaven
column2: or hell? Only one thing's for sure--your heart might just be Overdrived into an Instant Kill!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301134_DESCRIPTION":"Turns out Elphelt was just looking for eternal love. It's a beautiful day for a wedding
column2: and she looks lovely in her gown. Time to declare your love!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301144_DESCRIPTION":"Fairy Tail wizards have appeared through an anomaly in the vortex. They seem to think you're with a \"Dark Guild.\" What's going on?!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301145_DESCRIPTION":"Be careful! Lucy and Erza have joined the battle
column2: and it looks like they're siding with the others. When will this misunderstanding end?!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301146_DESCRIPTION":"Seems like Fairy Tail isn't backing down from an offensive stance. You've got one shot to help them understand things
column2: so make it count!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301151_DESCRIPTION":"Battle monsters and gain treasures for evolving your units! To the brave go the spoils!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301152_DESCRIPTION":"Many have delved deep into these halls and never returned. Can you handle the monsters within? Reap the rewards with every victory!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301153_DESCRIPTION":"Can you succeed where others have failed? Gain vital items for empowering your units and show them who's boss!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301201_DESCRIPTION":"A powerful force has invaded Grand Gaia through the Vortex Gate. The Summoners' Hall has called upon you to investigate this \"Veritas of the Dark.\""
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301202_DESCRIPTION":"The man called Veritas of the Dark is growing stronger! You must fight back until the reinforcements from Summoners' Hall reach you!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8301203_DESCRIPTION":"This is it! The combined effort of every hero is needed to defeat the enemy. With your help (and a little luck)
column2: victory will come soon enough!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8302001_DESCRIPTION":"Now that you've met the guardian of the tower
column2: you start to feel less confident about this mission. What else lurks in the darkness?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8303001_DESCRIPTION":"So far so good
column2: nothing you can't handle as of yet. But the spooky howls coming from the higher levels of the tower are something you can't ignore..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8304001_DESCRIPTION":"What's that?! A dark shadow just flashed past you. Or was it just your imagination? Stay alert
column2: Summoner."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8305001_DESCRIPTION":"How many floors has it been? It's getting darker and the rain isn't stopping. Gleaming eyes are watching you from behind the shadows..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8306001_DESCRIPTION":"Watch out for the beasts and monsters
column2: they haven't had a decent meal in ages... Let your guard down and you might not live to see the sun rise again."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8307001_DESCRIPTION":"Your breathing seems heavier than before. Are you getting tired from the climb
column2: or is the guardian of the tower pushing you to your limits?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8308001_DESCRIPTION":"He is hot on your heels
column2: catching you at every turn and landing. You need to hurry! The ominous aura filling the air is getting thicker by the minute."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8309001_DESCRIPTION":"You can't let him get in your way now! You've come so far
column2: the truth waiting to be unraveled is just a reach away..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8309980_DESCRIPTION":"Our favorite friends are back for a new challenge! Are you down for it?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8309981_DESCRIPTION":"This time our favorite friends bring their own guards for the challenge!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8309982_DESCRIPTION":"What is going on? Nothing works against Grind Burny!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_830_DESCRIPTION":"You must escape the ruins to get to the tower where Karl is being held. Tilith can take care of Seria
column2: so hurry ahead as fast as you can."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310001_DESCRIPTION":"You've reached the top of the tower! Or...have you? It's too dark to see
column2: but you can clearly sense a strong power beckoning in the darkness..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310061_DESCRIPTION":"A piece of the ancient lands of Athensphere still drifts in the Vortex
column2: burning in fire and smoke."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310062_DESCRIPTION":"An endless destruction continues in the fiery lands
column2: while a destructive weapon reaps chaos throughout the land."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310063_DESCRIPTION":"Can anyone stop the fiery destruction once and for all
column2: and restore what remains of the Athensphere?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310212_DESCRIPTION":"Seeing how much chaos he and his friends can cause
column2: Nice Burny leads them on a rampage to cause greater chaos to whiny summoners. KEKEKEKEKEKE!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310301_DESCRIPTION":"As the seasons change
column2: the winds of fate swoosh over the lands welcoming a brand new year."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310302_DESCRIPTION":"Auspicious creatures come out to play
column2: challenge and brawl."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310303_DESCRIPTION":"The short lifespan of man is but a rush of aroma and color. Only those of ripest age can be said to have enjoyed the fruits of life."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8310304_DESCRIPTION":"A new dawn awaits the those who face the sun and allow the wings of destiny to carry them to greater heights."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8311000_DESCRIPTION":"There is nothing more worth fighting for than justice. She will not hesitate to launch her missiles at anything she deems unrighteous."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8311001_DESCRIPTION":"Wait... What the cursed knight has been fighting to guard wasn't the tower? What he was trying to protect was... Wh-What's that?!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8311002_DESCRIPTION":"As Leon's influence grew
column2: he gathered a band of thieves who shared the same ideals as his own. Help the weak
column3: and crush the strong. Steal from the rich to aid the poor."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8311006_DESCRIPTION":"Hero of the Agni Empire
column2: Vargas' strength and blazing sword lit the flame in the people's hearts to believe that they had a chance against the gods."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8311010_DESCRIPTION":"Once a week
column2: lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields glow red from the emergence of Fire Bulbs
column3: buzzed and excited."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8311999_DESCRIPTION":"Frustrated that they're always being picked on
column2: Burny and friends set out on a rampage to create chaos. MWAHAHAHA!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8312000_DESCRIPTION":"When she is angered
column2: only destruction awaits. Stand in her way and be prepared to get blown away."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8312001_DESCRIPTION":"It only took the monster a single strike to take down the knight you fought so hard against?! Are you sure you can take on the monster?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8312002_DESCRIPTION":"As the band grew stronger and larger
column2: Leon now had an army that reaped through the regions stamping down on the corrupt rich and powerful
column3: making himself their number one enemy within the Agni Empire."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8312006_DESCRIPTION":"His immense powers were feared even by the gods. Even long after he left the empire
column2: he was remembered by its people as the legendary swordsman of Agni."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8312010_DESCRIPTION":"Once a week
column2: lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields turn humid from emergence of Water Bulbs
column3: wet and soggy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8312999_DESCRIPTION":"As night falls
column2: the shine of the moon lights up the darkness
column3: enticing curious creatures to come out to play."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8313000_DESCRIPTION":"Sparks fly as her war rockets blow her enemies away. Her passion for justice burns stronger than ever."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8313001_DESCRIPTION":"Now that Xenon is injured
column2: you're the only one who can contain the monster. Hurry
column3: before it escapes the tower!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8313002_DESCRIPTION":"As he finally claimed the territory of the ruined Agni Empire
column2: Leon faced officials
column3: angry gods
column4: and Summoners charging up his doorstep. Believing in equality among men
column5: the thief of justice faced all odds with his cunning and wits."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8313010_DESCRIPTION":"Once a week
column2: lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Earth Bulbs
column3: lush and green."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8313999_DESCRIPTION":"As the moon reaches its fullest in the night sky
column2: a mysterious gathering has begun. All manner of creatures are drawn to the beauty in the sky."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8314001_DESCRIPTION":"Oh no! You lost sight of the monster! Where is it? There's no time to waste... You need to track it down before it can ambush you!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8314010_DESCRIPTION":"Once a week
column2: lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Thunder Bulbs
column3: flashing with electric rhythm."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8314999_DESCRIPTION":"Mesmerized and enthralled by the bright yet silent moon
column2: curious creatures begin dancing to the mystical feeling in the air."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8315001_DESCRIPTION":"The darkness is putting you at a great disadvantage
column2: but you can hear the monster's heartbeat from a distance. Wait
column3: was that your own heartbeat instead?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8315010_DESCRIPTION":"Once a week
column2: lunar shifts above affect the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields shine from emergence of Light Bulbs
column3: bright and luminous."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8316001_DESCRIPTION":"The continuous climb and seemingly endless battles have taken a toll on you
column2: but your mission is not over. Xenon is pinning his hopes on you
column3: Summoner."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8316010_DESCRIPTION":"Once a week
column2: lunar shifts above affects the emotional spectrum of bulbs. The fields emanate a purple glow from the emergence of Dark Bulbs
column3: morbid and desolate."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8317001_DESCRIPTION":"Is that the best you can do? You need to muster more energy and power to complete this mission! Pull yourself together and charge forth!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8318001_DESCRIPTION":"The monster seems to be getting stronger and stronger. Can you keep up? If you give up now
column2: it's not going to leave a nice impression on your record..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8319001_DESCRIPTION":"There's no time to rest! The monster must be getting exhausted too
column2: this is your chance to attack! Did you lose sight of it again?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_831_DESCRIPTION":"The ruins are quite old
column2: but magic still illuminates the area. What's strange
column3: however
column4: is that it isn't fire
column5: but the power of thunder magic which is being used."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320001_DESCRIPTION":"It has been a long
column2: tough fight. You're so close to completing your mission! You're not going to give up now
column3: are you?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320061_DESCRIPTION":"A sunken piece of Athensphere that although filled with treasure & valuable history
column2: still houses many dangers. Only the brave dare to traverse into the unknown depths."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320062_DESCRIPTION":"In the quiet waters of the depths
column2: a ferocious carnage still rages. No one is safe when diving into this unknown territory."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320063_DESCRIPTION":"Can the echoes of mayhem and despair of the deep be finally eradicated? Will the lost treasures and history of Athensphere be finally retrieved?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320112_DESCRIPTION":"In the snowy outlands
column2: something stirs the emotions of man and beasts alike."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320113_DESCRIPTION":"The ice and snow glister with a soft mystic light from the sun. The glades seem a little unusual this year."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320114_DESCRIPTION":"The harsh cold air gets stronger
column2: the snow gets thicker. Your curious heart wanders deeper."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320115_DESCRIPTION":"In a distant land
column2: bright lights glimmer and melodious jingling fills the air."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320116_DESCRIPTION":"A sudden snowstorm picks up as you trudge your way towards a nearby castle. Curiously
column2: it seems to be nudging you forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320117_DESCRIPTION":"As you approach the arctic castle
column2: a shadowy figure watches over you from the top of one of its towers. What surprises await ahead?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320118_DESCRIPTION":"In the shattered remains of Nick's workshop
column2: two very different creatures come to life. What could be the story behind their magical awakening?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8320119_DESCRIPTION":"A wandering figure tries to make sense of a chaotic world while a lone sentinel continues to find corpses. Who will find who first?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8321000_DESCRIPTION":"Cool and dignified
column2: she bows to no one but her trusty Gatling gun which she has entrusted her life to. "

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8321001_DESCRIPTION":"Xenon & Estia revisit their past of wandering the wilderness together
column2: after escaping from their burning kingdom in search of allies to recruit..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8321006_DESCRIPTION":"Beautiful yet strong
column2: Selena was admired by many for leading the Savat people of the Sama Kingdom to countless victorious battles."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8322000_DESCRIPTION":"Known as the Gun Lady
column2: she never lets her guard or her gun down. When it comes to the quick draw
column3: she is second to none."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8322001_DESCRIPTION":"In the following months after escaping the gods
column2: they survived and adapted to danger
column3: slowly forging a special relationship against all odds that lay before them."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8322006_DESCRIPTION":"Refusing the call from her kingdom
column2: Selena instead wielded her treasured sword Lexida and cut down god after god to rescue the masses."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8323000_DESCRIPTION":"It's no longer a matter of winning or losing. She wants revenge and she wants it fast. She has no time for those who can't keep up."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8323001_DESCRIPTION":"Defeated but finally freed
column2: the couple wonders if their bond is still as strong as it was in the past."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_832_DESCRIPTION":"As rough as the inside of the ruins is
column2: they still seem to be intact. There also don't appear to be any traps to protect from intruders
column3: but still..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8330061_DESCRIPTION":"As Athensphere crumbles
column2: its peaceful sanctums where the first demi-gods were once created plunge into chaos."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8330062_DESCRIPTION":"Will the holy relics of the past lying within the holy grounds be destroyed in the fire of destruction
column2: or be salvaged by the brave?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8330063_DESCRIPTION":"As the skirmishes in the sanctuary carry on
column2: a determined soul vows to rid the holy grounds of this invasive rampage."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8331000_DESCRIPTION":"She doesn't have the slightest clue about her past
column2: but she knows one thing well and clear. She needs to get stronger."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8331006_DESCRIPTION":"Picking up the Sacred Pike Drevas
column2: Lance gave up his roots as a noble of the Principality of Vriksha to pursue greater skill and power."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8332000_DESCRIPTION":"The mountains are more dangerous than they look
column2: but nothing will stop her from sharpening her senses as well as her claws."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8332006_DESCRIPTION":"Lance stood up against the gods
column2: but he was not alone. He had his awakened Demon Pike Drevas
column3: which now held the powers of World Tree Altro."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8333000_DESCRIPTION":"\"Never underestimate a cat
column2: \" she always warns
column3: and those who cross her only realize it when they feel her claws dig in."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_833_DESCRIPTION":"It seems these ruins were once used as a fortress. There are armories lined with spears
column2: though each one of them is covered with rust."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8340061_DESCRIPTION":"The skies thunder with fury as the augmentation wars carry on through the forsaken lands of Athensphere."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8340062_DESCRIPTION":"The defense forces push forward upon the high grounds as Gazia and his iron army concentrate at the peak."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8340063_DESCRIPTION":"The final frontier looms ever closer as the defensive forces of Athensphere clash with the enemy in an electrified fury."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8341000_DESCRIPTION":"Being able to prophesize
column2: the only way she could keep going despite the dreadful war was to smile and keep fighting."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8341006_DESCRIPTION":"Eze trained and fought hard as a  warrior and was rewarded with the Thunder Sword Batootha
column2: which gave him the destructive power of thunder."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8341999_DESCRIPTION":"A storm has been brewing across the vast skies of Grand Gaia
column2: and where there is a storm
column3: thunder is bound to follow."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8342000_DESCRIPTION":"Though she lost her memory
column2: she didn't lose her spark and will to fight
column3: her grin only widened as she got stronger."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8342006_DESCRIPTION":"Eze tore down the gods with his Thunder Sword Batootha and his superior speed
column2: rescuing Goddess Emilia and the masses during the great war."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8342999_DESCRIPTION":"Do you hear the thunder? It's coming for you. They're coming for you. Can you thrive above the lightning
column2: or will you kneel to their bolts of power?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8343000_DESCRIPTION":"A fortune-teller knows that there's no way to change fate. The only way to win is to laugh and make merry. Fight-oh!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_834_DESCRIPTION":"You sense a strong enemy near the exit to the ruins. Zevalhua's disciple Mare was able to read Seria's movements in attacking her. Be careful."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350011_DESCRIPTION":"The melodies of Fire
column2: Water and Light echo down the great halls of the infinite abyss."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350012_DESCRIPTION":"The melodies of Earth
column2: Thunder and Darkness echo down the great halls of the infinite abyss."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350061_DESCRIPTION":"As the cries of war creep nearer
column2: peace is broken
column3: and the tranquillity of the lands is disturbed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350062_DESCRIPTION":"A battle breaks out on the Faithlorn Fields of Athensphere. Neither the old nor young shall be spared."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350063_DESCRIPTION":"Gentle souls begin rising up in desperation to bring back order to the lands."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350401_DESCRIPTION":"As the spring solstice approaches
column2: furry creatures come out to play."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350402_DESCRIPTION":"Furry creatures bear gifts and little surprises for travelers from distant lands."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350403_DESCRIPTION":"Gifts and surprises don't come with ease
column2: furry creatures live to tease."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8350404_DESCRIPTION":"Celebrate the joy of spring time with even more furry creatures than before!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_83510001_DESCRIPTION":"A strange eclipse
column2: an unfamiliar silhouette. He who holds the key has tapped into a long lost power
column3: a hypnotic force that is spread across Grand Gaia."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8351000_DESCRIPTION":"While others struggle on the ground
column2: she soars through the sky to wherever the light reaches
column3: and fights for those who seek freedom."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8351006_DESCRIPTION":"Gifted with extraordinary skills
column2: Atro was known as the \"Sword Saint\" for his brilliant technique with the legendary Light Sword Urias."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_83520001_DESCRIPTION":"Dark and light
column2: good and evil... Can you maintain balance
column3: or will you give in to the Keymaster's magic? The force of the eclipse is growing..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8352000_DESCRIPTION":"If death can't stop her
column2: nothing will. As long as there is a ray of light
column3: she'll trace it down
column4: even to Gaia's end."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8352006_DESCRIPTION":"When the gods destroyed the monastery he grew up in
column2: he drew his sword and unleashed the unearthly powers of Urias
column3: going all out against the gods."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8353000_DESCRIPTION":"Stronger
column2: higher
column3: faster. Whoever said the sky's the limit obviously never met Vanila. To this airborne warrior
column4: the sky is but the starting line."

column1:
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8360021_DESCRIPTION":"I... I opened a portal to the Dark Tower and I couldn't control the accursed.
Keep it under control and you shall be rewarded."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8360041_DESCRIPTION":"This mock unit was supposedly widely feared and known far throughout the East. Are you up for the challenge?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8360051_DESCRIPTION":"I\u2019ve finally done it!! My research has led me to this man of great importance. There is much I would like to ask him but first
column2: would you like a challenge?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8360061_DESCRIPTION":"As Athensphere was torn apart and condemned into the abyss of the Vortex
column2: an eternal conflict continues beneath the fissure it once stood upon."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8360062_DESCRIPTION":"Though there is much to salvage of the once mighty lands
column2: a ferocious creation wreaks havoc and kills anyone who dares enter the domain."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8360063_DESCRIPTION":"From above the chasm
column2: screams and growls of victims and demons echo on below. Can anyone step up and bring the destruction to an end?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8360503_DESCRIPTION":"Follow Fang into Xie'Jing's abyss to search for Fei in order to rescue him..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8360504_DESCRIPTION":"Can you help Fang defeat Xie'Jing once and for all
column2: and snatch Fei out of her clutches?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8361000_DESCRIPTION":"The half-demon daughter of a dark lord is always seeking a thrill by feeding her restless blood. Battle Maidens? Sounds like fun."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8361006_DESCRIPTION":"As a cavalry leader's son
column2: Magress was a talented young knight. Triggered by his defeat to his father
column3: he honed his skills and soon became the strongest in Bariura."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8362000_DESCRIPTION":"Nothing bores her more than incompetent
column2: weak fighters. The demon in her is telling her to fight to survive
column3: and devour to succeed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8362006_DESCRIPTION":"Wielding a gigantic lance
column2: he could effortlessly pierce through the thickest of armor. Even the gods couldn't stand in his way."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8363000_DESCRIPTION":"She doesn't care if a human
column2: god
column3: or demon stands in her way. Her demon blade will only stop for someone who excites her...but only for brief while."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8380000_DESCRIPTION":"The gods thus granted this spirit with the burning desire to triumph in battle
column2: making it the strongest of its kind."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8380130_DESCRIPTION":"The lands begin to darken
column2: covered in shadows. A mysterious aura draws the curious and the timid alike."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8381000_DESCRIPTION":"An ancient destructive force reanimated and energized to its very limit."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8381130_DESCRIPTION":"Evil descends into the darkened lands
column2: haunting the timid and assaulting the unwary."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8382000_DESCRIPTION":"The gods gave this demon the spirit of ultimate defense
column2: strengthened its power
column3: and sharpened its claws."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8382130_DESCRIPTION":"The lands fall into what seem like an eternal nightfall. From the twilight
column2: demons and monsters emerge..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8383000_DESCRIPTION":"It was rumored that the beast acquired the mysterious power of a fiery barrier."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8383130_DESCRIPTION":"Are you ready to face your fears and conquer the hellborn itself? Assist Ciara & Semira in defeating it!"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8384000_DESCRIPTION":"And the gods said to her
column2: all you need to do is get even angrier."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8384130_DESCRIPTION":"Demonspawn have come out to play! Free Ciara & Semira from their control
column2: if they are even the real deal that is?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8385000_DESCRIPTION":"The gods granted a powerful companion to the most unlikely of all creatures.."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_83_DESCRIPTION":"Halfway up
column2: a giant flying dragon is defends the tower
column3: attacking anyone who nears. You must avoid it's attacks to advance."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8400000_DESCRIPTION":"As you investigate a magical laboratory
column2: you feel a burning gaze on you. Behind you appears a mysterious figure out of thin air."
