column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8400001_DESCRIPTION":"The experienced and beautiful lady of the mage's guild is both dominant and seasoned. She attacks you as if teasing you
column2: testing your capabilities."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8400002_DESCRIPTION":"The mage laughs of someone who holds many secrets. Knowing there are more yet to be found
column2: she prepares a unique spell for this special occasion."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_840_DESCRIPTION":"A wind gently blows through the soft sunlight. Exiting the ruins
column2: you seem to be on the side of a mountain. The sky is clear and the weather is pleasant."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_841_DESCRIPTION":"Could this path also be part of the ruins? The moss covered path and crumbling statues show show the passage of time. Still
column2: this is no time to relax."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_842_DESCRIPTION":"The air is invigorating here. It'd be nice to stop here and take a deep breath. The view is so beautiful
column2: maybe you can return here after Karl is rescued."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_843_DESCRIPTION":"The mountain path slowly turns downhill. As your trip around this beautiful mountain comes to an end you almost feel sad
column2: but you must hurry forward."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_844_DESCRIPTION":"The cave is wide open before you. You should be able to get to the tower through here. You'd better prepare yourself for surprise attacks."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_84_DESCRIPTION":"Masters of each of the four elements stand in wait as the final barrier in the path to the lord of the tower."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_850_DESCRIPTION":"Entering the cave from the bright mountain path
column2: your eyes have yet to adjust. Despite the dim light
column3: the cave is considerably dark."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_851_DESCRIPTION":"Why was Karl kidnapped? Mare said she wished to show him the truth
column2: but still...Karl is your closest friend. You must save him."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_852_DESCRIPTION":"Thanks to the torch you can see ahead of you
column2: but the ground is still dark. The flickering torch seems to make the darkness appear thicker."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_853_DESCRIPTION":"The stench of death wafts through the air from the deep darkness. Where could this cave lead? This darkness is really unsettling."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_854_DESCRIPTION":"A pungent rusty metal odor pours into your nose. It's the smell of blood! The exit ought to be near
column2: but there's no doubt something dreadful is waiting ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_85_DESCRIPTION":"You're almost at the top. A mechanical deity
column2: likely Maxwell's creation
column3: awaits. The final battle for Mistral begins."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_860_DESCRIPTION":"Running alongside a white wall
column2: you chase after the dragon that injured Tilith. Following its trail should lead you to where Karl is."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_861_DESCRIPTION":"There's a sturdy tower intricately built from white stones. From its appearance
column2: it looks like it was built as a military fortress
column3: but it feels creepy."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_862_DESCRIPTION":"Hurry up the ivory stone steps. Who knows what kind of traps Mare set up ahead. Aim for the top
column2: and proceed calmly
column3: but quickly."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_863_DESCRIPTION":"Is Karl all right? Just as Tilith said
column2: there must be a reason why Karl is being kept alive
column3: so his life shouldn't be in danger
column4: but still..."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_864_DESCRIPTION":"The enemy's attacks have gotten stronger. Perhaps you're nearing the top. With this much resistance
column2: it must mean that Karl is ahead!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_865_DESCRIPTION":"A sudden surge of blood curdling power seeping down from the floor above stops you in your tracks. Prepare yourself and head up to where your two foes await."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_866_DESCRIPTION":"The top level of the white tower. The dragon slowly turns its gaze to you
column2: and lets out a deafening roar. You have to defeat it and save Karl!"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8701600_DESCRIPTION":"Legend has it that there was once a knight who came into his own kingdom. He would name it after a mythical land from tales of old..."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8701601_DESCRIPTION":"Arthur devoted his life to protecting NeoAvalon
column2: but lost everything he held dear in the process. Will he continue to walk the path of the righteous?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8701602_DESCRIPTION":"Not even kings may escape the cruelty of fate. Lost in the darkness of his own fury
column2: Arthur crosses blades with a traveling soldier named Lancelot."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_8701603_DESCRIPTION":"Having tested each other's strength
column2: the two warriors join forces to hunt down a mysterious and powerful artifact. Will their alliance last?"

column1:
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_900000_DESCRIPTION":"The strange musician and the girl who listened to him.
It seems their songs are helping the tree to grow."

"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_900001_DESCRIPTION":"The tree grows as if it was being fed by the instruments.
Could its branches reach to where the girl came from?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_900002_DESCRIPTION":"A light shines on the stairs within a closed room. What truth awaits the amnesiac girl who is slowly recovering her memory...?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_900010_DESCRIPTION":"The moon shines beautifully in the night as you feel a strange sort of magic about you. Two beings wrapped in cherry blossoms await you atop a bridge."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_900011_DESCRIPTION":"The two seemingly possessed beings continue to battle under the blooming evening blossoms. Could their iron will be hiding something more within?"
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_900012_DESCRIPTION":"As the battle rages on
column2: the two beings' ornate garments turn as red as the evening blossoms. A hint of innocence can be seen behind their gloomy eyes."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_900_DESCRIPTION":"The city is enormous
column2: befitting the once prosperous capital of an empire. Though it's smaller than Randall
column3: make sure you don't get lost."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_901_DESCRIPTION":"Every building in the city looks plain yet sturdy. The fact that they've survived the ravages of war is testament to their expert craftsmanship."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_902_DESCRIPTION":"Lugina told your enemies to do their worst
column2: but they are fiercer than you anticipated. Their spirit of kinship and heroism permeates the air."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_903_DESCRIPTION":"You are still surprised that Lugina is cooperating in Karl's rescue. Though his words suggest otherwise
column2: he isn't such a bad person."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_904_DESCRIPTION":"You have reached the opposite gate. Though there are no signs of Mare
column2: you can sense a sinister heat approaching."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_90_DESCRIPTION":"There is a mountain range at the end of the Egor Plains where it is said an evil god who once destroyed several small nations slumbers."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_910_DESCRIPTION":"The beach is peppered with Lugina's footprints. He warned you not to follow him
column2: but you have no choice. You proceed along the shoreline."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_911_DESCRIPTION":"The comfortable sea breeze is a perfect complement to the sun's strong rays. But you don't have time to enjoy it and must keep searching for where Karl is being held."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_912_DESCRIPTION":"Though walking along the shore reminds you of your time with Tilith back at Morgan
column2: there is no time for reminiscing. Brace yourself and press ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_913_DESCRIPTION":"Unlike the weather
column2: the sandy terrain is less than ideal for combat. Walking so far from the city has also exhausted you."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_914_DESCRIPTION":"As you approach the end of the beach
column2: the sand turns to mud. If experience has taught you anything
column3: something formidable should be waiting ahead."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_920_DESCRIPTION":"Mare the demon is a master of deception. Her last words may be a ruse. However
column2: her next attack could be imminent."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_921_DESCRIPTION":"An exquisite view fills your eyes
column2: of geological formations you have never seen. Use extra caution as you proceed."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_922_DESCRIPTION":"You cannot rely on Lugina against Mare's tricks. Though you want to preserve your energy for your solo fight
column2: the enemies' attacks just get fiercer."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_923_DESCRIPTION":"You worry about Karl's safety in the hands of Mare. However
column2: now is the time to hurry ahead
column3: not to think ominous thoughts about your friend."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_924_DESCRIPTION":"The terrain here is not as rough. Perhaps this is where Mare will strike. Prepare yourself for her attack."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_930_DESCRIPTION":"Dark clouds drape the sky above
column2: punctuated by incessant lightning that racks your nerves. You must sneak past carefully
column3: ready for Mare's next attack."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_931_DESCRIPTION":"The placement of enemies is no accident. They were planted with great precision to wear you down
column2: serving you up on a platter for Mare."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_932_DESCRIPTION":"The enemies' vicious attacks are taking their toll. However
column2: this is hardly the place to catch your breath
column3: for Karl's life is in your hands."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_933_DESCRIPTION":"Mare's strategy must be working exactly as planned. Almost completely worn out
column2: you are practically a sitting duck for her."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_934_DESCRIPTION":"The ominous clouds begin to clear
column2: a sign that you may have made it out of your crisis. Yet taking a break now would be most dangerous."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_940_DESCRIPTION":"Perhaps Mare is afraid of the power some humans wield. That would explain her incessant attempts to wear you down."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_941_DESCRIPTION":"The air wafting through the tomb seems fresh and clean. Judging by the inscriptions on the wall
column2: this place dates back to the Agni Empire."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_942_DESCRIPTION":"Fighting your enemies here makes you feel like a tomb raider. There don't seem to be too many booby-traps set in the tomb
column2: but be careful."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_943_DESCRIPTION":"Continuing this solo battle is both physically and emotionally taxing. Try not to worry about Karl
column2: or you'll play right into Mare's hands."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_944_DESCRIPTION":"A salty breeze wafts through the tomb
column2: hinting at where it extends. Perhaps Karl is being held there."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_950_DESCRIPTION":"Seria is as reckless as always. You worry about her wounds but can't stop now. You thank her for her impeccable timing and proceed onward."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_951_DESCRIPTION":"The cave connected to the tomb seems to extend even further below the sea. The damp air makes you shiver as it tickles the back of your neck."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_952_DESCRIPTION":"The cave is even darker than the pitch black seafloor above it. Because of this
column2: creatures of the dark have free reign."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_953_DESCRIPTION":"The stench of death that fills the cave twists your imagination in an ominous way. However
column2: you pray that Lugina is able to rescue Karl."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_954_DESCRIPTION":"Somehow
column2: the cave exhibits signs of human civilization. Could there be manmade structures this far below the sea?"

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_960_DESCRIPTION":"You must properly thank Lugina later for securing Karl's safety. Being Mare's prisoner must not have been a cakewalk."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_961_DESCRIPTION":"Your exhaustion from the journey to rescue Karl has worn off. Perhaps the strong human bond between you that Mare loves to mock has its benefits."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_962_DESCRIPTION":"The shrine at the bottom of the ocean has a confusing
column2: unearthly aura. The fact that Lugina was able to find Karl here is impressive."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_963_DESCRIPTION":"Rescuing Karl surely threw a wrench into Mare's plans. If you can attack her head-on and avoid her trickery
column2: you have quite a fighting chance."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_964_DESCRIPTION":"The enemy attacks increase further in ferocity. But their primitive
column2: brute force approach is evidence that you are hot on Mare's tail."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_965_DESCRIPTION":"You have reached the innermost area of the shrine. You will have to defeat the remaining enemies here before you flush Mare out
column2: but do not worry: you are not alone."

column1: "MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_966_DESCRIPTION":"At last you have found Mare in a room at the back of the altar. Show her that she is no match for the human bond you share with your friends."
"MST_DUNGEONS_MISSION_970_DESCRIPTION":"It is said a ghastly spirit is sealed away deep within this gloomy dungeon home to dark secrets left from the Agni Empire."
"sgtext_Dungeons_M_DESC":""
